atk-s0404a0:3_0: 1. Aṭṭhakanipātassa paṭhame āsevitāyāti ādarena sevitāya. Bhāvitāyāti vaḍḍhitāya.
atk-s0404a0:3_1: Bahulīkatāyāti punappunaṃ katāya. Yānikatāyāti yuttayānasadisakatāya. Vatthukatāyāti
atk-s0404a0:3_2: patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu viya katāya. Anuṭṭhitāyāti paccupaṭṭhitāya. Paricitāyāti
atk-s0404a0:3_3: samantato citāya upacitāya. Susamāraddhāyāti suṭṭhu samāraddhāya sukatāya. Ānisaṃsāti
atk-s0404a0:3_4: guṇā. Sukhaṃ supatītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ekādasakanipāte vakkhāma.
atk-s0404a0:4_0: Appamāṇanti pharaṇavasena appamāṇaṃ. Tanū saṃyojanā honti, passato upadhikkhayanti
atk-s0404a0:4_1: mettāpadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya anukkamena upadhikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ pattassa
atk-s0404a0:4_2: dasa saṃyojanā pahīyantīti attho. Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti paṭighañceva paṭighasampayuttasaṃyojanā
atk-s0404a0:4_3: ca tanukā honti. Passato upadhikkhayanti tesaṃyeva kilesūpadhīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0404a0:4_4: mettaṃ adhigamavasena passantassa. Kusalī tena hotīti tena mettāyanena kusalo hoti.
atk-s0404a0:4_5: Sattasaṇḍanti sattasaṅkhātena saṇḍena samannāgataṃ, sattabharitanti attho. Vijetvāti
atk-s0404a0:4_6: adaṇḍena asatthena dhammeneva vijinitvā. Rājisayoti isisadisā dhammikarājāno. Yajamānāti
atk-s0404a0:5_0: Assamedhantiādīsu porāṇakarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ, purisamedhaṃ, sammāpāsaṃ, vācāpeyyanti
atk-s0404a0:5_1: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ, yehi rājāno lokaṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu. Tattha nipphannasassato
atk-s0404a0:5_2: dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ sassamedhaṃ nāma, sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho. Mahāyodhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:5_3: chamāsikaṃ bhattavetanānuppadānaṃ purisamedhaṃ nāma, purisasaṅgaṇhane medhāvitāti
atk-s0404a0:5_4: attho. Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:5_5: sammāpāsaṃ nāma. Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti, tasmā
atk-s0404a0:5_6: sammāpāsanti vuccati. “Tāta, mātulā”tiādinā nayena pana saṇhavācābhaṇanaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:5_7: nāma, piyavācāti attho. Evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva
atk-s0404a0:5_8: hoti, phītañca, bahuannapānaṃ, khemaṃ, nirabbudaṃ. Manussā mudā modamānā ure putte
atk-s0404a0:5_9: naccentā apārutagharā viharanti. Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti
atk-s0404a0:6_0: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ
atk-s0404a0:6_1: parivattetvā uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike pañca yaññe nāma
atk-s0404a0:6_2: akaṃsu. Tesu assamettha medhanti vadhentīti assamedho. Dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa
atk-s0404a0:6_4: ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:6_5: Purisamettha medhantīti purisamedho. Catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā
atk-s0404a0:6_6: assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sammamettha pāsantīti
atk-s0404a0:6_7: sammāpāso. Divase divase yugacchiggaḷe pavesanadaṇḍakasaṅkhātaṃ sammaṃ khipitvā tassa
atk-s0404a0:6_8: patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatīnadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti
atk-s0404a0:6_9: paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vājamettha pivantīti
atk-s0404a0:6_10: vājapeyyo. Ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa
atk-s0404a0:6_11: yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Natthi ettha aggaḷāti niraggaḷo. Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa
atk-s0404a0:6_12: saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0404a0:7_0: Kalampi te nānubhavanti soḷasinti te sabbepi mahāyāgā ekassa mettācittassa vipākamahantatāya
atk-s0404a0:7_1: soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghanti, soḷasamaṃ bhāgaṃ na pāpuṇantīti attho. Na jinātīti na
atk-s0404a0:7_2: attanā parassa jāniṃ karoti. Na jāpayeti na parena parassa jāniṃ kāreti. Mettaṃsoti
atk-s0404a0:7_3: mettāyamānacittakoṭṭhāso hutvā. Sabbabhūtānanti sabbasattesu. Veraṃ tassa na kenacīti
atk-s0404a0:7_4: tassa kenaci saddhiṃ akusalaveraṃ vā puggalaveraṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0404a0:9_0: 2. Dutiye ādibrahmacariyikāyāti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāya. Paññāyāti vipassanāya.
atk-s0404a0:9_1: Garuṭṭhāniyanti gāravuppattipaccayabhūtaṃ garubhāvanīyaṃ. Tibbanti bahalaṃ. Paripucchatīti
atk-s0404a0:9_2: atthapāḷianusandhipubbāparaṃ pucchati. Paripañhatīti pañhaṃ karoti, idañcidañca paṭipucchissāmīti
atk-s0404a0:9_3: vitakketi. Dvayenāti duvidhena. Anānākathikoti anānattakathiko hoti. Atiracchānakathikoti
atk-s0404a0:9_4: nānāvidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ na katheti. Ariyaṃ vā tuṇhībhāvanti ariyatuṇhībhāvo nāma
atk-s0404a0:9_5: catutthajjhānaṃ, sesakammaṭṭhānamanasikāropi vaṭṭati. Jānaṃ jānātīti jānitabbakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:9_6: jānāti. Passaṃ passatīti passitabbakaṃ passati. Piyattāyāti piyabhāvatthāya. Garuttāyāti
atk-s0404a0:9_7: garubhāvatthāya. Bhāvanāyāti bhāvanatthāya guṇasambhāvanāya vā. Sāmaññāyāti samaṇadhammatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:11_0: 3-4. Tatiye appiyapasaṃsīti appiyajanassa pasaṃsako vaṇṇabhāṇī. Piyagarahīti piyajanassa
atk-s0404a0:11_1: nindako garahako. Catutthe anavaññattikāmoti “aho vata maṃ aññena avajāneyyu”nti
atk-s0404a0:11_2: anavajānanakāmo. Akālaññūti kathākālaṃ na jānāti, akāle katheti. Asucīti asucīhi
atk-s0404a0:13_0: 5. Pañcame lokassa dhammāti lokadhammā. Etehi muttā nāma natthi, buddhānampi honti.
atk-s0404a0:13_1: Tenevāha – lokaṃ anuparivattantīti anubandhanti nappajahanti, lokato na nivattantīti
atk-s0404a0:13_2: attho. Loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatīti ayañca loko ete anubandhati na pajahati,
atk-s0404a0:14_0: Lābho alābhoti lābhe āgate alābho āgatoyevāti veditabbo. Ayasādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0404a0:14_1: Avekkhati vipariṇāmadhammeti “vipariṇāmadhammā ime”ti evaṃ avekkhati. Vidhūpitāti
atk-s0404a0:14_2: vidhamitā viddhaṃsitā. Padañca ñatvāti nibbānapadaṃ jānitvā. Sammappajānāti bhavassa
atk-s0404a0:14_3: pāragūti bhavassa pāraṃ gato nipphattiṃ matthakaṃ patto, nibbānapadaṃ ñatvāva taṃ
atk-s0404a0:14_4: pāraṃ gatabhāvaṃ sammappajānātīti. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:16: 6. Chaṭṭhe ko visesoti kiṃ visesakāraṇaṃ. Ko adhippayāsoti ko adhikappayogo. Pariyādāyāti gahetvā pariniṭṭhapetvā. Idhāpi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:18_0: 7. Sattame acirapakkanteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā na cirapakkante. Ārabbhāti āgamma paṭicca
atk-s0404a0:18_1: sandhāya. Attavipattinti attano vipattiṃ vipannākāraṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Abhibhuyyāti
atk-s0404a0:20_0: 8. Aṭṭhame vaṭajālikāyanti evaṃnāmake vihāre. So kira vaṭavane niviṭṭhattā vaṭajālikāti
atk-s0404a0:20_1: saṅkhaṃ gato. Pāturahosīti imamatthaṃ devarañño ārocessāmīti gantvā pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:22_0: 9. Navame kulaputtoti jātikulaputto. Balavāti thāmasampanno. Pāsādikoti rūpasampattiyā
atk-s0404a0:22_1: pasādajanako. Tibbarāgoti bahalarāgo. Kimaññatrātiādīsu ayamattho – kiṃ aññena kāraṇena
atk-s0404a0:22_2: kathitena, ayaṃ nando indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena
atk-s0404a0:22_3: samannāgato, yehi nando sakkoti paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ. Sace
atk-s0404a0:22_4: imehi kāraṇehi samannāgato nābhavissa, na sakkuṇeyyāti. Itiha tatthāti evaṃ tattha.
atk-s0404a0:24_0: 10. Dasame aññenāññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena kāraṇena vacanena vā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:24_1: vā paṭicchādeti. Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetīti bāhirato aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ otāreti.
atk-s0404a0:24_2: Apaneyyesoti apaneyyo nīharitabbo esa. Samaṇadūsīti samaṇadūsako. Samaṇapalāpoti
atk-s0404a0:24_3: vīhīsu vīhipalāpo viya nissāratāya samaṇesu samaṇapalāpo. Samaṇakāraṇḍavoti samaṇakacavaro.
atk-s0404a0:24_4: Bahiddhā nāsentīti bahi nīharanti. Yavakaraṇeti yavakhette. Phuṇamānassāti ucce ṭhāne
atk-s0404a0:24_5: ṭhatvā mahāvāte opuniyamānassa. Apasammajjantīti sāradhaññānaṃ ekato dubbaladhaññānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:24_6: ekato karaṇatthaṃ punappunaṃ apasammajjanti, apasammajjanisaṅkhātena vātaggāhinā
atk-s0404a0:24_7: suppena vā vatthena vā nīharanti. Daddaranti daddarasaddaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:25_0: Saṃvāsāyanti saṃvāsena ayaṃ. Vijānāthāti jāneyyātha. Santavācoti saṇhavāco. Janavatīti
atk-s0404a0:25_1: janamajjhe. Raho karoti karaṇanti karaṇaṃ vuccati pāpakammaṃ, taṃ raho paṭicchanno
atk-s0404a0:25_2: hutvā karoti. Saṃsappī ca musāvādīti saṃsappitvā musāvādī, musā bhaṇanto saṃsappati
atk-s0404a0:25_3: phandatīti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0404a0:27_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame abhivādetīti evamādīni na samaṇo gotamoti ettha vuttanakārena
atk-s0404a0:27_1: yojetvā evamettha attho veditabbo “na vandati nāsanā vuṭṭhāti, nāpi ‘idha bhonto
atk-s0404a0:27_2: nisīdantū’ti evaṃ āsanena vā nimantetī”ti. Ettha hi vā-saddo vibhāvane nāma atthe
atk-s0404a0:27_3: “rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”tiādīsu viya. Evaṃ vatvā atha attano abhivādanādīni akarontaṃ
atk-s0404a0:27_4: bhagavantaṃ disvā āha – tayidaṃ, bho gotama, tathevāti. Yaṃ taṃ mayā sutaṃ, taṃ tatheva,
atk-s0404a0:27_5: taṃ savanañca me dassanañca saṃsandati sameti, atthato ekībhāvaṃ gacchati. Na hi
atk-s0404a0:27_6: bhavaṃ gotamo…pe… āsanena vā nimantetīti. Evaṃ attanā sutaṃ diṭṭhena nigametvā nindanto
atk-s0404a0:27_7: āha – tayidaṃ, bho gotama, na sampannamevāti taṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ ayuttamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:28_0: Athassa bhagavā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanadosaṃ anupagamma karuṇāsītalena hadayena
atk-s0404a0:28_1: taṃ aññāṇaṃ vidhamitvā yuttabhāvaṃ dassetukāmo nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_2: saṅkhepattho – ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, appaṭihatena sabbaññutaññāṇacakkhunā olokentopi taṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_3: puggalaṃ etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke na passāmi, yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_4: vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ. Anacchariyaṃ vā etaṃ, svāhaṃ ajja sabbaññutaṃ patto evarūpaṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_5: nipaccākārārahaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi. Apica kho yadāpāhaṃ sampatijātova uttarena
atk-s0404a0:28_6: mukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesiṃ, tadāpi etasmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_7: sadevakādibhede loke taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi, yamahaṃ evarūpaṃ nipaccakāraṃ kareyyaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:28_8: Atha kho maṃ soḷasakappasahassāyuko khīṇāsavamahābrahmāpi añjaliṃ paggahetvā “tvaṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_9: loke mahāpuriso, tvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa aggo ca jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca, natthi tayā
atk-s0404a0:28_10: uttaritaro”ti sañjātasomanasso patimānesi. Tadāpi cāhaṃ attanā uttaritaraṃ apassanto
atk-s0404a0:28_11: āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresiṃ – “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi
atk-s0404a0:28_12: lokassā”ti. Evaṃ sampatijātassāpi mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggalo natthi, svāhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_13: idāni sabbaññutaṃ patto kaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ. Tasmā tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, mā tathāgatā evarūpaṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_14: paramanipaccakāraṃ patthayi. Yañhi, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato abhivādeyya vā…pe… āsanena
atk-s0404a0:28_15: vā nimanteyya, muddhāpi tassa puggalassa rattipariyosāne paripākasithilabandhanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:28_16: vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṃ viya gīvato chijjitvā sahasāva bhūmiyaṃ nipateyya.
atk-s0404a0:29_0: Evaṃ vuttepi brāhmaṇo duppaññatāya tathāgatassa lokajeṭṭhabhāvaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ
atk-s0404a0:29_1: taṃ vacanaṃ asahamāno āha – arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamoti. Ayaṃ kirassa adhippāyo – yaṃ
atk-s0404a0:29_3: gotamassa natthi. Tasmā arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo, arasajātiko arasasabhāvoti. Athassa
atk-s0404a0:29_4: bhagavā cittamudubhāvajananatthaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvaṃ pariharanto aññathā tassa
atk-s0404a0:29_5: vacanassa atthaṃ attani sandassento atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyotiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:30_0: Tattha atthi khvesāti atthi kho esa. Pariyāyoti kāraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – atthi
atk-s0404a0:30_1: kho, brāhmaṇa, etaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena kāraṇena maṃ “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vadamāno
atk-s0404a0:30_2: puggalo sammā vadeyya, avitathavādīti saṅkhaṃ gaccheyya. Katamo pana soti? Ye te,
atk-s0404a0:30_3: brāhmaṇa, rūparasā…pe… phoṭṭhabbarasā, te tathāgatassa pahīnāti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti?
atk-s0404a0:30_4: Ye te jātivasena vā upapattivasena vā seṭṭhasammatānampi puthujjanānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīni
atk-s0404a0:30_5: assādentānaṃ abhinandantānaṃ rajjantānaṃ uppajjanti kāmasukhassādasaṅkhātā rūparasā,
atk-s0404a0:30_6: saddarasā, gandharasā, rasarasā, phoṭṭhabbarasā, ye imaṃ lokaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā viya
atk-s0404a0:30_7: āviñchanti, vatthārammaṇādisāmaggiyañca uppannattā sāmaggirasāti vuccanti. Te sabbepi
atk-s0404a0:30_8: tathāgatassa pahīnā. “Mayhaṃ pahīnā”ti vattabbepi mamākārena attānaṃ anukkhipanto
atk-s0404a0:30_9: dhammaṃ deseti, desanāvilāso vā esa tathāgatassa.
atk-s0404a0:31_0: Tattha pahīnāti cittasantānato vigatā, pajahitā vā. Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:31_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ariyamaggasatthena ucchinnaṃ taṇhāvijjāmayaṃ mūlaṃ etesanti ucchinnamūlā.
atk-s0404a0:31_2: Tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā. Yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ
atk-s0404a0:31_3: uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati,
atk-s0404a0:31_4: evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena
atk-s0404a0:31_5: vatthumatte cittasantāne kate sabbepi te tālāvatthukatāti vuccanti. Aviruḷhidhammattā
atk-s0404a0:31_6: vā matthakacchinnatālo viya katāti tālāvatthukatā. Yasmā pana evaṃ tālāvatthukatā
atk-s0404a0:31_7: anabhāvaṃkatā honti, yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hoti, tathā katā honti. Tasmā āha
atk-s0404a0:32_0: No ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesīti yañca kho tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi, so pariyāyo
atk-s0404a0:32_1: na hoti. Nanu ca evaṃ vutte yo brāhmaṇena vutto sāmaggiraso, tassa attani vijjamānatā
atk-s0404a0:32_2: anuññātā hotīti? Na hoti. Yo hi naṃ sāmaggirasaṃ kātuṃ bhabbo hutvā na karoti, so
atk-s0404a0:32_3: tadabhāvena arasarūpoti vattabbataṃ arahati. Bhagavā pana abhabbova etaṃ kātuṃ, tenassa
atk-s0404a0:32_4: kāraṇe abhabbataṃ pakāsento āha – “no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī”ti. Yaṃ pariyāyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:32_5: sandhāya tvaṃ maṃ “arasarūpo”ti vadesi, so amhesu neva vattabboti.
atk-s0404a0:33_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇo attanā adhippetaṃ arasarūpataṃ āropetuṃ asakkonto athāparaṃ nibbhogo
atk-s0404a0:33_1: bhavantiādimāha. Sabbapariyāyesu cettha vuttanayeneva yojanākkamaṃ viditvā sandhāyabhāsitamatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:33_2: evaṃ veditabbaṃ – brāhmaṇo tadeva vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ loke “sāmaggiparibhogo”ti
atk-s0404a0:33_3: maññamāno tadabhāvena ca bhagavantaṃ “nibbhogo”tiādimāha. Bhagavā ca yvāyaṃ rūpādīsu
atk-s0404a0:33_4: sattānaṃ chandarāgaparibhogo, tadabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:34_0: Puna brāhmaṇo yaṃ loke vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ lokiyā karonti,
atk-s0404a0:34_1: tassa akiriyaṃ sampassamāno bhagavantaṃ akiriyavādoti āha. Bhagavā pana yasmā kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:34_2: akiriyaṃ vadati, tasmā taṃ akiriyavāditaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:34_3: Tattha ṭhapetvā kāyaduccaritādīni avasesā akusalā dhammā anekavihitā pāpakā akusalā dhammāti veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:35_0: Puna brāhmaṇo tadeva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto “imaṃ āgamma ayaṃ lokatanti
atk-s0404a0:35_1: lokapaveṇī ucchijjatī”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ ucchedavādoti āha. Bhagavā pana yasmā
atk-s0404a0:35_2: pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa ceva akusalacittadvayasampayuttassa ca dosassa anāgāmimaggena
atk-s0404a0:35_3: ucchedaṃ vadati, sabbākusalasambhavassa pana mohassa arahattamaggena ucchedaṃ vadati,
atk-s0404a0:35_4: ṭhapetvā te tayo avasesānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ catūhi maggehi
atk-s0404a0:35_5: ucchedaṃ vadati, tasmā taṃ ucchedavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:36_0: Puna brāhmaṇo “jigucchati maññe samaṇo gotamo idaṃ vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:36_1: tena taṃ na karotī”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ jegucchīti āha. Bhagavā pana yasmā jigucchati
atk-s0404a0:36_2: kāyaduccaritādīhi, yāni kāyavacīmanoduccaritāni ceva yāva ca akusalānaṃ lāmakadhammānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:36_3: samāpatti samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvo, taṃ sabbampi gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanakajātiko puriso
atk-s0404a0:36_4: jigucchati hirīyati, tasmā taṃ jegucchitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:37_0: Puna brāhmaṇo tadeva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto “ayaṃ idaṃ lokajeṭṭhakakammaṃ
atk-s0404a0:37_1: vineti vināseti, atha vā yasmā etaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ na karoti, tasmā ayaṃ vinetabbo
atk-s0404a0:37_2: niggaṇhitabbo”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ venayikoti āha. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – vinayatīti
atk-s0404a0:37_3: vinayo, vināsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Vinayo eva venayiko. Vinayaṃ vā arahatīti venayiko,
atk-s0404a0:37_4: niggahaṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhagavā pana yasmā rāgādīnaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya
atk-s0404a0:37_5: dhammaṃ deseti, tasmā venayiko hoti. Ayameva cettha padattho – vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti
atk-s0404a0:37_6: venayiko. Vicitrā hi taddhitavutti. Svāyaṃ taṃ venayikabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno
atk-s0404a0:38_0: Puna brāhmaṇo yasmā abhivādanādīni sāmīcikammāni karontā vayovuddhe tosenti hāsenti,
atk-s0404a0:38_1: akarontā pana tāpenti vihesenti domanassaṃ nesaṃ uppādenti, bhagavā ca tāni na karoti,
atk-s0404a0:38_2: tasmā “ayaṃ vayovuddhe tapatī”ti maññamāno sappurisācāravirahitattā vā “kapaṇapuriso
atk-s0404a0:38_3: aya”nti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ tapassīti āha. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – tapatīti tapo, roseti
atk-s0404a0:38_4: vihesetīti attho. Sāmīcikammākaraṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tapo assa atthīti tapassī.
atk-s0404a0:38_5: Dutiye atthavikappe byañjanāni avicāretvā loke kapaṇapuriso tapassīti vuccati. Bhagavā
atk-s0404a0:38_6: pana ye akusalā dhammā lokaṃ tapanato tapanīyāni vuccanti, tesaṃ pahīnattā yasmā
atk-s0404a0:38_7: tapassīti saṅkhaṃ gato. Tasmā taṃ tapassitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:38_8: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – tapantīti tapā, akusaladhammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Te tape assi
atk-s0404a0:39_0: Puna brāhmaṇo taṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ devalokagabbhasampattiyā devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya
atk-s0404a0:39_1: saṃvattatīti maññamāno bhagavati cassa abhāvaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ apagabbhoti āha.
atk-s0404a0:39_2: Kodhavasena vā bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentopi evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:39_3: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – gabbhato apagatoti apagabbho, abhabbo devalokūpapattiṃ pāpuṇitunti
atk-s0404a0:39_4: adhippāyo. Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho. Devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā āyatiṃ hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgīti.
atk-s0404a0:39_5: Hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo. Bhagavato pana yasmā āyatiṃ
atk-s0404a0:39_6: gabbhaseyyā apagatā, tasmā so taṃ apagabbhataṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.
atk-s0404a0:39_7: Tatra ca yassa kho, brāhmaṇa, āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnāti etesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:39_8: padānaṃ evamattho daṭṭhabbo – “brāhmaṇa, yassa puggalassa anāgate gabbhaseyyā punabbhave
atk-s0404a0:39_9: ca abhinibbatti anuttarena maggena vihatakāraṇattā pahīnā. Gabbhaseyyāgahaṇena cettha
atk-s0404a0:40_0: Apica gabbhassa seyyā gabbhaseyyā. Punabbhavo eva abhinibbatti punabbhavābhinibbattīti
atk-s0404a0:40_1: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yathā ca viññāṇaṭṭhitīti vuttepi na viññāṇato aññā ṭhiti
atk-s0404a0:40_2: atthi, evamidhāpi na gabbhato aññā seyyā veditabbā. Abhinibbatti ca nāma yasmā punabbhavabhūtāpi
atk-s0404a0:40_3: apunabbhavabhūtāpi atthi, idha ca punabbhavabhūtā adhippetā, tasmā vuttaṃ – “punabbhavo
atk-s0404a0:41_0: Evaṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantampi brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:41_1: bhagavā dhammissaro dhammarājā dhammasāmī tathāgato anukampāya sītaleneva cakkhunā
atk-s0404a0:41_2: brāhmaṇaṃ olekento yaṃ dhammadhātuṃ paṭivijjhitvā desanāvilāsappattā nāma hoti, tassā
atk-s0404a0:41_3: dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā vigatavalāhake nabhe puṇṇacando viya ca saradakāle
atk-s0404a0:41_4: sūriyo viya ca brāhmaṇassa hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento tāniyeva akkosavatthūni tena
atk-s0404a0:41_5: tena pariyāyena aññathā dassetvā punapi attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi
atk-s0404a0:41_7: pakāsento “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo kevalaṃ palitasirakhaṇḍadantavalittacatādīhi attano vuddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0404a0:41_8: sallakkheti, no ca kho jānāti attānaṃ jātiyā anugataṃ jarāya anusaṭaṃ byādhino adhibhūtaṃ
atk-s0404a0:41_9: maraṇena abbhāhataṃ ajja maritvā puna sveva uttānaseyyadārakabhāvagamanīyaṃ. Mahantena
atk-s0404a0:41_10: kho pana ussāhena mama santikaṃ āgato, tadassa āgamanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotū”ti cintetvā
atk-s0404a0:41_11: imasmiṃ loke attano appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ dassento seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇātiādinā
atk-s0404a0:42_0: Tattha seyyathāpītiādīnaṃ heṭṭhā vutanayeneva attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso –
atk-s0404a0:42_1: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva hi te kukkuṭapotakā pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā
atk-s0404a0:42_2: nikkhamanti. Evaṃ nikkhamantānañca tesaṃ yo paṭhamataraṃ nikkhamati, so jeṭṭhoti
atk-s0404a0:42_3: vuccati. Tasmā bhagavā tāya upamāya attano jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ sādhetukāmo brāhmaṇaṃ pucchati
atk-s0404a0:42_4: – yo nu kho tesaṃ kukkuṭacchāpotakānaṃ…pe… kinti svāssa vacanīyoti. Tattha kukkuṭacchāpakānanti
atk-s0404a0:42_5: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ. Kinti svāssa vacanīyoti so kinti vacanīyo assa, kiṃ vattabbo bhaveyya
atk-s0404a0:43_0: “Jeṭṭho”tissa, bho gotama, vacanīyoti, bho gotama, so jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyo. Kasmāti
atk-s0404a0:43_1: ce? So hi nesaṃ jeṭṭhoti, yasmā so nesaṃ vuddhataroti attho. Athassa bhagavā opammaṃ
atk-s0404a0:43_2: sampaṭipādento evameva khoti āha, yathā so kukkuṭapotako, evaṃ ahampi. Avijjāgatāya
atk-s0404a0:43_3: pajāyāti avijjā vuccati aññāṇaṃ, tattha gatāya. Pajāyāti sattadhivacanametaṃ, avijjākosassa
atk-s0404a0:43_4: anto paviṭṭhesu sattesūpi vuttaṃ hoti. Aṇḍabhūtāyāti aṇḍe bhūtāya pajātāya sañjātāya.
atk-s0404a0:43_5: Yathā hi aṇḍe nibbattā ekacce sattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccanti, evamayaṃ sabbāpi pajā avijjaṇḍakose
atk-s0404a0:43_6: nibbattattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccati. Pariyonaddhāyāti tena avijjaṇḍakosena samantato
atk-s0404a0:43_7: onaddhāya baddhāya veṭhitāya. Avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvāti taṃ avijjāmayaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-s0404a0:43_8: bhinditvā. Ekova loketi sakalepi lokasannivāse ahameva eko adutiyo. Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0404a0:43_9: abhisambuddhoti uttararahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ, atha vā pasatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:43_10: sundarañca bodhiṃ. Arahattamaggañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi nāmameva.
atk-s0404a0:43_11: Ubhayampi vaṭṭati. Aññesaṃ arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi hoti, na hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-s0404a0:43_12: Kasmā? Asabbaguṇadāyakattā. Tesañhi kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti,
atk-s0404a0:43_13: kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:43_14: Paccekabuddhānampi paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti, buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti
atk-s0404a0:43_15: abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissarabhāvaṃ. Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi
atk-s0404a0:43_16: na hotīti. Abhisambuddhoti abbhaññāsiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ, pattomhi adhigatomhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:44_0: Idāni yadetaṃ bhagavatā “evameva kho”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:44_1: taṃ evaṃ atthena saṃsanditvā veditabbaṃ – yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā attano aṇḍesu
atk-s0404a0:44_3: bhagavato attano santāne aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattāti tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ. Kukkuṭiyā
atk-s0404a0:44_4: tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-s0404a0:44_5: vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni. Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:44_7: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato
atk-s0404a0:44_9: kukkuṭapotakassa pādanakhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato
atk-s0404a0:44_11: tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pariṇāmakālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato
atk-s0404a0:44_13: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena
atk-s0404a0:44_14: vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya bhagavato
atk-s0404a0:44_16: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā sakalabuddhaguṇasacchikatakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:45_0: Ahañhi, brāhmaṇa, jeṭṭho seṭṭho lokassāti, brāhmaṇa, yathā tesaṃ kukkuṭapotakānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:45_1: paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhinibbatto kukkuṭapotako jeṭṭho hoti, evaṃ avijjāgatāya
atk-s0404a0:45_2: pajāya taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātattā ahañhi jeṭṭho
atk-s0404a0:45_3: vuddhatamoti saṅkhaṃ gato, sabbaguṇehi pana appaṭisamattā seṭṭhoti.
atk-s0404a0:46_0: Evaṃ bhagavā attano anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa pakāsetvā idāni yāya
atk-s0404a0:46_1: paṭipadāya taṃ adhigato, taṃ paṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ kho
atk-s0404a0:46_2: pana me, brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa, vīriyaṃ ahosīti,
atk-s0404a0:46_3: brāhmaṇa, na mayā ayaṃ anuttaro jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvo kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena
atk-s0404a0:46_4: vikkhittacitena adhigato, apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:46_5: Bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā catusammappadhānabhedaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi, paggahitaṃ
atk-s0404a0:46_6: asithilappavattitaṃ. Āraddhattāyeva ca me taṃ asallīnaṃ ahosi. Na kevalañca vīriyameva,
atk-s0404a0:46_7: satipi me ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena upaṭṭhitā ahosi, upaṭṭhitattāyeva ca asammuṭṭhā.
atk-s0404a0:46_8: Passaddho kāyo asāraddhoti kāyacittappassaddhivasena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi. Tattha
atk-s0404a0:46_9: yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti, tasmā “nāmakāyo rūpakāyo”ti
atk-s0404a0:46_10: avisesetvāva “passaddho kāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho,
atk-s0404a0:46_11: vigatadarathoti vuttaṃ hoti. Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ
atk-s0404a0:46_12: suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi, samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti.
atk-s0404a0:47_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjāttayapariyosānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:47_1: visesaṃ dassento so kho ahantiādimāha. Tattha yaṃ yāva vinicchayanayena vattabbaṃ
atk-s0404a0:48_0: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇātiādīsu pana vijjāti viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā. Kiṃ viditaṃ karoti?
atk-s0404a0:48_1: Pubbenivāsaṃ. Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādakamoho.
atk-s0404a0:48_2: Tamoti sveva moho tappaṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo nāma. Ālokoti sā eva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0404a0:48_3: ālokoti. Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti attho, sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Yojanā panettha –
atk-s0404a0:48_4: ayaṃ kho me vijjā adhigatā, tassa me adhigatavijjassa avijjā vihatā, vinaṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0404a0:48_5: Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā uppannā. Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvaye. Yathā tanti ettha tanti
atk-s0404a0:48_6: nipātamattaṃ. Satiyā avippavāsena appamattassa vīriyātāpena ātāpino kāye ca jīvite
atk-s0404a0:48_7: ca anapekkhātāya pahitattassa pesitattassāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā appamattassa
atk-s0404a0:48_8: ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya, vijjā uppajjeyya tamo vihaññeyya,
atk-s0404a0:48_9: āloko uppajjeyya, evameva mama avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno.
atk-s0404a0:48_10: Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
atk-s0404a0:49_0: Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhāti
atk-s0404a0:49_1: ayaṃ kho mama, brāhmaṇa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:49_2: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamā abhinibbhidā paṭhamā nikkhanti paṭhamā ariyājāti
atk-s0404a0:49_3: ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā
atk-s0404a0:49_4: tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti. Ayaṃ tāva pubbenivāsakathāyaṃ nayo.
atk-s0404a0:50_0: Cutupapātakathāya pana vijjāti dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjā. Avijjāti cutupapātappaṭicchādikā
atk-s0404a0:51_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0404a0:51_1: dassento ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tatiyā vijjātiādimāha, tattha vijjāti arahattamaggavijjā.
atk-s0404a0:51_2: Avijjāti catusaccappaṭicchādikā avijjā. Ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tatiyā abhinibbhidā
atk-s0404a0:51_3: ahosīti ettha ayaṃ kho mama, brāhmaṇa, āsavānaṃ khayañāṇamukhatuṇḍakena catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:51_4: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyā abhinibbhidā tatiyā nikkhanti tatiyā ariyajāti ahosi
atk-s0404a0:51_5: kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā
atk-s0404a0:52_0: Ettāvatā kiṃ dassesīti? So hi, brāhmaṇa, kukkuṭacchāpako aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tato
atk-s0404a0:52_1: nikkhamanto sakimeva jāyati, ahaṃ pana pubbenivutthakkhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ
atk-s0404a0:52_2: bhinditvā paṭhamaṃ tāva pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇavijjāya jāto. Tato sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhippaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:52_3: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā dutiyaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjāya jāto, puna catusaccappaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:52_4: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇavijjāya jāto. Evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi
atk-s0404a0:52_5: tikkhattuṃ jātomhi. Sā ca me jāti ariyā suparisuddhāti idaṃ dasseti. Evaṃdassento
atk-s0404a0:52_6: ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ, dibbacakkhunā paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇaṃ, āsavakkhayena
atk-s0404a0:52_7: sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe pakāsetvā attano
atk-s0404a0:53_0: Evaṃ vutte verañjo brāhmaṇoti evaṃ bhagavatā lokānukampakena brāhmaṇaṃ anukampamānena
atk-s0404a0:53_1: niguhitabbepi attano ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāve vijjāttayapakāsikāya dhammadesanāya
atk-s0404a0:53_2: vutte pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacitto verañjo brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato ariyāya jātiyā
atk-s0404a0:53_4: sabbaññuṃ ‘aññesaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ na karotī’ti avacaṃ, dhiratthu vata, bho, aññāṇa”nti
atk-s0404a0:53_5: attānaṃ garahitvā “ayaṃ dāni loke ariyāya jātiyā purejātaṭṭhena jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi
atk-s0404a0:53_6: appaṭisamaṭṭhena seṭṭho”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – jeṭṭho bhavaṃ gotamo
atk-s0404a0:53_7: seṭṭho bhavaṃ gotamoti. Evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno
atk-s0404a0:55_0: 12. Dutiye abhiññātāti ñātā paññātā pākaṭā. Santhāgāreti mahājanassa vissamanatthāya
atk-s0404a0:55_1: kate agāre. Sā kira santhāgārasālā nagaramajjhe ahosi, catūsu ṭhānesu ṭhitānaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0404a0:55_2: catūhi disāhi āgatamanussā paṭhamaṃ tattha vissamitvā pacchā attano attano phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:55_3: gacchanti. Rājakulānaṃ rajjakiccasantharaṇatthāya kataṃ agārantipi vadantiyeva. Tattha
atk-s0404a0:55_4: hi nisīditvā licchavirājāno rajjakiccaṃ santharanti karonti vicārenti. Sannisinnāti
atk-s0404a0:55_6: āsanesu sannisinnā. Anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantīti rājakule kiccañceva
atk-s0404a0:55_7: lokatthacariyañca vicāretvā anekehi kāraṇehi buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti kathenti dīpenti.
atk-s0404a0:55_8: Paṇḍitā hi te rājāno saddhā pasannā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi ariyasāvakā,
atk-s0404a0:55_9: te sabbepi lokiyajaṭaṃ chinditvā buddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti. Tattha
atk-s0404a0:55_10: tividho buddhavaṇṇo nāma cariyavaṇṇo, sarīravaṇṇo, guṇavaṇṇoti. Tatrime rājāno cariyāya
atk-s0404a0:55_11: vaṇṇaṃ ārabhiṃsu – “dukkaraṃ vata kataṃ sammāsambuddhena kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-s0404a0:55_12: cattāri asaṅkheyyāni dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa
atk-s0404a0:55_13: pāramiyo pūrentena, ñātatthacariyaṃ, lokatthacariyaṃ, buddhacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0404a0:55_14: pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantenā”ti aḍḍhacchakkehi jātakasatehi buddhavaṇṇaṃ kathentā
atk-s0404a0:56_0: Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā pana “tena bhagavatā dhammo desito, nikāyato pañca nikāyā,
atk-s0404a0:56_1: piṭakato tīṇi piṭakāni, aṅgato nava aṅgāni, khandhato caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti
atk-s0404a0:57_0: Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “paṭiladdhasaddhā kulaputtā
atk-s0404a0:57_1: bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca pahāya setacchattaṃ oparajjaṃ senāpatiseṭṭhibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānantarādīni
atk-s0404a0:57_2: agaṇetvā nikkhamma satthu varasāsane pabbajanti. Setacchattaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:57_4: ahesuṃ. Anekakoṭisataṃ dhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ pana yasakulaputtasoṇaseṭṭhiputtaraṭṭhapālakulaputtādīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:57_5: paricchedo natthi. Evarūpā ca evarūpā ca kulaputtā satthu sāsane pabbajantī”ti pabbajjāsaṅkhepavasena
atk-s0404a0:58_0: Sīho senāpatīti evaṃnāmako senāya adhipati. Vesāliyañhi satta sahassāni satta satāni
atk-s0404a0:58_1: satta ca rājāno. Te sabbepi sannipatitvā sabbesaṃ manaṃ gahetvā “raṭṭhaṃ vicāretuṃ
atk-s0404a0:58_2: samatthaṃ ekaṃ vicinathā”ti vicinantā sīhaṃ rājakumāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ sakkhissatī”ti
atk-s0404a0:58_3: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tassa rattamaṇivaṇṇaṃ kambalapariyonaddhaṃ senāpaticchattaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:58_4: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “sīho senāpatī”ti. Nigaṇṭhasāvakoti nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa
atk-s0404a0:58_5: paccayadāyako upaṭṭhāko. Jambudīpatalasmiñhi tayo janā nigaṇṭhānaṃ aggupaṭṭhākā –
atk-s0404a0:58_6: nāḷandāyaṃ, upāli gahapati, kapilapure vappo sakko, vesāliyaṃ ayaṃ sīho senāpatīti.
atk-s0404a0:58_7: Nisinno hotīti sesarājūnaṃ parisāya antarantare āsanāni paññāpayiṃsu, sīhassa pana
atk-s0404a0:58_8: majjhe ṭhāneti tasmiṃ paññatte mahārahe rājāsane nisinno hoti. Nissaṃsayanti nibbicikicchaṃ
atk-s0404a0:58_9: addhā ekaṃsena, na hete yassa vā tassa vā appesakkhassa evaṃ anekasatehi kāraṇehi vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-s0404a0:59_0: Yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkamīti nigaṇṭho kira nāṭaputto “sacāyaṃ sīho kassacideva
atk-s0404a0:59_1: samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇaṃ kathentassa sutvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissati,
atk-s0404a0:59_2: mayhaṃ parihāni bhavissatī”ti cintetvā paṭhamataraṃyeva sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ etadavoca
atk-s0404a0:59_3: – “senāpati imasmiṃ loke ‘ahaṃ buddho ahaṃ buddho’ti bahū vicaranti. Sace tvaṃ kassaci
atk-s0404a0:59_4: dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi, maṃ puccheyyāsi. Ahaṃ te yuttaṭṭhānaṃ pesessāmi,
atk-s0404a0:59_5: ayuttaṭṭhānato nivāressāmī”ti. So taṃ kathaṃ anussaritvā “sace maṃ pesessati, gamissāmi.
atk-s0404a0:59_6: No ce, na gamissāmī”ti cintetvā yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto, tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:60_0: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā nigaṇṭho mahāpabbatena viya balavasokena otthaṭo “yattha dānissāhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:60_1: gamanaṃ na icchāmi, tattheva gantukāmo jāto, hatohamasmī”ti anattamano hutvā “paṭibāhanupāyamassa
atk-s0404a0:60_2: karissāmī”ti cintetvā kiṃ pana tvantiādimāha. Evaṃ vadanto vicarantaṃ goṇaṃ daṇḍena
atk-s0404a0:60_3: paharanto viya jalamānaṃ padīpaṃ nibbāpento viya bhattabharitaṃ pattaṃ nikkujjanto
atk-s0404a0:60_4: viya ca sīhassa uppannapītiṃ vināsesi. Gamiyābhisaṅkhāroti hatthiyānādīnaṃ yojāpanagandhamālādiggahaṇavasena
atk-s0404a0:60_5: pavatto payogo. So paṭippassambhīti so vūpasanto.
atk-s0404a0:61_0: Dutiyampi khoti dutiyavārampi. Imasmiñca vāre buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā tusitabhavanato
atk-s0404a0:61_1: paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā dasabalassa heṭṭhā pādatalehi upari kesaggehi paricchinditvā
atk-s0404a0:61_3: Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “ekapadepi ekabyañjanepi avakhalitaṃ nāma natthī”ti sukathitavaseneva
atk-s0404a0:61_4: dhammaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “evarūpaṃ yasasirivibhavaṃ pahāya
atk-s0404a0:61_5: satthu sāsane pabbajitā na kosajjapakatikā honti, terasasu pana dhutaṅgaguṇesu paripūrakārino
atk-s0404a0:61_6: hutvā sattasu anupassanāsu kammaṃ karonti, aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavibhattiyo vaḷañjentī”ti
atk-s0404a0:62_0: Tatiyavāre pana buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsamānā “itipi so bhagavā”ti suttantapariyāyeneva
atk-s0404a0:62_1: buddhaguṇe kathayiṃsu, “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva dhammaguṇe,
atk-s0404a0:62_2: “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva saṅghaguṇe ca kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:62_3: Tato sīho cintesi – “imesañca licchavirājakumārānaṃ tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāya buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe
atk-s0404a0:62_4: kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti, addhā anomaguṇena samannāgatā so bhagavā, imaṃ dāni
atk-s0404a0:62_5: uppannaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvāva ahaṃ ajja sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmī”ti. Athassa “kiṃ
atk-s0404a0:62_6: hi me karissanti nigaṇṭhā”ti vitakko udapādi. Tattha kiṃ hi me karissantīti kiṃ nāma
atk-s0404a0:62_7: mayhaṃ nigaṇṭhā karissanti. Apalokitā vā anapalokitā vāti āpucchitā vā anāpucchitā
atk-s0404a0:62_8: vā. Na hi me te āpucchitā yānavāhanasampattiṃ, na ca issariyavisesaṃ dassanti, nāpi
atk-s0404a0:62_9: anāpucchitā harissanti, aphalaṃ etesaṃ āpucchananti adhippāyo.
atk-s0404a0:63_0: Vesāliyā niyyāsīti yathā hi gimhakāle deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā
atk-s0404a0:63_1: thokameva gantvā tiṭṭhati nappavattati, evaṃ sīhassa paṭhamadivase “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti
atk-s0404a0:63_2: uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo. Yathāpi dutiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:63_3: sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokaṃ gantvā vālikāpuñjaṃ paharitvā appavattaṃ hoti, evaṃ
atk-s0404a0:63_4: sīhassa dutiyadivase “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo.
atk-s0404a0:63_5: Yathā tatiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā purāṇapaṇṇasukkhadaṇḍakaṭṭhakacavarādīni
atk-s0404a0:63_6: parikaḍḍhantaṃ vālikāpuñjaṃ bhinditvā samuddaninnameva hoti, evaṃ sīho tatiyadivase
atk-s0404a0:63_7: tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā uppanne pītipāmojje “aphalā nigaṇṭhā nipphalā nigaṇṭhā,
atk-s0404a0:63_8: kiṃ me ime karissanti, gamissāmahaṃ satthusantika”nti manaṃ abhinīharitvā vesāliyā
atk-s0404a0:63_9: niyyāsi. Niyyanto ca “cirassāhaṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmo jāto, na kho pana
atk-s0404a0:63_10: me yuttaṃ aññātakavesena gantu”nti “yekeci dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmā, sabbe
atk-s0404a0:63_11: nikkhamantū”ti ghosanaṃ kāretvā pañcarathasatāni yojāpetvā uttamarathe ṭhito tehi
atk-s0404a0:63_12: ceva pañcahi rathasatehi mahatiyā ca parisāya parivuto gandhapupphacuṇṇavāsādīni
atk-s0404a0:63_13: gāhāpetvā niyyāsi. Divā divassāti divasassa ca divā, majjhanhike atikkantamatte.
atk-s0404a0:64_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti ārāmaṃ pavisanto dūratova asīti-anubyañjana-byāmappabhā-dvattiṃsa-mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
atk-s0404a0:64_1: chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo ca disvā “evarūpaṃ nāma purisaṃ evaṃ āsanne vasantaṃ
atk-s0404a0:64_2: ettakaṃ kālaṃ nāddasaṃ, vañcito vatamhi, alābhā vata me”ti cintetvā mahānidhiṃ disvā
atk-s0404a0:64_3: daliddapuriso viya sañjātapītipāmojjo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ
atk-s0404a0:64_4: byākarontīti bhotā gotamena vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti. Kāraṇavacano hettha
atk-s0404a0:64_5: dhammasaddo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya. Kāraṇanti cettha tathāpavattassa
atk-s0404a0:64_6: saddassa attho adhippeto tassa pavattihetubhāvato. Atthappayutto hi saddappayogo.
atk-s0404a0:64_7: Anukāraṇanti eso eva parehi tathā vuccamāno. Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti. Parehi vuttakāraṇehi
atk-s0404a0:64_8: sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā tato paraṃ tassa anuvādo vā koci appamattakopi viññūhi
atk-s0404a0:64_9: garahitabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kiṃ sabbākārenapi tava
atk-s0404a0:64_10: vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti. Anabbhakkhātukāmāti na abhūtena vattukāmā. Atthi
atk-s0404a0:64_11: sīhapariyāyotiādīnaṃ attho verañjakaṇḍe āgatanayeneva veditabbo. Paramena assāsenāti
atk-s0404a0:64_12: catumaggacatuphalasaṅkhātena uttamena. Assāsāya dhammaṃ desemīti assāsanatthāya santhambhanatthāya
atk-s0404a0:64_13: dhammaṃ desemi. Iti bhagavā aṭṭhahaṅgehi sīhassa senāpatissa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0404a0:65_0: Anuviccakāranti anuviditvā cintetvā tulayitvā kattabbaṃ karohīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sādhu
atk-s0404a0:65_1: hotīti sundaro hoti. Tumhādisasmiñhi maṃ disvā maṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante nigaṇṭhaṃ disvā
atk-s0404a0:65_2: nigaṇṭhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante “kiṃ ayaṃ sīho diṭṭhadiṭṭhameva saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti garahā
atk-s0404a0:65_3: uppajjati, tasmā anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ sādhūti dasseti. Paṭākaṃ parihareyyunti
atk-s0404a0:65_4: te kira evarūpaṃ sāvakaṃ labhitvā “asuko nāma rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā seṭṭhi vā
atk-s0404a0:65_5: amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato sāvako jāto”ti paṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā nagare ghosentā āhiṇḍanti.
atk-s0404a0:65_6: Kasmā? Evaṃ no mahantabhāvo āvibhavissatīti ca. Sace panassa “kimahaṃ etesaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:65_7: gato”ti vippaṭisāro uppajjeyya, tampi so “etesaṃ me saraṇagatabhāvaṃ bahū jānanti,
atk-s0404a0:65_8: dukkhaṃ idāni paṭinivattitu”nti vinodetvā na paṭikkamissatīti ca. Tenāha – “paṭākaṃ
atk-s0404a0:65_9: parihareyyu”nti. Opānabhūtanti paṭiyattaudapāno viya ṭhitaṃ. Kulanti tava nivesanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:65_10: Dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsīti pubbe dasapi vīsatipi saṭṭhipi jane āgate disvā natthīti avatvā
atk-s0404a0:65_11: desi, idāni maṃ saraṇaṃ gatakāraṇamatteneva mā imesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ upacchindi. Sampattānañhi
atk-s0404a0:65_12: dātabbamevāti ovadi. Sutaṃ metaṃ, bhanteti kuto sutanti? Nigaṇṭhānaṃ santikā. Te
atk-s0404a0:65_13: kira kulagharesu evaṃ pakāsenti “mayaṃ yassa kassaci sampattassa dātabbanti vadāma,
atk-s0404a0:65_14: samaṇo pana gotamo ‘mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ nāññesaṃ, mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:65_15: dātabbaṃ, nāññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ, mayhameva dinnaṃ dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ, nāññesaṃ, mayhameva
atk-s0404a0:65_16: sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, nāññesa’nti evaṃ vadatī”ti. Taṃ sandhāya ayaṃ “sutaṃ meta”nti āha.
atk-s0404a0:66_0: Anupubbiṃ kathanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ, sīlānantaraṃ saggaṃ, saggānantaraṃ magganti
atk-s0404a0:66_1: evaṃ anupaṭipāṭikathaṃ. Tattha dānakathanti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ, sampattīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:66_2: mūlaṃ, bhogānaṃ patiṭṭhā, visamagatassa tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ, idhalokaparalokesu
atk-s0404a0:66_3: dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi. Idañhi
atk-s0404a0:66_5: ālambanarajjusadisaṃ. Idañhi dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhena nāvā, samassāsanaṭṭhena saṅgāmasūro,
atk-s0404a0:66_7: tesaṃ nidahanaṭṭhena aggi, durāsadaṭṭhena āsiviso, asantāsanaṭṭhena sīho, balavantaṭṭhena
atk-s0404a0:66_9: assarājā. Dānaṃ nāmetaṃ mayā gatamaggo, mayheso vaṃso, mayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena
atk-s0404a0:66_11: anekamahāyaññā pavattitā, sasabhūtena jalitaaggikkhandhe attānaṃ niyyādentena sampattayācakānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:66_12: cittaṃ gahitaṃ. Dānañhi loke sakkasampattiṃ deti mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ, cakkavattisampattiṃ,
atk-s0404a0:66_13: sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, abhisambodhiñāṇaṃ detīti evamādidānaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:67_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti, tasmā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:67_1: Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:67_2: Sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ mama vaṃso, ahaṃ saṅkhapālanāgarājakāle bhūridattanāgarājakāle campeyyanāgarājakāle
atk-s0404a0:67_4: sīlaṃ paripūresiṃ. Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:67_5: tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi, sīlālaṅkārasadiso alaṅkāro natthi, sīlapupphasadisaṃ
atk-s0404a0:67_6: pupphaṃ natthi, sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthi. Sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:67_7: sadevakopi loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādisīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:68_0: “Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatī”ti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ
atk-s0404a0:68_1: kathesi. Saggakathanti “ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo, niccamettha kīḷā, niccaṃ
atk-s0404a0:68_2: sampattiyo labbhanti, cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0404a0:68_3: anubhavanti, tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānī”ti evamādisaggaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0404a0:68_4: kathaṃ. Saggasampattiṃ kathayantānañhi buddhānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ
atk-s0404a0:69_0: Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā pana hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya
atk-s0404a0:69_1: “ayampi saggo anicco addhuvo, na ettha chandarāgo kattabbo”ti dassanatthaṃ “appassādā
atk-s0404a0:69_2: kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0404a0:69_3: okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi. Tattha ādīnavoti doso. Okāroti avakāro lāmakabhāvo. Saṃkilesoti
atk-s0404a0:69_4: tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. Yathāha – “saṃkilissanti vata, bho, sattā”ti.
atk-s0404a0:70_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi. Kallacittanti arogacittaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:70_1: Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā attanāyeva uddharitvā gahitā, sayambhuñāṇena diṭṭhā
atk-s0404a0:70_2: asādhāraṇā aññesanti attho. Kā pana sāti? Ariyasaccadesanā. Tenevāha – dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:70_3: nirodhaṃ magganti. Virajaṃ vītamalanti rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvā virajaṃ, rāgamalādīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:70_4: vigatattā vītamalaṃ. Dhammacakkhunti idha sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. Tassa uppattiākāradassanatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:70_5: yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti āha. Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:70_6: katvā kiccavasena evaṃ sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati. Diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo
atk-s0404a0:70_7: etenāti diṭṭhadhammo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tiṇṇā vicikicchā anenāti tiṇṇavicikiccho.
atk-s0404a0:70_8: Vigatā kathaṃkathā assāti vigatakathaṃkatho. Visārajjaṃ pattoti vesārajjappatto.
atk-s0404a0:70_9: Kattha? Satthusāsane. Nāssa paro paccayo, na paraṃ saddhāya ettha vattatīti aparappaccayo.
atk-s0404a0:71_0: Pavattamaṃsanti pakatiyā pavattaṃ kappiyamaṃsaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā antarāpaṇe pariyesāhīti
atk-s0404a0:71_1: adhippāyo. Sambahulā nigaṇṭhāti pañcasatamattā nigaṇṭhā. Thūlaṃ pasunti thūlaṃ mahāsarīraṃ
atk-s0404a0:71_2: gokaṇṇamahiṃsasūkarasaṅkhātaṃ pasuṃ. Uddissakatanti attānaṃ uddisitvā kataṃ, māritanti
atk-s0404a0:71_3: attho. Paṭiccakammanti svāyaṃ taṃ maṃsaṃ paṭicca taṃ pāṇavadhakammaṃ phusati. Tañhi
atk-s0404a0:71_4: akusalaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ dāyakassa, upaḍḍhaṃ paṭiggāhakassa hotīti nesaṃ laddhi. Aparo nayo
atk-s0404a0:71_5: – paṭiccakammanti attānaṃ paṭiccakataṃ. Atha vā paṭiccakammanti nimittakammassetaṃ
atk-s0404a0:71_6: adhivacanaṃ, taṃ paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsampi paṭiccakammanti vuttaṃ. Upakaṇṇaketi
atk-s0404a0:71_7: kaṇṇamūle. Alanti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ, kiṃ imināti attho. Na ca paneteti ete āyasmanto
atk-s0404a0:71_8: dīgharattaṃ avaṇṇakāmā hutvā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantāpi abbhācikkhantā na jiridanti, abbhakkhānassa
atk-s0404a0:71_9: antaṃ na gacchantīti attho. Atha vā lajjanatthe idaṃ jiridantīti padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:73_0: 13. Tatiye aṅgehīti guṇaṅgehi. Tassaṃ disāyaṃ jāto hotīti tassaṃ sindhunadītīradisāyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:73_1: jāto hoti. Aññepi bhadrā assājānīyā tattheva jāyanti. Allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ vāti allatiṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:73_2: vā sukkhatiṇaṃ vā. Nāññe asse ubbejetāti aññe asse na ubbejeti na paharati na ḍaṃsati
atk-s0404a0:73_3: na kalahaṃ karoti. Sāṭheyyānīti saṭhabhāvo. Kūṭeyyānīti kūṭabhāvo. Jimheyyānīti jimhabhāvo.
atk-s0404a0:73_4: Vaṅkeyyānīti vaṅkabhāvā. Iccassa catūhipi padehi asikkhitabhāvova kathito. Vāhīti
atk-s0404a0:73_5: vahanasabhāvo dinnovādapaṭikaro. Yāva jīvitamaraṇapariyādānāti yāva jīvitassa maraṇena
atk-s0404a0:73_6: pariyosānā. Sakkaccaṃ paribhuñjatīti amataṃ viya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjati. Purisathāmenātiādīsu
atk-s0404a0:75_0: 14. Catutthe “pehī”ti vuttoti “gacchā”ti vutto. Piṭṭhito rathaṃ pavattetīti khandhaṭṭhikena
atk-s0404a0:75_1: yugaṃ uppīḷitvā pacchimabhāgena rathaṃ pavaṭṭento osakkati. Pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṃ
atk-s0404a0:75_2: hanatīti dve pacchimapāde ukkhipitvā tehi paharitvā rathakubbaraṃ bhindati. Tidaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0404a0:75_3: bhañjatīti rathassa purato tayo daṇḍakā honti, te bhañjati. Rathīsāya satthiṃ ussajjitvāti
atk-s0404a0:75_4: sīsaṃ nāmetvā yugaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā satthinā rathīsaṃ paharitvā. Ajjhomaddatīti
atk-s0404a0:75_5: dvīhi purimapādehi īsaṃ maddanto tiṭṭhati. Ubbaṭumaṃ rathaṃ karotīti thalaṃ vā kaṇḍakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:75_6: vā rathaṃ āropeti. Anādiyitvāti amanasikatvā agaṇitvā. Mukhādhānanti mukhaṭhapanatthāya
atk-s0404a0:75_7: dinnaṃ ayasaṅkhalikaṃ. Khīlaṭṭhāyīti cattāro pāde thambhe viya niccalaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0404a0:75_8: khīlaṭṭhānasadisena ṭhānena tiṭṭhati. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:77_0: 15. Pañcame asajjhāyamalāti uggahitamantānaṃ asajjhāyakaraṇaṃ malaṃ nāma hoti. Anuṭṭhānamalā
atk-s0404a0:77_1: gharāti uṭṭhānavīriyābhāvo gharānaṃ malaṃ nāma. Vaṇṇassāti sarīravaṇṇassa. Rakkhatoti
atk-s0404a0:77_2: yaṃkiñci attano santakaṃ rakkhantassa. Avijjā paramaṃ malanti tato sesākusaladhammamalato
atk-s0404a0:77_3: aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtā vaṭṭamūlasaṅkhātā bahalandhakāraavijjā paramaṃ malaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:77_4: Tato hi malataraṃ nāma natthi. Imasmimpi sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:79_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe dūteyyanti dūtakammaṃ. Gantumarahatīti taṃ dūteyyasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ dhāretvā
atk-s0404a0:79_1: harituṃ arahati. Sotāti yo taṃ assa sāsanaṃ deti, tassa sotā. Sāvetāti taṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0404a0:79_2: “idaṃ nāma tumhehi vutta”nti paṭisāvetā. Uggahetāti suggahitaṃ katvā uggahetā. Dhāretāti
atk-s0404a0:79_3: sudhāritaṃ katvā dhāretā. Viññāti atthānatthassa atthaṃ jānitā. Viññāpetāti paraṃ
atk-s0404a0:79_4: vijānāpetā. Sahitā sahitassāti idaṃ sahitaṃ, idaṃ asahitanti evaṃ sahitāsahitassa
atk-s0404a0:79_5: kusalo, upagatānupagatesu cheko sāsanaṃ ārocento sahitaṃ sallakkhetvā āroceti. Na
atk-s0404a0:79_6: byathatīti vedhati na chambhati. Asandiddhanti nissandehaṃ vigatasaṃsayaṃ. Pucchitoti
atk-s0404a0:81: 17-18. Sattame ruṇṇenāti ruditena. Ākappenāti nivāsanapārupanādinā vidhānena. Vanabhaṅgenāti vanato bhañjitvā āhaṭena pupphaphalādipaṇṇākārena. Aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0404a0:83_0: 19. Navame pahārādoti evaṃnāmako. Asurindoti asurajeṭṭhako. Asuresu hi vepacitti
atk-s0404a0:83_1: rāhu pahārādoti ime tayo jeṭṭhakā. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti dasabalassa abhisambuddhadivasato
atk-s0404a0:83_2: paṭṭhāya “ajja gamissāmi sve gamissāmī”ti ekādasa vassāni atikkamitvā dvādasame vasse
atk-s0404a0:83_3: satthu verañjāyaṃ vasanakāle “sammāsambuddhassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0404a0:83_4: “mama ‘ajja sve’ti dvādasa vassāni jātāni, handāhaṃ idāneva gacchāmī”ti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva
atk-s0404a0:83_5: asuragaṇaparivuto asurabhavanā nikkhamitvā divā divassa yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0404a0:83_6: ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti so kira “tathāgataṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā eva dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti
atk-s0404a0:83_7: āgato, tathāgatassa pana diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya buddhagāravena pucchituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0404a0:83_8: api satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Tato satthā cintesi – “ayaṃ pahārādo mayi
atk-s0404a0:83_9: akathente paṭhamataraṃ kathetuṃ na sakkhissati, ciṇṇavasiṭṭhāneyeva naṃ kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:84_0: Atha naṃ pucchanto api pana pahārādātiādimāha. Tattha abhiramantīti ratiṃ vindanti,
atk-s0404a0:84_1: anukkaṇṭhamānā vasantīti attho. So “pariciṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva maṃ bhagavā pucchatī”ti attamano
atk-s0404a0:84_2: hutvā abhiramanti, bhanteti āha. Anupubbaninnotiādīni sabbāni anupaṭipāṭiyā ninnabhāvassa
atk-s0404a0:84_3: vevacanāni. Na āyatakeneva papātoti na chinnataṭamahāsobbho viya āditova papāto.
atk-s0404a0:84_5: gambhīro hutvā gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro hutvā ṭhitoti dasseti.
atk-s0404a0:85: Ṭhitadhammoti ṭhitasabhāvo. Kuṇapenāti yena kenaci hatthiassādīnaṃ kaḷevarena. Thalaṃ ussāretīti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcipahāreneva thalaṃ khipati.
atk-s0404a0:86_0: Gaṅgāyamunāti idha ṭhatvā imāsaṃ nadīnaṃ uppattikathaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ayaṃ tāva
atk-s0404a0:86_1: jambudīpo dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo, tattha catusahassayojanaparimāṇo padeso udakena
atk-s0404a0:86_2: ajjhotthaṭo mahāsamuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato, tisahassayojanappamāṇe manussā vasanti, tisahassayojanappamāṇe
atk-s0404a0:86_3: himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītikūṭasahassapaṭimaṇḍito samantato
atk-s0404a0:86_4: sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto, yattha āyāmavitthārena ca gambhīrato ca paṇṇāsapaṇṇāsayojanā
atk-s0404a0:86_6: kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho sīhappapātadahoti satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0404a0:87_0: Tesu anotatto sudassanakūṭaṃ cittakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti
atk-s0404a0:87_1: imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto. Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:87_2: antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati, cittakūṭaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:87_3: kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ, gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṃ, mūlagandho
atk-s0404a0:87_4: sāragandho pheggugandho tacagandho papaṭikāgandho rasagandho pattagandho pupphagandho
atk-s0404a0:87_5: phalagandho gandhagandhoti imehi dasahi gandhehi ussannaṃ, nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ
atk-s0404a0:87_6: kāḷapakkhauposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati, kelāsakūṭaṃ rajatamayaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:87_7: Sabbāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. Tāni
atk-s0404a0:87_8: sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca vassanti, nadiyo cetesu sandanti. Taṃ sabbampi
atk-s0404a0:87_9: udakaṃ anotattameva pavisati. Candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena
atk-s0404a0:87_10: tattha obhāsaṃ karonti, ujuṃ gacchantā na karonti. Tenevassa anotatto tisaṅkhā udapādi.
atk-s0404a0:88_1: supaṭiyattāni honti, yesu buddhā khīṇāsavā ca paccekabuddhā ca iddhimantā ca isayo
atk-s0404a0:89_0: Tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ, hatthimukhaṃ, assamukhaṃ, usabhamukhanti cattāri
atk-s0404a0:89_1: mukhāni honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. Sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre sīhā bahutarā
atk-s0404a0:89_2: honti, hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:89_3: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ
atk-s0404a0:89_4: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi
atk-s0404a0:89_5: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva ca amanussapathaṃ
atk-s0404a0:89_6: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. Dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0404a0:89_7: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā uttarena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ
atk-s0404a0:89_8: paharitvā uṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni
atk-s0404a0:89_9: gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno. Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā
atk-s0404a0:89_10: tiyaggaḷā nāma mahāpokkharaṇī jātā, pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0404a0:89_11: saṭṭhi yojanāni gatā. Tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā ummaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā
atk-s0404a0:89_12: giñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañca dhārā
atk-s0404a0:89_13: hutvā pavattati. Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne āvattagaṅgāti
atk-s0404a0:89_14: vuccati. Ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne kaṇhagaṅgā, ākāsena saṭṭhi
atk-s0404a0:89_15: yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ākāsagaṅgā, tiyaggaḷapāsāṇe paññāsayojanokāse ṭhitā tiyaggaḷapokkharaṇī,
atk-s0404a0:89_16: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne bahalagaṅgāti, umaṅgena
atk-s0404a0:89_17: saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne umaṅgagaṅgāti vuccati. Viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ
atk-s0404a0:89_18: paharitvā pañca dhārā hutvā pavattanaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū,
atk-s0404a0:89_19: mahīti pañca saṅkhaṃ gatā. Evametā pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pavattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:90_0: Savantiyoti yā kāci savamānā gacchantī mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā. Appentīti allīyanti
atk-s0404a0:90_1: osaranti. Dhārāti vuṭṭhidhārā. Pūrattanti puṇṇabhāvo. Mahāsamuddassa hi ayaṃ dhammatā
atk-s0404a0:90_2: – “imasmiṃ kāle devo mando jāto, jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmā”ti
atk-s0404a0:90_3: vā “imasmiṃ kāle mahantā vuṭṭhi, labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna”nti vā vattuṃ
atk-s0404a0:90_4: na sakkā. Paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi yaṃ sinerumekhalaṃ āhacca udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:90_5: tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā osīdati, na uddhaṃ uttarati. Ekarasoti asambhinnaraso.
atk-s0404a0:91_0: Muttāti khuddakamahantavaṭṭadīghādibhedā anekavidhā. Maṇīti rattanīlādibhedo anekavidho.
atk-s0404a0:91_2: anekavidho. Silāti setakāḷamuggavaṇṇādibhedo anekavidhā. Pavāḷanti khuddakamahantarattaghanarattādibhedaṃ
atk-s0404a0:91_3: anekavidhaṃ. Masāragallanti kabaramaṇi. Nāgāti ūmipiṭṭhavāsinopi vimānaṭṭhakā nāgāpi.
atk-s0404a0:92_0: Aṭṭha pahārādāti satthā aṭṭhapi dhamme vattuṃ sakkoti, soḷasapi bāttiṃsapi catusaṭṭhipi
atk-s0404a0:92_1: sahassampi, pahārādena pana aṭṭha kathitā, ahampi teheva sarikkhake katvā kathessāmīti
atk-s0404a0:92_2: cintetvā evamāha. Anupubbasikkhātiādīsu anupubbasikkhāya tisso sikkhā gahitā, anupubbakiriyāya
atk-s0404a0:92_3: terasa dhutaṅgāni, anupubbapaṭipadāya satta anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa
atk-s0404a0:92_4: ārammaṇavibhattiyo sattatiṃsa bodhapakkhiyadhammā. Na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedhoti
atk-s0404a0:92_5: maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova sīlapūraṇādiṃ akatvā arahattappaṭivedho
atk-s0404a0:92_6: nāma natthi, paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo pūretvāva sakkā arahattaṃ pattunti attho.
atk-s0404a0:93_0: Ārakāvāti dūreyeva. Na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vāti asaṅkhyeyyepi
atk-s0404a0:93_1: kappe buddhesu anuppannesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkoti, tadāpi “tucchā nibbānadhātū”ti
atk-s0404a0:93_2: na sakkā vattuṃ. Buddhakāle ca pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ
atk-s0404a0:93_3: ārādhenti, tadāpi na sakkā vattuṃ – “pūrā nibbānadhātū”ti.
atk-s0404a0:95_0: 20. Dasame nisinno hotīti uposathakaraṇatthāya upāsikāya ratanapāsāde nisinno. Nisajja
atk-s0404a0:95_1: pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale
atk-s0404a0:95_2: nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi, sattadhā tassa muddhā phalissatī”ti tassa anukampāya
atk-s0404a0:95_3: tuṇhīyeva ahosi. Abhikkantāti atikkantā parikkhīṇā. Uddhaste aruṇeti uggate aruṇasīse.
atk-s0404a0:95_4: Nandimukhiyāti tuṭṭhamukhiyā. Aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisāti “asukapuggalo aparisuddho”ti
atk-s0404a0:95_5: avatvā “aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā”ti āha. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:97_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame paññatte āsane nisīdīti tassa kira ghare pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:97_1: pañca āsanasatāni niccaṃ paññattāneva honti, tesu aññatarasmiṃ āsane nisīdi. Taṃ
atk-s0404a0:97_2: suṇāhīti te suṇāhi, taṃ vā aṭṭhavidhaṃ acchariyadhammaṃ suṇāhi. Cittaṃ pasīdīti “buddho
atk-s0404a0:97_3: nu kho na buddho nu kho”ti vitakkamattampi na uppajji, ayameva buddhoti cittuppādo
atk-s0404a0:97_4: pasanno anāvilo ahosi. Sakāni vā ñātikulānīti attano yāpanamattaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0404a0:97_5: ñātigharāni gacchatu. Kassa vo dammīti katarapurisassa tumhe dadāmi, ārocetha me
atk-s0404a0:97_6: attano adhippāyaṃ. Appaṭivibhattāti “ettakaṃ dassāmi ettakaṃ na dassāmi, idaṃ dassāmi
atk-s0404a0:97_7: idaṃ na dassāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādentena hi paṭivibhattā nāma hoti, mayhaṃ pana na evaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:97_8: Atha kho saṅghikā viya gaṇasantakā viya ca sīlavantehi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇāyeva. Sakkaccaṃyeva
atk-s0404a0:98_0: Anacchariyaṃ kho pana maṃ, bhanteti, bhante, yaṃ maṃ devatā upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ ārocenti,
atk-s0404a0:98_1: idaṃ na acchariyaṃ. Yaṃ panāhaṃ tatonidānaṃ cittassa uṇṇatiṃ nābhijānāmi, taṃ eva
atk-s0404a0:98_2: acchariyanti vadati. Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhūti ettha kiñcāpi bhikkhuṃ āmanteti, upāsakasseva
atk-s0404a0:100_0: 22. Dutiye nāgavaneti tassa kira seṭṭhino nāgavanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ, so tattha purebhattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:100_1: gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷitukāmo gantvā paricāriyamāno bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0404a0:100_2: addasa. Saha dassanenevassa purimanayeneva cittaṃ pasīdi, surāpānena ca uppannamando
atk-s0404a0:100_3: taṅkhaṇaṃyeva pahīyi. Taṃ sandhāyevamāha. Oṇojesinti udakaṃ hatthe pātetvā adāsiṃ.
atk-s0404a0:100_4: Asukoti amuko. Samacittova demīti “imassa thokaṃ, imassa bahuka”nti evaṃ cittanānattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:100_5: na karomi, deyyadhammaṃ pana ekasadisaṃ karomīti dasseti. Ārocentīti ākāse ṭhatvā
atk-s0404a0:100_6: ārocenti. Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti iminā upāsako attano anāgāmiphalaṃ byākaroti.
atk-s0404a0:102_0: 23. Tatiye hatthako āḷavakoti bhagavatā āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā
atk-s0404a0:102_1: hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro. Sīlavāti pañcasīladasasīlena sīlavā. Cāgavāti cāgasampanno.
atk-s0404a0:102_2: Kaccittha, bhanteti, bhante, kacci ettha bhagavato byākaraṇaṭṭhāne. Appicchoti adhigamappicchatāya appiccho.
atk-s0404a0:104_1: pañcahi satehi parivuto bhuttapātarāso gandhamālavilepenacuṇṇāni gahetvā yena bhagavā
atk-s0404a0:104_2: tenupasaṅkami. Saṅgahavatthūnīti saṅgaṇhanakāraṇāni. Tehāhanti tehi ahaṃ. Taṃ dānena
atk-s0404a0:104_3: saṅgaṇhāmīti naṅgalabalibaddabhattabījādīni ceva gandhamālamūlādīni ca datvā saṅgaṇhāmi.
atk-s0404a0:104_4: Peyyavajjenāti amma, tāta, bhātara, bhaginītiādikena kaṇṇasukhena mudukena piyavacanena
atk-s0404a0:104_5: saṅgaṇhāmi. Atthacariyāyāti “imassa dānena vā piyavacanena vā kiccaṃ natthi, atthacariyāya
atk-s0404a0:104_7: saṅgaṇhāmi. Samānattatāyāti “imassa dānādīhi kiccaṃ natthi, samānattatāya saṅgaṇhitabbo
atk-s0404a0:104_8: aya”nti ekato khādanapivananisajjādīhi attanā samānaṃ katvā saṅgaṇhāmi. Daliddassa
atk-s0404a0:104_9: kho no tathā sotabbaṃ maññantīti daliddassa kiñci dātuṃ vā kātuṃ vā asakkontassa,
atk-s0404a0:104_10: yathā daliddassa no tathā sotabbaṃ maññanti, mama pana sotabbaṃ maññanti, dinnovāde
atk-s0404a0:104_11: tiṭṭhanti, na me anusāsaniṃ atikkamitabbaṃ maññanti. Yoni kho tyāyanti upāyo kho
atk-s0404a0:104_12: te ayaṃ. Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu satthārā sīlacāgapaññā missakā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:106: 25-26. Pañcame atthūpaparikkhitā hotīti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitā hoti. Chaṭṭhe saddhāsīlacāgā missakā kathitā.
atk-s0404a0:108_0: 27. Sattame ujjhattibalāti ujjhānabalā. Bālānañhi “yaṃ asuko idañcidañca āha, maṃ
atk-s0404a0:108_1: so āha, na añña”nti evaṃ ujjhānameva balaṃ. Nijjhattibalāti “na idaṃ evaṃ, evaṃ nāmeta”nti
atk-s0404a0:108_2: atthānatthanijjhāpanaṃyeva balaṃ. Paṭisaṅkhānabalāti paccavekkhaṇabalā. Khantibalāti adhivāsanabalā.
atk-s0404a0:110_0: 28. Aṭṭhame balānīti ñāṇabalāni. Āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānātīti arahattaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0404a0:110_1: Aniccatoti hutvā abhāvākārena. Yathābhūtanti yathāsabhāvato. Sammappaññāyāti sahavipassanāya
atk-s0404a0:110_2: maggapaññāya. Aṅgārakāsūpamāti santāpanaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsuyā upamitā ime kāmāti. Vivekaninnanti
atk-s0404a0:110_3: phalasamāpattivasena nibbānaninnaṃ. Vivekaṭṭhanti kilesehi vajjitaṃ dūrībhūtaṃ vā.
atk-s0404a0:110_5: anallīnaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ visaṃsaṭṭhaṃ. Āsavaṭṭhāniyehīti sampayogavasena āsavānaṃ kāraṇabhūtehi,
atk-s0404a0:110_6: kilesadhammehīti attho. Atha vā byantibhūtanti vigatavāyanti attho. Kuto? Sabbaso
atk-s0404a0:110_7: āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi, sabbehi tebhūmakadhammehīti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte ariyamaggo
atk-s0404a0:112_0: 29. Navame khaṇe kiccāni karotīti khaṇakicco, okāsaṃ labhitvāva kiccāni karotīti
atk-s0404a0:112_1: attho. Dhammoti catusaccadhammo. Opasamikoti kilesūpasamāvaho. Parinibbāyikoti kilesaparinibbānakaro.
atk-s0404a0:112_2: Catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sambodhiṃ gacchati sampāpuṇātīti sambodhagāmī. Dīghāyukaṃ
atk-s0404a0:112_3: devanikāyanti idaṃ asaññaṃ devanikāyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aviññātāresūti ativiya aviññūsu.
atk-s0404a0:113_0: Suppavediteti sukathite. Antarāyikāti antarāyakarā. Khaṇo ve mā upaccagāti ayaṃ laddho
atk-s0404a0:113_1: khaṇo mā atikkami. Idha ceva naṃ virādhetīti sace koci pamattacārī idha imaṃ khaṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:113_2: labhitvāpi saddhammassa niyāmataṃ ariyamaggaṃ virādheti na sampādeti. Atītatthoti
atk-s0404a0:113_3: hāpitattho. Cirattaṃ anutapissatīti cirarattaṃ socissati. Yathā hi “asukaṭṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0404a0:113_4: samuppanna”nti sutvā eko vāṇijo na gaccheyya, aññe gantvā gaṇheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ aṭṭhaguṇampi
atk-s0404a0:113_5: dasaguṇampi bhaveyya. Atha itaro “mama attho atikkanto”ti anutapeyya, evaṃ yo idha
atk-s0404a0:113_6: khaṇaṃ labhitvā appaṭipajjanto saddhammassa niyāmataṃ virādheti, so ayaṃ vāṇijova
atk-s0404a0:113_7: atītattho ciraṃ anutapissati socissati. Kiñca bhiyyo avijjānivutoti tathā. Paccavidunti
atk-s0404a0:113_8: paṭivijjhiṃsu. Saṃvarāti sīlasaṃvarā. Māradheyyaparānugeti māradheyyasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ
atk-s0404a0:113_9: anugate. Pāraṅgatāti nibbānaṃ gatā. Ye pattā āsavakkhayanti ye arahattaṃ pattā. Evamidha
atk-s0404a0:115_0: 30. Dasame cetīsūti cetināmakānaṃ rājūnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānattā evaṃladdhavohāre raṭṭhe.
atk-s0404a0:115_1: Pācīnavaṃsadāyeti dasabalassa vasanaṭṭhānato pācīnadisāya ṭhite vaṃsadāye nīlobhāsehi
atk-s0404a0:115_2: veḷūhi sañchanne araññe. Evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādīti thero kira pabbajitvā
atk-s0404a0:115_4: uppādesi. So sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ gantvā evamāha – “idhāhaṃ, āvuso sāriputta,
atk-s0404a0:115_5: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassalokaṃ olokemi. Āraddhaṃ kho
atk-s0404a0:115_6: pana me vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ
atk-s0404a0:115_7: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ. Atha ca pana me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na vimuccatī”ti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0404a0:115_8: thero āha – “yaṃ kho te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṃ hoti ‘ahaṃ dibbena cakkhunā…pe… olokemī’ti,
atk-s0404a0:115_9: idaṃ te mānasmiṃ. Yampi te, āvuso, anuruddha evaṃ hoti ‘āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ…pe…
atk-s0404a0:115_10: ekagga’nti, idaṃ te uddhaccasmiṃ. Yampi te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṃ hoti ‘atha ca pana
atk-s0404a0:115_11: me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na vimuccatī’ti, idaṃ te kukkuccasmiṃ. Sādhu vatāyasmā
atk-s0404a0:115_12: anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:115_13: upasaṃharatū”ti evamassa thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0404a0:115_14: āpucchitvā cetiraṭṭhaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto aṭṭhamāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmesi.
atk-s0404a0:115_15: So padhānaveganimmathitattā kilantakāyo ekassa veḷugumbassa heṭṭhā nisīdi. Athassāyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:115_16: evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi, esa mahāpurisavitakko uppajjīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:116_0: Appicchassāti ettha paccayappiccho, adhigamappiccho, pariyattiappiccho, dhutaṅgappicchoti
atk-s0404a0:116_1: cattāro appicchā. Tattha paccayappiccho bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhāti, appaṃ dente appataraṃ
atk-s0404a0:116_2: gaṇhāti, na anavasesaggāhī hoti. Adhigamappiccho majjhantikatthero viya attano adhigamaṃ
atk-s0404a0:116_3: aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti. Pariyattiappiccho tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo
atk-s0404a0:116_4: hoti sāketatissatthero viya. Dhutaṅgappiccho dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ
atk-s0404a0:116_5: na deti dvebhātikattheresu jeṭṭhatthero viya. Vatthu visuddhimagge kathitaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:116_6: dhammoti evaṃ santaguṇaniguhanena ca paṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya ca appicchassa puggalassa
atk-s0404a0:116_7: ayaṃ navalokuttaradhammo sampajjati, no mahicchassa. Evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:117_0: Santuṭṭhassāti catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭhassa. Pavivittassāti kāyacittaupadhivivekehi
atk-s0404a0:117_1: vivittassa. Tattha kāyaviveko nāma gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā ārambhavatthuvasena ekībhāvo.
atk-s0404a0:117_2: Ekībhāvamatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0404a0:117_3: nibbatteti, ayaṃ cittaviveko nāma. Samāpattimatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti jhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:117_4: pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0404a0:117_5: upadhiviveko nāma. Tenāha bhagavā – “kāyaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:117_6: cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ, upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:118_0: Saṅgaṇikārāmassāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca ratassa. Āraddhavīriyassāti
atk-s0404a0:118_2: upaṭṭhitassatissa. Samāhitassāti ekaggacittassa. Paññavatoti kammassakatapaññāya paññavato.
atk-s0404a0:119_0: Sādhu sādhūti therassa vitakkaṃ sampahaṃsento evamāha. Imaṃ aṭṭhamanti satta nidhī
atk-s0404a0:119_1: laddhapurisassa aṭṭhamaṃ dento viya, satta maṇiratanāni, satta hatthiratanāni, satta
atk-s0404a0:119_2: assaratanāni laddhapurisassa aṭṭhamaṃ dento viya satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakketvā
atk-s0404a0:119_3: ṭhitassa aṭṭhamaṃ ācikkhanto evamāha. Nippapañcārāmassāti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcarahitattā
atk-s0404a0:119_4: nippapañcasaṅkhāte nibbānapade abhiratassa. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Papañcārāmassāti
atk-s0404a0:119_5: yathāvuttesu papañcesu abhiratassa. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:120_0: Yatoti yadā. Tatoti tadā. Nānārattānanti nilapītalohitodātavaṇṇehi nānārajanehi rattānaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:120_1: Paṃsukūlanti tevīsatiyā khettesu ṭhitapaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ. Khāyissatīti yathā tassa
atk-s0404a0:120_2: pubbaṇhasamayādīsu yasmiṃ samaye yaṃ icchati, tasmiṃ samaye taṃ pārupantassa so dussakaraṇḍako
atk-s0404a0:120_3: manāpo hutvā khāyati, evaṃ tuyhampi cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsena tuṭṭhassa viharato
atk-s0404a0:120_4: paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ khāyissati upaṭṭhahissati. Ratiyāti ratiatthāya. Aparitassāyāti
atk-s0404a0:121_0: Piṇḍiyālopabhojananti gāmanigamarājadhānīsu jaṅghābalaṃ nissāya gharapaṭipāṭiyā carantena
atk-s0404a0:121_1: laddhapiṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ. Khāyissatīti tassa gahapatino nānaggarasabhojanaṃ viya
atk-s0404a0:121_3: viharato. Rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ khāyissatīti tassa gahapatino tebhūmakapāsāde gandhakusumavāsasugandhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:121_4: kūṭāgāraṃ viya rukkhamūlaṃ upaṭṭhahissati. Santuṭṭhassāti senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsena
atk-s0404a0:121_5: santuṭṭhassa. Tiṇasanthārakoti tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā bhūmiyaṃ vā phalakapāsāṇatalāni
atk-s0404a0:121_6: vā aññatarasmiṃ santhatasanthato. Pūtimuttanti yaṃkiñci muttaṃ. Taṅkhaṇe gahitampi
atk-s0404a0:121_7: pūtimuttameva vuccati duggandhattā. Santuṭṭhassa viharatoti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārasantosena
atk-s0404a0:122_0: Iti bhagavā catūsu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pakkhipanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā “katarasenāsane
atk-s0404a0:122_1: nu kho vasantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “tasmiññeva vasantassā”ti
atk-s0404a0:122_2: ñatvā tena hi tvaṃ, anuruddhātiādimāha. Pavivittassa viharatoti tīhi vivekehi vivittassa
atk-s0404a0:122_3: viharantassa. Uyyojanikapaṭisaṃyuttanti uyyojanikeheva vacanehi paṭisaṃyuttaṃ, tesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:122_4: upaṭṭhānagamanakaṃyevāti attho. Papañcanirodheti nibbānapade. Pakkhandatīti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
atk-s0404a0:122_6: Iti bhagavā cetiraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāye āyasmato anuruddhassa kathite aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakke
atk-s0404a0:122_7: puna bhesakaḷāvanamahāvihāre nisīditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa vitthārena kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:123_0: Manomayenāti manena nibbattitakāyopi manomayoti vuccati manena gatakāyopi, idha manena
atk-s0404a0:123_1: gatakāyaṃ sandhāyevamāha. Yathā me ahu saṅkappoti yathā mayhaṃ vitakko ahosi, tato
atk-s0404a0:123_2: uttari aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ dassento tato uttariṃ desayi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:125_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame āsajja dānaṃ detīti patvā dānaṃ deti. Āgataṃ disvā taṃ muhuttaṃyeva
atk-s0404a0:125_1: nisīdāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti, dassāmīti na kilameti. Bhayāti “ayaṃ adāyako
atk-s0404a0:125_2: akārako”ti garahabhayā, apāyabhayā vā. Adāsi meti mayhaṃ pubbe esa idaṃ nāma adāsīti
atk-s0404a0:125_3: deti. Dassati meti anāgate idaṃ nāma dassatīti deti. Sāhu dānanti dānaṃ nāma sādhu
atk-s0404a0:125_4: sundaraṃ buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi pasatthanti deti. Cittālaṅkāracittaparikkhāratthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:125_5: dānaṃ detīti samathavipassanācittassa alaṅkāratthañceva parikkhāratthañca deti. Dānañhi
atk-s0404a0:125_6: cittaṃ muduṃ karoti. Yena laddho, so “laddhaṃ me”ti muducitto hoti. Yena dinnaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:125_7: sopi “dinnaṃ mayā”ti muducitto hoti. Iti ubhinnaṃ cittaṃ muduṃ karoti. Teneva “adantadamana”nti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0404a0:128: Imesu pana aṭṭhasu dānesu cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamanti.
atk-s0404a0:130: 32. Dutiye saddhāti yāya saddhāya dānaṃ deti, sā saddhā. Hiriyanti yāya hiriyā dānaṃ deti, sāva adhippetā. Kusalañca dānanti anavajjañca dānaṃ. Diviyanti divaṅgamaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:132_0: 33. Tatiye dānavatthūnīti dānakāraṇāni. Chandā dānaṃ detīti pemena dānaṃ deti. Dosāti
atk-s0404a0:132_1: dosena kuddho hutvā yaṃ atthi, taṃ vegena gaṇhitvā deti. Mohāti mohena mūḷho deti.
atk-s0404a0:132_2: Bhayāti garahabhayena vā apāyabhayena vā, tassa tasseva vā pana bhayena deti. Kulavaṃsanti kulapaveṇiṃ.
atk-s0404a0:134_0: 34. Catutthe na mahapphalaṃ hotīti dhaññaphalena mahapphalaṃ na hoti. Na mahassādanti
atk-s0404a0:134_1: yampissa phalaṃ hoti, tassa assādo na mahā hoti mandassādaṃ na madhuraṃ. Na phātiseyyanti
atk-s0404a0:134_2: seyyāpissa na hoti vuḍḍhi, tassa mahantaṃ vīhithambhasannivesaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:134_3: Unnāmaninnāmīti thalaninnavasena visamatalaṃ. Tattha thale udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti, ninne
atk-s0404a0:134_4: atibahu tiṭṭhati. Pāsāṇasakkharikanti pattharitvā ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇehi ca khuddakapāsāṇehi
atk-s0404a0:134_5: ca sakkharāhi ca samannāgataṃ. Ūsaranti ubbhinnaloṇaṃ. Na ca gambhīrasitanti thaddhabhūmitāya
atk-s0404a0:134_6: gambhīrānugataṃ, naṅgalamaggaṃ katvā kasituṃ na sakkā hoti, uttānanaṅgalamaggameva
atk-s0404a0:134_7: hoti. Na āyasampannanti na udakāgamanasampannaṃ. Na apāyasampannanti pacchābhāge
atk-s0404a0:134_8: udakaniggamanamaggasampannaṃ na hoti. Na mātikāsampannanti na khuddakamahantīhi udakamātikāhi
atk-s0404a0:134_9: sampannaṃ hoti. Na mariyādasampannanti na kedāramariyādāhi sampannaṃ. Na mahapphalantiādīni
atk-s0404a0:135_0: Sampanneti paripuṇṇe sampattiyutte. Pavuttā bījasampadāti sampannaṃ bījaṃ ropitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:135_1: Deve sampādayantamhīti deve sammā vassante. Anītisampadā hotīti kīṭakimiādipāṇakaītiyā
atk-s0404a0:135_2: abhāvo ekā sampadā hoti. Virūḷhīti vaḍḍhi dutiyā sampadā hoti. Vepullanti vipulabhāvo
atk-s0404a0:135_3: tatiyā sampadā hoti. Phalanti paripuṇṇaphalaṃ catutthī sampadā hoti. Sampannasīlesūti
atk-s0404a0:135_4: paripuṇṇasīlesu. Bhojanasampadāti sampannaṃ vividhabhojanaṃ. Sampadānanti tividhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:135_5: kusalasampadaṃ. Upanetīti sā bhojanasampadā upanayati. Kasmā? Sampannañhissa taṃ
atk-s0404a0:135_6: kataṃ, yasmāssa taṃ katakammaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇanti attho. Sampannatthūdhāti sampanno
atk-s0404a0:135_7: atthu idha. Vijjācaraṇasampannoti tīhi vijjāhi ca pañcadasahi caraṇadhammehi ca samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:135_8: Laddhāti evarūpo puggalo cittassa sampadaṃ avekallaparipuṇṇabhāvaṃ labhitvā. Karoti
atk-s0404a0:135_9: kammasampadanti paripuṇṇakammaṃ karoti. Labhati catthasampadanti atthañca paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:135_10: labhati. Diṭṭhisampadanti vipassanādiṭṭhiṃ. Maggasampadanti sotāpattimaggaṃ. Yāti
atk-s0404a0:135_11: sampannamānasoti paripuṇṇacitto hutvā arahattaṃ yāti. Sā hoti sabbasampadāti sā sabbadukkhehi
atk-s0404a0:137_0: 35. Pañcame dānūpapattiyoti dānapaccayā upapattiyo. Dahatīti ṭhapeti. Adhiṭṭhātīti
atk-s0404a0:137_1: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Bhāvetīti vaḍḍheti. Hīne vimuttanti hīnesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0404a0:137_2: vimuttaṃ. Uttari abhāvitanti tato uttarimaggaphalatthāya abhāvitaṃ. Tatrūpapattiyā
atk-s0404a0:137_3: saṃvattatīti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā kusalaṃ kataṃ, tattha nibbattanatthāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0404a0:137_4: Vītarāgassāti maggena vā samucchinnarāgassa samāpattiyā vā vikkhambhitarāgassa. Dānamatteneva
atk-s0404a0:137_5: hi brahmaloke nibbattituṃ na sakkā, dānaṃ pana samādhivipassanācittassa alaṅkāraparivāraṃ
atk-s0404a0:137_6: hoti. Tato dānena muducitto brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbattati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0404a0:139_0: 36. Chaṭṭhe puññakiriyāni ca tāni tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni.
atk-s0404a0:139_1: Dānādīnañhi lakkhaṇe cittaṃ ṭhapetvā “evarūpaṃ nāma amhehi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, sīlaṃ
atk-s0404a0:139_2: rakkhitabbaṃ, bhāvanā bhāvetabbā”ti sattā puññāni karonti. Dānameva dānamayaṃ, dānacetanāsu
atk-s0404a0:139_3: vā purimacetanāto nipphannā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā dānamayaṃ sīlādīhi sīlamayādīni viya.
atk-s0404a0:139_4: Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. Parittaṃ kataṃ hotīti thokaṃ mandaṃ kataṃ hoti. Nābhisambhotīti
atk-s0404a0:139_5: na nipphajjati. Akataṃ hotīti bhāvanāyayogoyeva anāraddho hotīti attho. Manussadobhagyanti
atk-s0404a0:139_6: manussesu sampattirahitaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nīcakulaṃ. Upapajjatīti paṭisandhivasena upagacchati,
atk-s0404a0:139_7: tattha nibbattatīti attho. Mattaso katanti pamāṇena kataṃ, thokaṃ na bahu. Manussasobhagyanti
atk-s0404a0:139_8: manussesu subhagabhāvaṃ tividhakulasampattiṃ. Adhimattanti adhikappamāṇaṃ balavaṃ
atk-s0404a0:139_9: vā. Adhigaṇhantīti abhibhavitvā gaṇhanti, visiṭṭhatarā jeṭṭhakā hontīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:141_0: 37. Sattame sucinti parisuddhaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ deti. Paṇītanti rasūpapannaṃ. Kālenāti
atk-s0404a0:141_1: yuttapattakālena. Kappiyanti yaṃ kappiyaṃ, taṃ deti. Viceyya detīti “imassa dinnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:141_2: mahapphalaṃ bhavissati, imassa na mahapphala”nti evaṃ paṭiggāhakapariyesanavasena
atk-s0404a0:141_3: dānaṃ vā paṇidhāyavasena dānaṃ vā vicinitvā deti.
atk-s0404a0:143_0: 38. Aṭṭhame atthāyāti atthatthāya. Hitāya sukhāyāti hitatthāya sukhatthāya. Pubbapetānanti
atk-s0404a0:143_1: paralokagatānaṃ ñātīnaṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte anuppanne buddhe cakkavattirājāno bodhisattā
atk-s0404a0:143_2: paccekabuddhā labbhanti, buddhakāle buddhā ceva buddhasāvakā ca. Yathāvuttānañhi
atk-s0404a0:143_3: etesaṃ atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. Bahunnaṃ vata atthāya, sappañño gharamāvasanti
atk-s0404a0:143_4: sappañño ghare vasanto bahūnaṃ vata atthāya hoti. Pubbeti paṭhameva. Pubbekatamanussaranti
atk-s0404a0:143_5: mātāpitūnaṃ pubbakāraguṇe anussaranto. Sahadhammenāti sakāraṇena paccayapūjanena
atk-s0404a0:143_6: pūjeti. Apace brahmacārayoti brahmacārino apacayati, nīcavuttitaṃ nesaṃ āpajjati. Pesaloti piyasīlo.
atk-s0404a0:145: 39. Navame dānānīti cetanādānāni. Aggaññānītiādīnaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0404a0:147_0: 40. Dasame pāṇātipātoti pāṇātipātacetanā. Sabbalahusoti sabbalahuko. Appāyukasaṃvattanikoti
atk-s0404a0:147_1: tena parittakena kammavipākena appāyuko hoti, dinnamattāya vā paṭisandhiyā vilīyati
atk-s0404a0:147_2: mātukucchito nikkhantamatte vā. Evarūpo hi na aññassa kassaci nissando, pāṇātipātasseva
atk-s0404a0:147_3: gatamaggo esoti. Bhogabyasanasaṃvattanikoti yathā kākaṇikāmattampi hatthe na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0404a0:147_4: evaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ saṃvatteti. Sapattaverasaṃvattaniko hotīti saha sapattehi veraṃ
atk-s0404a0:147_5: saṃvatteti. Tassa hi sapattā ca bahukā honti. Yo ca naṃ passati, tasmiṃ verameva
atk-s0404a0:147_6: uppādeti na nibbāyati. Evarūpo hi parassa rakkhitagopitabhaṇḍe aparādhassa nissando.
atk-s0404a0:148_0: Abhūtabbhakkhānasaṃvattaniko hotīti abhūtena abbhakkhānaṃ saṃvatteti, yena kenaci
atk-s0404a0:148_1: kataṃ tasseva upari patati. Mittehi bhedanasaṃvattanikoti mittehi bhedaṃ saṃvatteti.
atk-s0404a0:148_2: Yaṃ yaṃ mittaṃ karoti, so so bhijjatiyeva. Amanāpasaddasaṃvattanikoti amanāpasaddaṃ
atk-s0404a0:148_3: saṃvatteti. Yā sā vācā kaṇṭakā kakkasā kaṭukā abhisajjanī mammacchedikā, gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0404a0:148_4: tameva suṇāti, manāpasaddasavanaṃ nāma na labhati. Evarūpo pharusavācāya gatamaggo
atk-s0404a0:148_5: nāma. Anādeyyavācāsaṃvattanikoti aggahetabbavacanataṃ saṃvatteti, “tvaṃ kasmā kathesi,
atk-s0404a0:148_6: ko hi tava vacanaṃ gahessatī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Ayaṃ samphappalāpassa gatamaggo.
atk-s0404a0:148_7: Ummattakasaṃvattaniko hotīti ummattakabhāvaṃ saṃvatteti. Tena hi manusso ummatto
atk-s0404a0:148_8: vā khittacitto vā eḷamūgo vā hoti. Ayaṃ surāpānassa nissando. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0404a0:150_0: 44. Pañcamassa catutthe ime cepi, vāseṭṭha, mahāsālāti purato ṭhite dve sālarukkhe
atk-s0404a0:150_1: dassento parikappopamaṃ āha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ime tāva mahāsālā acetanā. Sace etepi
atk-s0404a0:150_2: sacetanā hutvā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavaseyyuṃ, etesampi so uposathavāso
atk-s0404a0:150_3: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assa. Bhūte pana vattabbameva natthīti.
atk-s0404a0:152_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe yenāyasmā anuruddhoti tā kira devatā attano sampattiṃ oloketvā “kiṃ nu
atk-s0404a0:152_1: kho nissāya ayaṃ sampatti amhehi laddhā”ti āvajjamānā theraṃ disvā “mayaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0404a0:152_2: ayyassa pubbe cakkavattirajjaṃ karontassa pādaparicārikā hutvā tena dinnovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0404a0:152_3: imaṃ sampattiṃ labhimha, gacchāma theraṃ ānetvā imaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavissāmā”ti divā
atk-s0404a0:152_4: yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. Tīsu ṭhānesūti tīsu kāraṇesu. Ṭhānaso paṭilabhāmāti
atk-s0404a0:152_5: khaṇeneva labhāma. Saranti vacanasaddaṃ vā gītasaddaṃ vā ābharaṇasaddaṃ vā. Pītā
atk-s0404a0:152_6: assūtiādīni nīlā tāva jātā, pītā bhavituṃ na sakkhissantītiādinā nayena cintetvā
atk-s0404a0:152_7: vitakketi. Tāpi “idāni ayyo amhākaṃ pītabhāvaṃ icchati, idāni lohitabhāva”nti tādisāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:153_0: Accharaṃ vādesīti pāṇitalaṃ vādesi. Pañcaṅgikassāti ātataṃ, vitataṃ, ātatavitataṃ,
atk-s0404a0:153_1: ghanaṃ, susiranti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatassa. Tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu
atk-s0404a0:153_2: bheriādīsu ekatalatūriyaṃ, vitataṃ nāma ubhayatalaṃ, ātatavitataṃ nāma sabbaso pariyonaddhaṃ,
