atk-s0404a0:153_3: susiraṃ vaṃsādi, ghanaṃ sammādi. Suvinītassāti ākaḍḍhanasithilakaraṇādīhi samucchitassa.
atk-s0404a0:153_4: Suppaṭipatāḷitassāti pamāṇe ṭhitabhāvajānanatthaṃ suṭṭhu paṭipatāḷitassa. Kusalehi
atk-s0404a0:153_5: susamannāhatassāti ye vādetuṃ kusalā chekā, tehi vāditassa. Vaggūti cheko sundaro.
atk-s0404a0:153_6: Rajanīyoti rañjetuṃ samattho. Kamanīyoti kāmetabbayutto. Khamanīyoti vā pāṭho, divasampi
atk-s0404a0:153_7: suyyamāno khamateva, na nibbindatīti attho. Madanīyoti mānamadapurisamadajanano.
atk-s0404a0:153_8: Indriyāni okkhipīti “asāruppaṃ imā devatā karontī”ti indriyāni heṭṭhā khipi, na akkhīni
atk-s0404a0:153_9: ummīletvā olokesi. Na khvayyo anuruddho sādiyatīti “mayaṃ naccāma gāyāma, ayyo pana
atk-s0404a0:153_10: anuruddho na kho sādiyati, akkhīni ummīletvā na oloketi, kiṃ mayaṃ naccitvā vā gāyitvā
atk-s0404a0:153_11: vā karissāmā”ti tattheva antaradhāyiṃsu. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti tāsaṃ devatānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:153_12: ānubhāvaṃ disvā “katihi nu kho dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo manāpakāyike devaloke
atk-s0404a0:155_0: 49-50. Navame ayaṃ’sa loko āraddho hotīti ayamassa loko idhaloke karaṇamattāya āraddhattā
atk-s0404a0:155_1: paripuṇṇattā āraddho hoti paripuṇṇo. Soḷasākārasampannāti sutte vuttehi aṭṭhahi,
atk-s0404a0:155_2: gāthāsu aṭṭhahīti soḷasahi ākārehi samannāgatā, yāni vā aṭṭhaṅgāni parampi tesu samādapetīti
atk-s0404a0:155_3: evampi soḷasākārasampannāti eke. Saddhāsīlapaññā panettha missikā kathitā. Dasamaṃ
atk-s0404a0:155_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa kathitaṃ. Sabbasuttesu pana yaṃ na vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā āgatanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:157_0: 51. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame sakkesu viharatīti paṭhamagamanena gantvā viharati. Mahāpajāpatīti
atk-s0404a0:157_1: puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantattā evaṃladdhanāmā. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti
atk-s0404a0:157_2: bhagavā kapilapuraṃ gantvā paṭhamameva nandaṃ pabbājesi, sattame divase rāhulakumāraṃ.
atk-s0404a0:157_3: Cumbaṭakakalahe pana ubhayanagaravāsikesu yuddhatthāya nikkhantesu satthā gantvā
atk-s0404a0:157_4: te rājāno saññāpetvā attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi. Rājāno pasīditvā aḍḍhatiyasate aḍḍhatiyasate
atk-s0404a0:157_5: kumāre adaṃsu, tāni pañca kumārasatāni satthu santike pabbajiṃsu, atha nesaṃ pajāpatiyo
atk-s0404a0:157_6: sāsanaṃ pesetvā anabhiratiṃ uppādayiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ anabhiratiyā uppannabhāvaṃ
atk-s0404a0:157_7: ñatvā te pañcasate daharabhikkhū kuṇāladahaṃ netvā attano kuṇālakāle nisinnapubbe
atk-s0404a0:157_8: pāsāṇatale nisīditvā kuṇālajātakakathāya tesaṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā sabbepi te sotāpattiphale
atk-s0404a0:157_9: patiṭṭhāpesi, puna mahāvanaṃ ānetvā arahattaphaleti. Tesaṃ cittajānanatthaṃ punapi
atk-s0404a0:157_10: pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Te “abhabbā mayaṃ gharāvāsassā”ti paṭisāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:157_11: Tā “na dāni amhākaṃ gharaṃ gantuṃ yuttaṃ, mahāpajāpatiyā santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0404a0:157_12: anujānāpetvā pabbajissāmā”ti pañcasatāpi mahāpajāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ayye, amhākaṃ
atk-s0404a0:157_13: pabbajjaṃ anujānāpethā”ti āhaṃsu. Mahāpajāpatī tā itthiyo gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:157_14: Setacchattassa heṭṭhā rañño parinibbutakāle upasaṅkamītipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0404a0:158_0: Alaṃ gotami, mā te ruccīti kasmā paṭikkhipi, nanu sabbesampi buddhānaṃ catasso parisā
atk-s0404a0:158_1: hontīti? Kāmaṃ honti, kilametvā pana anekavāraṃ yācite anuññātaṃ pabbajjaṃ “dukkhena
atk-s0404a0:158_2: laddhā”ti sammā paripālessantīti garuṃ katvā anuññātukāmo paṭikkhipi. Pakkāmīti puna
atk-s0404a0:158_3: kapilapurameva pāvisi. Yathābhirantaṃ viharitvāti bodhaneyyasattānaṃ upanissayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:158_4: olokento yathājjhāsayane viharitvā. Cārikaṃ pakkāmīti mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto uttamāya
atk-s0404a0:159_0: Sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhinti antonivesanamhiyeva dasabalaṃ uddissa pabbajjāvesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:159_1: gahetvā pañcasatā sākiyāniyo pabbajjāvesaṃyeva gāhāpetvā sabbāhipi tāhi sambahulāhi
atk-s0404a0:159_2: sākiyānīhi saddhiṃ. Cārikaṃ pakkāmīti gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Gamanābhinīharaṇakāle pana
atk-s0404a0:159_3: tā sukhumālā rājitthiyo padasā gantuṃ na sakkhissantīti sākiyakoliyarājāno sovaṇṇasivikāyo
atk-s0404a0:159_4: upaṭṭhāpayiṃsu. Tā pana “yāne āruyha gacchantīti satthari agāravo kato hotī”ti ekapaṇṇāsayojanikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:159_5: padasāva paṭipajjiṃsu. Rājānopi purato ca pacchato ca ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahāpetvā taṇḍulasappitelādīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:159_6: sakaṭāni pūrāpetvā “gataṭṭhāne gataṭṭhāne āhāraṃ paṭiyādethā”ti purise pesayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:159_7: Sūnehi pādehīti tāsañhi sukhumālattā pādesu eko phoṭo uṭṭheti, eko bhijjati. Ubho
atk-s0404a0:159_8: pādā katakaṭṭhisamparikiṇṇā viya hutvā uddhumātā jātā. Tena vuttaṃ – “sūnehi pādehī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:159_9: Bahidvārakoṭṭhaketi dvārakoṭṭhakato bahi. Kasmā panevaṃ ṭhitāti? Evaṃ kirassā ahosi
atk-s0404a0:159_10: – “ahaṃ tathāgatena ananuññātā sayameva pabbajjāvesaṃ aggahesiṃ, evaṃ gahitabhāvo
atk-s0404a0:159_11: ca pana me sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto. Sace satthā pabbajjaṃ anujānāti, iccetaṃ
atk-s0404a0:159_12: kusalaṃ. Sace pana nānujānissati, mahatī garahā bhavissatī”ti vihāraṃ pavisituṃ asakkontī rodamānāva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0404a0:160_0: Kiṃ nu tvaṃ gotamīti kiṃ nu rājakulānaṃ vipatti uppannā, kena tvaṃ kāraṇena evaṃ
atk-s0404a0:160_1: vivaṇṇabhāvaṃ pattā, sūnehi pādehi…pe… ṭhitāti. Aññenapi pariyāyenāti aññenapi kāraṇena.
atk-s0404a0:160_2: Bahukārā, bhantetiādinā tassā guṇaṃ kathetvā puna pabbajjaṃ yācanto evamāha. Satthāpi
atk-s0404a0:160_3: “itthiyo nāma parittapaññā, ekayācitamattena pabbajjāya anuññātāya na mama sāsanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:160_4: garuṃ katvā gaṇhissantī”ti tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni garuṃ katvā gāhāpetukāmatāya
atk-s0404a0:160_5: sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpatī gotamī aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāva’ssā hotu upasampadātiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:160_6: Tattha sāvassāti sā eva assā pabbajjāpi upasampadāpi hotu.
atk-s0404a0:161_0: Tadahūpasampannassāti taṃdivasaṃ upasampannassa. Abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ
atk-s0404a0:161_1: sāmīcikammaṃ kattabbanti omānātimāne akatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena abhivādanaṃ, āsanā
atk-s0404a0:161_2: paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanavasena paccuṭṭhānaṃ, dasanakhe samodhānetvā añjalikammaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:161_4: āvāseti yattha vasantiyā anantarāyena ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṭṭhāne ovādadāyako
atk-s0404a0:161_5: ācariyo natthi, ayaṃ abhikkhuko āvāso nāma. Evarūpe āvāse vassaṃ na upagantabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:161_6: Anvaḍḍhamāsanti anuposathikaṃ. Ovādūpasaṅkamananti ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṃ. Diṭṭhenāti
atk-s0404a0:161_7: cakkhunā diṭṭhena. Sutenāti sotena sutena. Parisaṅkāyāti diṭṭhasutavasena parisaṅkitena.
atk-s0404a0:161_8: Garudhammanti garukaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ. Pakkhamānattanti anūnāni pannarasa divasāni
atk-s0404a0:161_9: mānattaṃ. Chasu dhammesūti vikālabhojanacchaṭṭhesu sikkhāpadesu. Sikkhitasikkhāyāti
atk-s0404a0:161_10: ekasikkhampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pūritasikkhāya. Akkositabbo paribhāsitabboti dasannaṃ
atk-s0404a0:161_11: akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena akkosavatthunā na akkositabbo, bhayūpadaṃsanāya yāya kāyaci
atk-s0404a0:162_0: Ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapathoti ovādānusāsanadhammakathāsaṅkhāto vacanapatho
atk-s0404a0:162_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu ovarito pihito, na bhikkhuniyā koci bhikkhu ovaditabbo anusāsitabbo
atk-s0404a0:162_2: vā “bhante, porāṇakattherā idaṃ cīvaravattaṃ pūrayiṃsū”ti evaṃ pana paveṇivasena
atk-s0404a0:162_3: kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapathoti bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhunīsu
atk-s0404a0:162_4: vacanapatho anivārito, yathāruci ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetunti ayamettha
atk-s0404a0:162_5: saṅkhepo, vitthārato panesā garudhammakathā samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya
atk-s0404a0:163_0: Ime pana aṭṭha garudhamme satthu santike uggahetvā therena attano ārociyamāne sutvāva
atk-s0404a0:163_1: mahāpajāpatiyā tāva mahantaṃ domanassaṃ khaṇena paṭippassambhi, anotattadahato ābhatena
atk-s0404a0:163_2: sītudakassa ghaṭasatena matthake parisittā viya vigatapariḷāhā attamanā hutvā garudhammapaṭiggahaṇena
atk-s0404a0:163_3: uppannapītipāmojjaṃ āvikarontī seyyathāpi, bhantetiādikaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0404a0:164_0: Kumbhatthenakehīti kumbhe dīpaṃ jāletvā tena ālokena paraghare bhaṇḍaṃ vicinitvā
atk-s0404a0:164_1: thenakacorehi. Setaṭṭhikā nāma rogajātīti eko pāṇako nāḷamajjhagataṃ kaṇḍaṃ vijjhati,
atk-s0404a0:164_2: yena viddhā kaṇḍā nikkhantampi sālisīsaṃ khīraṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Mañjiṭṭhikā nāma
atk-s0404a0:165_0: Mahato taḷākassa paṭikacceva āḷinti iminā pana etamatthaṃ dasseti – yathā mahato
atk-s0404a0:165_1: taḷākassa pāḷiyā abaddhāyapi kiñci udakaṃ tiṭṭhateva, paṭhamameva baddhāya pana yaṃ
atk-s0404a0:165_2: abaddhapaccayā na tiṭṭheyya, tampi tiṭṭheyya, evameva ye ime anuppanne vatthusmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:165_3: paṭikacceva anatikkamanatthāya garudhammā paññattā, tesu apaññattesu mātugāmassa
atk-s0404a0:165_4: pabbajitattā pañca vassasatāni saddhammo tiṭṭheyya. Paṭikacceva paññattattā pana
atk-s0404a0:165_5: aparānipi pañca vassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttavassasahassameva ṭhassati.
atk-s0404a0:165_6: Vassasahassanti cetaṃ paṭisambhidāpabhedappattakhīṇāsavānaṃ vaseneva vuttaṃ, tato
atk-s0404a0:165_7: pana uttaripi sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena vassasahassaṃ, anāgāmivasena vassasahassaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:165_8: sakadāgāmivasena vassasahassaṃ, sotāpannavasena vassasahassanti evaṃ pañcavassasahassāni
atk-s0404a0:165_9: paṭivedhasaddhammo ṭhassati. Pariyattidhammopi tāniyeva. Na hi pariyattiyā asati
atk-s0404a0:165_10: paṭivedho atthi, nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho na hoti. Liṅgaṃ pana pariyattiyā
atk-s0404a0:167_0: 52. Dutiye bahussutoti idha sakalassapi buddhavacanassa vasena bahussutabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:167_1: Garudhammanti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Bhikkhunovādakavinicchayo pana samantapāsādikāya
atk-s0404a0:169_0: 53. Tatiye sarāgāyāti sarāgatthāya. Virāgāyāti virajjanatthāya. Saṃyogāyāti vaṭṭe
atk-s0404a0:169_1: saṃyogatthāya. Visaṃyogāyāti vaṭṭe visaṃyogabhāvatthāya. Ācayāyāti vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:169_2: No apacayāyāti na vaṭṭaviddhaṃsanatthāya. Dubbharatāyāti dupposanatthāya. No subharatāyāti
atk-s0404a0:169_3: na sukhaposanatthāya. Imasmiṃ sutte paṭhamavārena vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, dutiyavārena vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0404a0:169_4: kathitaṃ. Iminā ca pana ovādena gotamī arahattaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0404a0:171_0: 54. Catutthe byagghapajjāti idamassa paveṇi nāma vasena ālapanaṃ. Tassa hi pubbapurisā
atk-s0404a0:171_1: byagghapathe jātāti tasmiṃ kule manussā byagghapajjāti vuccanti. Issatthenāti issāsakammena.
atk-s0404a0:171_2: Tatrupāyāyāti “imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti jānane upāyabhūtāya. Vuddhasīlinoti
atk-s0404a0:171_3: vaḍḍhitasīlā vuddhasamācārā. Āyanti āgamanaṃ. Nāccogāḷhanti nātimahantaṃ. Nātihīnanti
atk-s0404a0:171_4: nātikasiraṃ. Pariyādāyāti gahetvā khepetvā. Tattha yassa vayato diguṇo āyo, tassa
atk-s0404a0:173: Ekena bhoge bhuñjeyya, dvīhi kammaṃ payojaye;
atk-s0404a0:175: Evaṃ paṭipajjato pana vayo āyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0404a0:176_0: Udumbarakhādīvāti yathā udumbarāni khāditukāmena pakke udumbararukkhe cālite ekappahāreneva
atk-s0404a0:176_1: bahūni phalāni patanti, so khāditabbayuttakāni khāditvā itarāni bahutarāni pahāya
atk-s0404a0:176_2: gacchati, evamevaṃ yo āyato vayaṃ bahutaraṃ katvā vippakiranto bhoge paribhuñjati,
atk-s0404a0:176_3: so “udumbarakhādikaṃvāyaṃ kulaputto bhoge khādatī”ti vuccati. Ajeṭṭhamaraṇanti anāyakamaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:176_4: Samaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetīti sammā jīvikaṃ kappeti. Samajīvitāti samajīvitāya jīvitā.
atk-s0404a0:177_0: Uṭṭhātā kammadheyyesūti kammakaraṇaṭṭhānesu uṭṭhānavīriyasampanno. Vidhānavāti vidahanasampanno.
atk-s0404a0:177_1: Sotthānaṃ samparāyikanti sotthibhūtaṃ samparāyikaṃ. Saccanāmenāti buddhattāyeva buddhoti
atk-s0404a0:177_2: evaṃ avitathanāmena. Cāgo puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti cāgo ca sesapuññañca pavaḍḍhati. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:177_3: sutte saddhādayo missakā kathitā. Pañcamaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0404a0:179_0: 56. Chaṭṭhe gabbhoti gabbhavāso. Diṭṭhadhammikāpīti sandiṭṭhikā gabbhavāsasadisā
atk-s0404a0:179_1: punapi manussagabbhā. Samparāyikāpīti ṭhapetvā manussagabbhe sesagabbhā. Ubhayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:179_2: ete kāmā pavuccantīti bhayañca dukkhañca, bhayañca rogo ca, bhayañca gaṇḍo ca, bhayañca
atk-s0404a0:179_3: sallañca, bhayañca saṅgo ca, bhayañca paṅko ca, bhayañca gabbho cāti evaṃ ubhayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:179_4: ete kāmā pavuccanti. Sātarūpenāti kāmasukhena. Palipathanti vaṭṭapalipathaṃ. Atikkammāti
atk-s0404a0:179_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā assa bhikkhuno arahattappattabhāvo gahito. Evarūpaṃ
atk-s0404a0:179_6: pajaṃ jātijarūpetaṃ tīsu bhavesu phandamānaṃ avekkhatīti sutte vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu
atk-s0404a0:181_0: 59-60. Navame ujubhūtoti kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvena ujuko. Paññāsīlasamāhitoti paññāya
atk-s0404a0:181_1: ca sīlena ca samannāgato. Yajamānānanti dānaṃ dadantānaṃ. Puññapekkhānanti puññaṃ
atk-s0404a0:181_2: olokentānaṃ gavesantānaṃ. Opadhikanti upadhivipākaṃ, opadhibhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:181_3: Dasame samukkaṭṭhoti ukkaṭṭho uttamo. Sattānanti sabbasattānaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:183_0: 61. Sattamassa paṭhame pavivittassāti kāyavivekena vivittassa. Nirāyattavuttinoti
atk-s0404a0:183_1: katthaci anāyattavuttino vipassanākammikassa. Lābhāyāti catupaccayalābhāya. Socī
atk-s0404a0:183_2: ca paridevī cāti sokī ca paridevī ca. Socicca parideviccātipi pāṭho. Cuto ca saddhammāti
atk-s0404a0:183_3: taṃkhaṇaṃyeva vipassanāsaddhammā cuto. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:185_0: 62. Dutiye alaṃ attano alaṃ paresanti attano ca paresañca hitapaṭipattiyaṃ samattho
atk-s0404a0:185_1: pariyatto anucchaviko. Khippanisantīti khippaṃ upadhāreti, khandhadhātuāyatanādīsu
atk-s0404a0:185_2: kathiyamānesu te dhamme khippaṃ jānātīti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte samathavipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0404a0:185_3: Puggalajjhāsayena pana desanāvilāsena cetaṃ matthakato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā otarantaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0404a0:187_0: 63. Tatiye evamevāti nikkāraṇeneva. Yathā vā ayaṃ yācati, evameva. Moghapurisāti
atk-s0404a0:187_1: mūḷhapurisā tucchapurisā. Ajjhesantīti yācanti. Anubandhitabbanti iriyāpathānugamanena
atk-s0404a0:187_2: anubandhitabbaṃ maṃ na vijahitabbaṃ maññanti. Ājānanatthaṃ apasādento evamāha. Esa
atk-s0404a0:187_3: kira bhikkhu ovāde dinnepi pamādameva anuyuñjati, dhammaṃ sutvā tattheva vasati,
atk-s0404a0:187_4: samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na icchati. Tasmā bhagavā evaṃ apasādetvā puna yasmā so arahattassa
atk-s0404a0:187_5: upanissayasampanno, tasmā taṃ ovadanto tasmātiha te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbantiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:187_6: Tattha ajjhattaṃ me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissati susaṇṭhitaṃ, na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā
atk-s0404a0:187_7: dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassantīti iminā tāvassa ovādena niyakajjhattavasena cittekaggatāmatto mūlasamādhi vutto.
atk-s0404a0:188_0: Tato “ettakeneva santuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā evaṃ so samādhi vaḍḍhetabbo”ti dassetuṃ yato
atk-s0404a0:188_1: kho te bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ, na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā
atk-s0404a0:188_2: dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “mettā me cetovimutti
atk-s0404a0:188_3: bhāvitā bhavissati…pe… susamāraddhā”ti evamassa mettāvasena bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā puna
atk-s0404a0:188_4: yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato, tato tvaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0404a0:188_5: imaṃ samādhiṃ savitakkasavicārampi bhāveyyāsītiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yadā te bhikkhu
atk-s0404a0:188_6: ayaṃ mūlasamādhi evaṃ mettāvasena bhāvito hoti, tadā tvaṃ tāvatakenapi tuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvāva
atk-s0404a0:188_7: imaṃ mūlasamādhiṃ aññesupi ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānāni pāpayamāno “savitakkasavicārampī”tiādinā
atk-s0404a0:189_0: Evaṃ vatvā ca pana avasesabrahmavihārapubbaṅgamampissa aññesu ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:189_1: kareyyāsīti dassento yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito,
atk-s0404a0:189_2: tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “karuṇā me cetovimuttī”tiādimāha. Evaṃ mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0404a0:189_3: catukkapañcakajjhānabhāvanaṃ dassetvā puna kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ dassetuṃ yato
atk-s0404a0:189_4: kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito, tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ
atk-s0404a0:189_5: “kāye kāyānupassī”tiādiṃ vatvā yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti
atk-s0404a0:189_6: subhāvito, tato tvaṃ bhikkhu yena yeneva gagghasītiādimāha. Tattha gagghasīti gamissasi.
atk-s0404a0:189_7: Phāsuṃyevāti iminā arahattaṃ dasseti. Arahattappatto hi sabbiriyāpathesu phāsu viharati nāma.
atk-s0404a0:191_0: 64. Catutthe etadavocāti attano padhānabhūmiyaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0404a0:191_2: Ñāṇadassananti dibbacakkhubhūtaṃ ñāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dassanaṃ. Sannivutthapubbanti ekato
atk-s0404a0:191_3: vasitapubbaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana sutte dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, iddhividhañāṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:191_5: imāni tāva aṭṭha ñāṇāni pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatāni, tehi pana saddhiṃ vipassanāñāṇāni cattāri
atk-s0404a0:191_6: maggañāṇāni, cattāri phalañāṇāni, cattāri paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni
atk-s0404a0:191_7: cha asādhāraṇañāṇānīti etāni ñāṇāni samodhānetvā kathentena evaṃ idaṃ suttaṃ kathitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0404a0:193_0: 65. Pañcame abhibhāyatanānīti abhibhavanakāraṇāni. Kiṃ abhibhavanti? Paccanīkadhammepi
atk-s0404a0:193_1: ārammaṇānipi. Tāni hi paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti, puggalassa
atk-s0404a0:193_2: ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni. Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññītiādīsu pana ajjhattarūpe parikammavasena
atk-s0404a0:193_3: ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī nāma hoti. Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā
atk-s0404a0:193_4: akkhitārakāya vā karoti. Pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā hatthatalapādatalesu
atk-s0404a0:193_5: vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti. Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya
atk-s0404a0:193_6: vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti. Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe
atk-s0404a0:193_7: vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti. Taṃ pana sunīlakaṃ supītakaṃ sulohitakaṃ suodātaṃ
atk-s0404a0:194_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassevaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, nimittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:194_1: pana bahiddhā, so evaṃ ajjhattaṃ parikammassa bahiddhā ca appanāya vasena “ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:194_2: rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati. Parittānīti avaḍḍhitāni. Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti
atk-s0404a0:194_3: suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā, parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:194_4: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannaggahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ
atk-s0404a0:194_5: ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī”ti saṃkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti, evameva ñāṇuttariko
atk-s0404a0:194_6: puggalo visadañāṇo “kimettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi, nāyaṃ mama
atk-s0404a0:194_7: bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:194_8: pāpetīti attho. Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa ābhogo kathito. So ca kho samāpattito
atk-s0404a0:194_9: vuṭṭhitassa, na antosamāpattiyaṃ. Evaṃsaññī hotīti ābhogasaññāyapi jhānasaññāyapi
atk-s0404a0:194_10: evaṃsaññī hoti. Abhibhavanasaññā hissa antosamāpattiyampi atthi, ābhogasaññā pana
atk-s0404a0:195_0: Appamāṇānīti vaḍḍhitappamāṇāni, mahantānīti attho. Abhibhuyyāti ettha ca pana yathā
atk-s0404a0:195_1: mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā “aññāpi hotu, aññāpi hotu, kiṃ
atk-s0404a0:195_2: esā mayhaṃ karissatī”ti na taṃ mahantato passati, evameva ñāṇuttaro puggalo visadañāṇo
atk-s0404a0:195_3: “kiṃ ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ, nayidaṃ appamāṇaṃ, na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro
atk-s0404a0:195_4: atthī”ti abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādanevettha appanaṃ pāpetīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:196: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-s0404a0:197_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassa parikammampi nimittampi bahiddhā uppannaṃ, so
atk-s0404a0:197_1: evaṃ bahiddhā parikammassa ceva appanāya ca vasena “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā
atk-s0404a0:197_2: rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati. Sesamettha catutthābhibhāyatane ca vuttanayameva. Imesu
atk-s0404a0:197_3: pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritavasena, suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:197_4: dosacaritavasena, dubbaṇṇaṃ rāgacaritavasena. Etesañhi etāni sappāyāni. Sā ca nesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:198_0: Pañcamaabhibhāyatanādīsu nīlānīti sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇānīti vaṇṇavasena.
atk-s0404a0:198_2: hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nīlanibhāsānīti idaṃ pana obhāsavasena vuttaṃ, nīlobhāsāni
atk-s0404a0:198_3: nīlappabhāyuttānīti attho. Etena nesaṃ suvisuddhataṃ dasseti. Visuddhavaṇṇavaseneva
atk-s0404a0:198_4: hi imāni abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni. “Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti
atk-s0404a0:198_5: pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vā”tiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca parikammañca
atk-s0404a0:200_0: 66. Vimokkhāti kenaṭṭhena vimokkhā? Adhimuccanaṭṭhena. Ko panāyaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho
atk-s0404a0:200_1: nāma? Paccanīkadhammehi ca suṭṭhu muccanaṭṭho, ārammaṇe ca abhirativasena suṭṭhu
atk-s0404a0:200_2: muccanaṭṭho, pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena
atk-s0404a0:200_3: nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ panattho pacchime vimokkhe natthi,
atk-s0404a0:201_0: Rūpī rūpāni passatīti ettha ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu nīlakasiṇādivasena uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:201_1: rūpaṃ, tadassatthīti rūpī. Bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādīni rūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati.
atk-s0404a0:201_2: Iminā ajjhattabahiddhavatthukesu kasiṇesu uppāditajjhānassa puggalassa cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni
atk-s0404a0:201_3: dassitāni. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti ajjhattaṃ na rūpasaññī, attano kesādīsu anuppāditarūpāvacarajjhānoti
atk-s0404a0:201_4: attho. Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva uppāditajjhānassa rūpāvacarajjhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0404a0:202_0: Subhanteva adhimutto hotīti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0404a0:202_1: Tattha kiñcāpi antoappanāya “subha”nti ābhogo natthi, yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:202_2: kasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati, so yasmā “subhanti adhimutto hotī”ti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0404a0:202_3: āpajjati, tasmā evaṃ desanā katā. Paṭisambhidāmagge pana –
atk-s0404a0:203_0: “Kathaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho? Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā
atk-s0404a0:203_1: ekaṃ disaṃ …pe… viharati. Mettāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti. Karuṇāsahagatena…pe…
atk-s0404a0:203_2: muditāsahagatena …pe… upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ…pe… viharati. Upekkhāya
atk-s0404a0:203_3: bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti. Evaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:204_0: Sabbaso rūpasaññānantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva. Ayaṃ aṭṭhamo
atk-s0404a0:204_1: vimokkhoti ayaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ sabbaso vissaṭṭhattā vimuttattā aṭṭhamo uttamo vimokkho nāma.
atk-s0404a0:206: 67-68. Sattame anariyavohārāti na ariyakathā sadosakathā. Yāhi cetanāhi te vohāre voharanti, tāsaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. Aṭṭhame vuttapaṭipakkhanayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:208_0: 69. Navame khattiyaparisāti khattiyānaṃ parisānaṃ sannipāto samāgamo. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0404a0:208_2: aññesu cakkavāḷesupi labbhateva. Sallapitapubbanti ālāpasallāpo katapubbo. Sākacchāti
atk-s0404a0:208_3: dhammasākacchāpi samāpajjitapubbā. Yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇoti te odātāpi honti kāḷāpi
atk-s0404a0:208_4: maṅguracchavīpi, satthā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo. Idaṃ pana saṇṭhānaṃ paṭicca kathitaṃ. Saṇṭhānampi
atk-s0404a0:208_5: ca kevalaṃ tesaṃ paññāyatiyeva. Na pana bhagavā milakkhasadiso hoti, nāpi āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalo,
atk-s0404a0:208_6: buddhaveseneva nisīdati. Tepi attano samānasaṇṭhānameva passanti. Yādisako tesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:208_7: saroti te chinnassarāpi honti gaggassarāpi kākassarāpi, satthā brahmassarova. Idaṃ
atk-s0404a0:208_8: pana bhāsantaraṃ sandhāya kathitaṃ. Sacepi hi satthā rājāsane nisinno katheti, “ajja
atk-s0404a0:208_9: rājā madhurena kathetī”ti nesaṃ hoti. Kathetvā pakkante pana bhagavati puna rājānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:208_10: āgataṃ disvā “ko nu kho aya”nti vīmaṃsā uppajjati. Tattha ko nu kho ayanti “imasmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:208_11: ṭhāne idāneva māgadhabhāsāya sīhaḷabhāsāya madhurena ākārena kathento ko nu kho ayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:208_12: antarahito, kiṃ devo udāhu manusso”ti evaṃ vīmaṃsantāpi na jānantīti attho. Kimatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:208_13: panevaṃ ajānantānaṃ dhammaṃ desetīti? Vāsanatthāya. Evaṃ sutopi hi dhammo anāgate
atk-s0404a0:208_14: paccayo hotīti anāgataṃ paṭicca deseti. Anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisantiādinaṃ soṇadaṇḍasamāgamādivasena
atk-s0404a0:210_0: 70. Dasame nisīdananti idha cammakhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ. Udenaṃ cetiyanti udenayakkhassa
atk-s0404a0:210_1: vasanaṭṭhāne katavihāro vuccati. Gotamakādīsupi eseva nayo. Bhāvitāti vaḍḍhitā. Bahulīkatāti
atk-s0404a0:210_2: punappunaṃ katā. Yānīkatāti yuttayānaṃ viya katā. Vatthukatāti patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu
atk-s0404a0:210_3: viya katā. Anuṭṭhitāti adhiṭṭhitā. Paricitāti samantato citā suvaḍḍhitā. Susamāraddhāti suṭṭhu samāraddhā.
atk-s0404a0:211_0: Iti aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassento tathāgatassa khotiādimāha. Ettha kappanti
atk-s0404a0:211_1: āyukappaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ karonto
atk-s0404a0:211_2: tiṭṭheyya. Kappāvasesaṃ vāti “appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vuttavassasatato atirekaṃ vā. Mahāsīvatthero
atk-s0404a0:211_3: panāha – “buddhānaṃ aṭṭhāne gajjitaṃ nāma natthi, punappunaṃ samāpajjitvā maraṇantikavedanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:211_4: vikkhambhento bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyya. Kasmā pana na ṭhitoti? Upādinnakasarīraṃ
atk-s0404a0:211_5: nāma khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyati, buddhā ca khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ appatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse
atk-s0404a0:211_6: bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti. Buddhānubuddhesu ca mahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu
atk-s0404a0:211_7: ekakeneva khāṇukena viya ṭhātabbaṃ hoti daharasāmaṇeraparivārena vā, tato ‘aho buddhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:211_8: parisā’ti hīḷetabbataṃ āpajjeyya. Tasmā na ṭhito”ti. Evaṃ vuttepi yo pana vuccati
atk-s0404a0:212_0: Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ, yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto
atk-s0404a0:212_1: ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya, evameva nāsakkhi
atk-s0404a0:212_2: paṭivijjhitunti attho. Māro hi yassa sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā, tassa
atk-s0404a0:212_3: cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti. Therassa ca cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā, tenassa māro cittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:212_4: pariyuṭṭhāsi. So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti? Bheravaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:212_5: vā dasseti, saddārammaṇaṃ vā sāveti. Tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0404a0:212_6: vivaṭamukhā honti, tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati, tato visaññāva
atk-s0404a0:212_7: hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Therassa panesa mukhe hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati, bheravārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:212_8: pana dassesi. Taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ nappaṭivijjhi. Bhagavā jānantoyeva kimatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:212_9: yāva tatiyaṃ āmantesīti? Parato “tiṭṭhatu, bhante bhagavā”ti yācite “tuyhevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:213_0: Māro pāpimāti ettha satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro. Pāpimāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:213_1: So hi pāpadhammasamannāgatattā “pāpimā”ti vuccati. Kaṇho, antako, namuci, pamattabandhūtipi
atk-s0404a0:213_2: tasseva nāmāni. Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi bhagavato sambodhipattiyā aṭṭhame sattāhe
atk-s0404a0:213_3: bodhimaṇḍeyeva āgantvā “bhagavā yadatthaṃ tumhehi pāramiyo pūritā, so vo attho anuppatto,
atk-s0404a0:213_4: paṭividdhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, kiṃ te lokavicāraṇenā”ti vatvā yathā ajja, evameva
atk-s0404a0:213_5: “parinibbātu dāni, bhante bhagavā”ti yāci. Bhagavā cassa “na tāvāha”ntiādīni vatvā
atk-s0404a0:213_6: paṭikkhipi. Taṃ sandhāya – “bhāsitā kho panesā, bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:214_0: Tattha viyattāti maggavasena byattā, tatheva vinītā, tathā visāradā. Bahussutāti
atk-s0404a0:214_1: tepiṭakavasena bahu sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā. Tameva dhammaṃ dhārentīti dhammadharā.
atk-s0404a0:214_2: Atha vā pariyattibahussutā ceva paṭivedhabahussutā ca. Pariyattipaṭivedhadhammānaṃyeva
atk-s0404a0:214_3: dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhammānudhammappaṭipannāti ariyadhammassa
atk-s0404a0:214_5: paṭipannā. Anudhammacārinoti anudhammaṃ caraṇasīlā. Sakaṃ ācariyakanti attano ācariyavādaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:214_6: Ācikkhissantītiādīni sabbāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Sahadhammenāti sahetukena sakāraṇena
atk-s0404a0:214_7: vacanena. Sappāṭihāriyanti yāva niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessanti.
atk-s0404a0:215_0: Brahmacariyanti sikkhāttayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. Iddhanti samiddhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:215_1: jhānassādavasena. Phītanti vuddhipattaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena.
atk-s0404a0:215_2: Vitthārikanti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhitavasena. Bāhujaññanti bahūhi
atk-s0404a0:215_3: ñātaṃ paṭividdhaṃ mahājanābhisamayavasena. Puthubhūtanti sabbākārena puthulabhāvappattaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:215_4: Kathaṃ? Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti, yattakā viññujātikā devā ceva manussā
atk-s0404a0:215_5: ca atthi, sabbehi suṭṭhu pakāsitanti attho. Appossukkoti nirālayo. Tvañhi pāpima
atk-s0404a0:215_6: aṭṭhamasattāhato paṭṭhāya “parinibbātu dāni, bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato”ti
atk-s0404a0:215_7: viravanto āhiṇḍittha. Ajja dāni paṭṭhāya vigatussāho hohi, mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:216_0: Sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajjīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā
atk-s0404a0:216_1: āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajji pajahi. Tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0404a0:216_2: ossaji, temāsamattameva pana phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti
atk-s0404a0:216_3: cittaṃ uppādesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ossajī”ti. Ussajītipi pāṭho. Mahābhūmicāloti
atk-s0404a0:216_4: mahanto pathavīkampo. Tadā kira dasasahassī lokadhātu kampittha. Bhiṃsanakoti bhayajanako.
atk-s0404a0:216_5: Devadundubhiyo ca phaliṃsūti devabheriyo phaliṃsu, devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajji, akālavijjulatā
atk-s0404a0:217_0: Udānaṃ udānesīti kasmā udānesi? Koci nāma vadeyya “bhagavā pacchato pacchato anubandhitvā
atk-s0404a0:217_1: ‘parinibbātu, bhante’ti upadduto bhayena āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjesī”ti, tassokāso mā
atk-s0404a0:217_2: hotu, bhītassa hi udānaṃ nāma natthīti pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0404a0:218_0: Tattha sabbesaṃ soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:218_1: Kiṃ taṃ? Kāmāvacarakammaṃ. Na tulaṃ, na vā tulaṃ sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0404a0:218_2: atthīti atulaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Mahaggatakammaṃ. Atha vā kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ tulaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:218_3: arūpāvacaraṃ atulaṃ. Appavipākaṃ vā tulaṃ, bahuvipākaṃ atulaṃ. Sambhavanti sambhavahetubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:218_4: rāsikārakaṃ piṇḍakārakanti attho. Bhavasaṅkhāranti punabbhavasaṅkhāraṇakaṃ. Avassajīti
atk-s0404a0:218_5: vissajjesi. Munīti buddhamuni. Ajjhattaratoti niyakajjhattarato. Samāhitoti upacārappanāsamādhivasena
atk-s0404a0:218_6: samāhito. Abhindi kavacamivāti kavacaṃ viya abhindi. Attasambhavanti attani sañjātaṃ
atk-s0404a0:218_7: kilesaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ, bhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0404a0:218_8: ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji, saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ
atk-s0404a0:218_9: viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato hutvā samāhito hutvā abhindīti.
atk-s0404a0:219_0: Atha vā tulanti tulento tīrento. Atulañca sambhavanti nibbānañceva sambhavañca. Bhavasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0404a0:219_1: bhavagāmikammaṃ. Avassaji munīti “pañcakkhandhā aniccā, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho
atk-s0404a0:219_2: nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ, nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0404a0:219_3: disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhāraṃ kammaṃ “kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti
atk-s0404a0:219_4: evaṃ vuttena kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji. Kathaṃ? Ajjhattarato samāhito,
atk-s0404a0:219_5: abhindi kavacamivattasambhavaṃ. So hi vipassanāvasena ajjhattarato, samathavasena
atk-s0404a0:219_6: samāhitoti evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya samathavipassanābalena kavacamiva attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0404a0:219_7: pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ, attani sambhavattā “attasambhava”nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbakilesajālaṃ
atk-s0404a0:219_8: abhindi. Kilesābhāvena ca kataṃ kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti
atk-s0404a0:219_9: evaṃ kilesappahānena kammaṃ pajahi. Pahīnakilesassa ca bhayaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā
atk-s0404a0:219_10: abhītova āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajji, abhītabhāvañāpanatthañca udānaṃ udānesīti veditabbo.
atk-s0404a0:220_0: Yaṃ mahāvātāti yena samayena yasmiṃ vā samaye mahāvātā. Vāyantīti upakkhepakavātā
atk-s0404a0:220_2: upacchindanti, tato ākāse udakaṃ bhassati, tasmiṃ bhassante pathavī bhassati, puna
atk-s0404a0:220_3: vāto attano balena antodhammakaraṇe viya udakaṃ ābandhitvā gaṇhāti, tato udakaṃ uggacchati,
atk-s0404a0:220_4: tasmiṃ uggacchante pathavī uggacchati. Evaṃ udakaṃ kampitaṃ pathaviṃ kampeti. Etañca
atk-s0404a0:220_5: kampanaṃ yāvajjakālāpi hotiyeva, bahubhāvena pana ogacchanuggacchanaṃ na paññāyati.
atk-s0404a0:221_0: Mahiddhikā mahānubhāvāti ijjhanassa mahantatāya mahiddhikā, anubhavitabbassa mahantatāya
atk-s0404a0:221_1: mahānubhāvā. Parittāti dubbalā. Appamāṇāti balavā. So imaṃ pathaviṃ kampetīti so
atk-s0404a0:221_2: iddhiṃ nibbattetvā saṃvejento mahāmoggallāno viya, vīmaṃsanto vā mahānāgattherassa
atk-s0404a0:221_3: bhāgineyyo saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero viya pathaviṃ kampeti. Saṅkampetīti samantato kampeti.
atk-s0404a0:221_4: Sampakampetīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Iti imesu aṭṭhasu pathavikampesu paṭhamo dhātukopena,
atk-s0404a0:221_5: dutiyo iddhānubhāvena, tatiyacatutthā puññatejena, pañcamo ñāṇatejena, chaṭṭho sādhukāradānavasena,
atk-s0404a0:221_6: sattamo kāruññasabhāvena, aṭṭhamo ārodanena. Mātukucchiṃ okkamante ca tato nikkhamante
atk-s0404a0:221_7: ca mahāsatte tassa puññatejena pathavī akampittha, abhisambodhiyaṃ ñāṇatejābhihatā
atk-s0404a0:221_8: hutvā akampittha, dhammacakkappavattane sādhukārabhāvasaṇṭhitā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā
atk-s0404a0:221_10: akampittha, parinibbāne ārodanavegatunnā hutvā akampittha. Ayaṃ panattho pathavidevatāya
atk-s0404a0:221_11: vasena veditabbo. Mahābhūtapathaviyā panetaṃ natthi acetanattā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:223_0: 71-72. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame no ca sīlavāti na sīlesu paripūrakārī. Samantapāsādikoti
atk-s0404a0:223_1: samantato pasādajanako. Sabbākāraparipūroti sabbehi samaṇākārehi samaṇadhammakoṭṭhāsehi
atk-s0404a0:223_2: paripūro. Dutiye santāti paccanīkasantatāya santā. Vimokkhāti paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā ca vimokkhā.
atk-s0404a0:225_0: 73-79. Tatiye bhāvetha noti bhāvetha nu. Sāsananti anusiṭṭhi. Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti
atk-s0404a0:225_1: arahattaphalatthāya. Catutthe patihitāyāti paṭipannāya. So mamassa antarāyoti so
atk-s0404a0:225_2: mama jīvitantarāyopi, puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ karontassa saggantarāyopi maggantarāyopi
atk-s0404a0:225_3: assa. Satthakā vā me vātāti satthaṃ viya aṅgamaṅgāni kantantīti satthakā. Pañcamādīni
atk-s0404a0:225_4: vuttanayāneva. Navame saṃsaggārāmatāti pañcavidhe saṃsagge ārāmatā.
atk-s0404a0:227_0: 80. Dasame kusītavatthūnīti kusītassa alasassa vatthūni patiṭṭhā, kosajjakāraṇānīti
atk-s0404a0:227_1: attho. Kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotīti cīvaravicāraṇādikammaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti. Na vīriyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:227_2: ārabhatīti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ nārabhati. Appattassāti jhānavipassanāmaggaphaladhammassa
atk-s0404a0:227_3: appattassa pattiyā. Anadhigatassāti tasseva anadhigatassa adhigamatthāya. Asacchikatassāti
atk-s0404a0:227_4: tadeva asacchikatassa sacchikaraṇatthāya. Idaṃ paṭhamanti idaṃ “handāhaṃ nipajjāmī”ti
atk-s0404a0:227_5: evaṃ osīdanaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Māsācitakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:227_6: maññeti ettha pana māsācitaṃ nāma tintamāso. Yathā tintamāso garuko hoti, evaṃ garukoti
atk-s0404a0:227_7: adhippāyo. Gilānā vuṭṭhito hotīti gilāno hutvā pacchā vuṭṭhito hoti. Ārambhavatthūnīti
atk-s0404a0:227_8: vīriyakāraṇāni. Tesampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:229_0: 81-82. Navamassa paṭhamaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Dutiye saddhoti duvidhāya saddhāya
atk-s0404a0:229_1: samannāgato. No cupasaṅkamitāti na upaṭṭhahati. No ca paripucchitāti atthānatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:229_2: kāraṇākāraṇaṃ paripucchitā na hoti. Samannāgatoti sāmiatthe paccattaṃ, samannāgatassāti
atk-s0404a0:229_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Ekantapaṭibhānā tathāgataṃ dhammadesanā hotīti tathāgatassa ekantapaṭibhānā
atk-s0404a0:229_4: dhammadesanā hoti, ekanteneva paṭibhāti upaṭṭhātīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:231_0: 83. Tatiye sabbe dhammāti pañcakkhandhā. Chandamūlakāti ajjhāsayacchando kattukamyatāchando
atk-s0404a0:231_1: taṃ mūlaṃ etesanti chandamūlakā. Manasikārato sambhavantīti manasikārasambhavā. Phassato
atk-s0404a0:231_2: samudenti rāsī bhavantīti phassasamudayā. Vedanāya samosarantīti vedanāsamosaraṇā.
atk-s0404a0:231_3: Samādhi etesaṃ pamukhoti samādhippamukhā. Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena sati adhipati etesanti satādhipateyyā,
atk-s0404a0:231_4: satijeṭṭhakāti attho. Paññā uttarā etesanti paññuttarā. Vimutti eva sāro etesanti
atk-s0404a0:231_5: vimuttisārā. Ettha ca chandamūlakādayo cattāropi lokiyā kathitā, sesā lokiyalokuttaramissakāti.
atk-s0404a0:233_0: 84. Catutthe mahācoroti rajjantare dubbhituṃ samattho mahācoro. Pariyāpajjatīti pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:233_1: gacchati. Na ciraṭṭhitiko hotīti addhānaṃ pālento ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. Appaharantassa
atk-s0404a0:233_2: paharatīti attano averine appaharante guṇasampanne ca mahallake ca taruṇadārake ca
atk-s0404a0:233_3: appaharitabbayuttake paharati. Anavasesaṃ ādiyatīti nissesaṃ gaṇhāti. Byattacorānañhi
atk-s0404a0:233_4: idaṃ vattaṃ – parassa dvīsu sāṭakesu eko gahetabbo, ekasmiṃ sante dubbalaṃ datvā
atk-s0404a0:233_5: thiro gahetabbo. Puṭabhattataṇḍulādīsu ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā eko gahetabboti. Accāsanne
atk-s0404a0:233_6: kammaṃ karotīti gāmanigamarājadhānīnaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne corikakammaṃ karoti. Na ca nidhānakusalo
atk-s0404a0:233_7: hotīti yaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ dakkhiṇeyye nidahituṃ cheko na hoti, paralokamaggaṃ na sodheti.
atk-s0404a0:235_0: 85. Pañcame yaṃ samaṇenāti yaṃ guṇajātaṃ samaṇena pattabbaṃ. Vusīmatāti brahmacariyavāsaṃvutena.
atk-s0404a0:235_1: Mutto mocemi bandhanāti ahaṃ sabbabandhanehi mutto hutvā mahājanampi rāgādibandhanato
atk-s0404a0:235_2: mocemi. Paramadantoti aññena kenaci asikkhāpito acodito sayambhuñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0404a0:235_3: paramadamathena dantattā paramadanto nāma. Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.
atk-s0404a0:237_0: 86. Chaṭṭhe mā ca mayā yasoti yaso ca mayā saddhiṃ mā gañchi. Akasiralābhīti vipulalābhī.
atk-s0404a0:237_1: Sīlapaññāṇanti sīlañceva ñāṇañca. Saṅgammāti sannipatitvā. Samāgammāti samāgantvā.
atk-s0404a0:237_2: Saṅgaṇikavihāranti gaṇasaṅgaṇikavihāraṃ. Na hi nūnameti na hi nūna ime. Tathā hi
atk-s0404a0:237_3: panameti tathā hi pana ime. Aṅgulipatodakehīti aṅgulipatodayaṭṭhiṃ katvā vijjhanena.
atk-s0404a0:237_4: Sañjagghanteti mahāhasitaṃ hasante. Saṃkīḷanteti keḷiṃ karonte.
atk-s0404a0:239_0: 87. Sattame nikkujjeyyāti tena dinnassa deyyadhammassa appaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pattanikkujjanakammavācāya
atk-s0404a0:239_1: nikujjeyya, na adhomukhaṭhapanena. Alābhāyāti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ alābhatthāya. Anatthāyāti
atk-s0404a0:241_0: 88. Aṭṭhame appasādaṃ pavedeyyunti appasannabhāvaṃ jānāpeyyuṃ. Appasādaṃ pavedentena
atk-s0404a0:241_1: pana kiṃ kātabbanti? Nisinnāsanato na uṭṭhātabbaṃ na vanditabbaṃ na paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:241_2: kātabbaṃ, na deyyadhammo dātabbo. Agocareti pañcavidhe agocare.
atk-s0404a0:243: 89. Navame dhammikañca gihipaṭissavanti “imaṃ temāsaṃ idheva vasitabba”nti vutto “evaṃ hotū”tiādinā nayena paṭissavaṃ. Na saccāpetīti vuttaṃ na saccaṃ karoti visaṃvādeti.
atk-s0404a0:245_0: 90. Dasame paccekaṭṭhāneti adhipatiṭṭhāne jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne. Tañhi jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā kiñci
atk-s0404a0:245_1: saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na labhati. Na ca tena mūlena vuṭṭhāpetabboti taṃ mūlaṃ katvā
atk-s0404a0:245_2: abbhānakammaṃ kātuṃ na labhati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:246_0: 91. Ito paraṃ atha kho bojjhā upāsikātiādīsu bojjhā upāsikā, sirimā upāsikā, padumā
atk-s0404a0:246_1: upāsikā, sutanā upāsikā, manujā upāsikā, uttarā upāsikā, muttā upāsikā, khemā upāsikā,
atk-s0404a0:246_2: rucī upāsikā, cundī rājakumārī, bimbī upāsikā, sumanā rājakumārī, mallikā devī, tissā
atk-s0404a0:246_3: upāsikā, tissāmātā upāsikā, soṇā upāsikā, soṇāya mātā upāsikā, kāṇā upāsikā, kāṇamātā
atk-s0404a0:246_4: upāsikā, uttarā nandamātā, visākhā migāramātā, khujjuttarā upāsikā, sāmāvatī upāsikā,
atk-s0404a0:246_5: suppavāsā koliyadhītā, suppiyā upāsikā, nakulamātā gahapatānīti imāsaṃ ettakānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:246_6: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathakammameva kathitaṃ. Icchantena vitthāretvā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:253_1: pakkhe bhavānaṃ, upakārakānanti attho. Pāḷiyaṃ āgate nava dhamme sandhāyevaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0404a0:253_2: Kā upanisāti ko upanissayapaccayo. Abhisallekhantīti abhisallekhikā. Samathavipassanācittassa
atk-s0404a0:253_3: vivaraṇe sappāyā upakārakāti cetovivaraṇasappāyā. Appicchataṃ ārabbha pavattā kathā
atk-s0404a0:254_0: Asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyāti ayamattho sālilāyakopamāya vibhāvetabbo – eko
atk-s0404a0:254_1: hi puriso asitaṃ gahetvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sālikkhette sāliyo lāyati. Athassa vatiṃ
atk-s0404a0:254_2: bhinditvā gāvo pavisiṃsu. So asitaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya teneva maggena gāvo nīharitvā
atk-s0404a0:254_3: vatiṃ pākatikaṃ katvā punapi asitaṃ ādāya sāliyo lāyi. Ettha sālikkhettaṃ viya buddhasāsanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:254_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ, sālilāyako viya yogāvacaro, asitaṃ viya paññā, lāyanakālo viya vipassanāya
atk-s0404a0:254_5: kammakaraṇakālo, yaṭṭhi viya asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ, vati viya saṃvaro, vatiṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0404a0:254_6: gāvīnaṃ pavisanaṃ viya sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya pamādaṃ ārabbha rāgassa uppajjanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:254_7: asitaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya paviṭṭhamaggeneva gāvo nīharitvā vatiṃ paṭipākatikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:254_8: katvā puna koṭito paṭṭhāya sālilāyanaṃ viya asubhakammaṭṭhānena rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0404a0:254_9: puna vipassanāya kammaṃ ārabhanakālo. Imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “asubhā bhāvetabbā
atk-s0404a0:255_0: Tattha rāgassāti pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa. Mettāti mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Byāpādassa pahānāyāti
atk-s0404a0:255_1: vuttanayeneva uppannassa kopassa pajahanatthāya. Ānāpānassatīti soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassati.
atk-s0404a0:255_2: Vitakkupacchedāyāti vuttanayeneva uppannānaṃ vitakkānaṃ upacchedanatthāya. Asmimānasamugghātāyāti
atk-s0404a0:255_3: asmīti uppajjanakassa mānassa samugghātatthāya. Anattasaññā saṇṭhātīti aniccalakkhaṇe
atk-s0404a0:255_4: diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Etesu hi tīsu lakkhaṇesu ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:255_5: diṭṭhameva hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “aniccasaññino, bhikkhave, anattasaññā saṇṭhātī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:255_6: Diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti diṭṭheyeva dhamme apaccayaparinibbānañca pāpuṇātīti imasmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:257_0: 2. Dutiye nissayasampannoti patiṭṭhāsampanno. Saddhanti okappanasaddhaṃ. Vīriyanti
atk-s0404a0:257_1: kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ. Yaṃsāti yaṃ assa. Ariyāya paññāyāti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya.
atk-s0404a0:257_2: Saṅkhāyāti jānitvā. Ekaṃ paṭisevatīti sevitabbayuttakaṃ sevati. Adhivāsetīti adhivāsetabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:257_3: adhivāseti. Parivajjetīti parivajjetabbayuttakaṃ parivajjeti. Vinodetīti nīharitabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:257_4: nīharati. Evaṃ kho bhikkhūti evaṃ kho bhikkhu uggahaparipucchāvasena ceva dhammavavatthānavasena
atk-s0404a0:257_5: ca paṭisevitabbādīni suppaṭividdhāni supaccakkhāni katvā paṭisevanto adhivāsento
atk-s0404a0:257_6: parivajjento vinodento ca bhikkhu nissayasampanno nāma hotīti.
atk-s0404a0:259_0: 3. Tatiye cālikāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Taṃ kira calamaggaṃ nissāya katattā olokentānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:259_1: calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti, tasmā cālikāti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. Cāliyapabbateti sopi pabbato
atk-s0404a0:259_2: sabbasetattā kāḷapakkhuposathe olokentānaṃ calamāno viya upaṭṭhāti, tasmā cāliyapabbatoti
atk-s0404a0:259_3: vutto. Tattha mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kārayiṃsu. Iti bhagavā taṃ nagaraṃ nissāya cālikāpabbatamahāvihāre
atk-s0404a0:259_4: viharati. Jantugāmanti evaṃnāmakaṃ aparampi tasseva vihārassa gocaragāmaṃ. Jattugāmantipi
atk-s0404a0:259_6: Āgamehi tāvāti satthā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā upadhārento “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripakka”nti
atk-s0404a0:259_7: ñatvā paṭibāhanto evamāha. Ekakamhi tāvāti idaṃ panassa “evamayaṃ gantvāpi kamme
atk-s0404a0:259_8: anipphajjamāne nirāsaṅko hutvā pemavasena puna āgacchissatī”ti cittamaddavajananatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:259_9: āha. Natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā aññaṃ
atk-s0404a0:259_10: uttari karaṇīyaṃ nāma natthi. Katassa vā paṭicayoti adhigatassa vā puna paṭicayopi
atk-s0404a0:259_11: natthi. Na hi bhāvitamaggo puna bhāvīyati, na pahīnakilesānaṃ puna pahānaṃ atthi.
atk-s0404a0:259_12: Padhānanti kho, meghiya, vadamānaṃ kinti vadeyyāmāti “samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti taṃ
atk-s0404a0:259_13: vadamānaṃ mayaṃ aññaṃ kiṃ nāma vadeyyāma.
atk-s0404a0:260_0: Divāvihāraṃ nisīdīti divāvihāratthāya nisīdi. Nisīdanto ca yasmiṃ maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe
atk-s0404a0:260_1: pubbe anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni rājā hutvā uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷanto tividhanāṭakaparivāro
atk-s0404a0:260_2: nisīdi, tasmiṃyeva nisīdi. Athassa nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇabhāvo jahito viya
atk-s0404a0:260_3: ahosi, rājavesaṃ gahetvā nāṭakavaraparivuto setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke
atk-s0404a0:260_4: nisinno viya jāto. Athassa taṃ sampattiṃ assādayato kāmavitakko udapādi. So tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0404a0:260_5: khaṇe mahāyodhehi gahite dve core ānetvā purato ṭhapite viya addasa. Tesu ekassa
atk-s0404a0:260_6: vadhaṃ āṇāpanavasenassa byāpādavitakko uppajji, ekassa bandhanaṃ āṇāpanavasena vihiṃsāvitakko.
atk-s0404a0:260_7: Evaṃ so latājālena rukkho viya madhumakkhikāhi madhughātako viya akusalavitakkehi
atk-s0404a0:260_8: parikkhitto ahosi. Taṃ sandhāya – atha kho āyasmato meghiyassātiādi vuttaṃ. Anvāsattāti
atk-s0404a0:260_9: anubaddhā samparivāritā. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ pāpavitakkehi samparikiṇṇo
atk-s0404a0:260_10: kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto “idaṃ vata disvā dīghadassī bhagavā paṭisedhesī”ti
atk-s0404a0:260_11: sallakkhetvā “idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasabalassa ārocessāmī”ti nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhāya yena
atk-s0404a0:262_0: 4. Catutthe upaṭṭhānasālāyanti bhojanasālāyaṃ. Yenupaṭṭhānasālāti satthā nandakattherena
atk-s0404a0:262_1: madhurassarena āraddhāya dhammadesanāya saddaṃ sutvā, “ānanda, ko eso upaṭṭhānasālāya
atk-s0404a0:262_2: madhurassarena dhammaṃ desetī”ti pucchitvā “dhammakathikanandakattherassa ajja, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:262_3: vāro”ti sutvā “atimadhuraṃ katvā, ānanda, eso bhikkhu dhammaṃ katheti, mayampi gantvā
atk-s0404a0:262_4: suṇissāmā”ti vatvā yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami. Bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsīti chabbaṇṇarasmiyo
atk-s0404a0:262_5: cīvaragabbhe paṭicchādetvā aññātakavesena aṭṭhāsi. Kathāpariyosānaṃ āgamayamānoti
atk-s0404a0:262_6: “idamavocā”ti idaṃ kathāvasānaṃ udikkhamāno dhammakathaṃ suṇanto aṭṭhāsiyeva. Athāyasmā
atk-s0404a0:262_7: ānando nikkhante paṭhame yāme satthu saññaṃ adāsi – “paṭhamayāmo atikkanto, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:262_8: thokaṃ vissamathā”ti. Satthā tattheva aṭṭhāsi. Athāyasmā ānando majjhimayāmepi nikkhante,
atk-s0404a0:262_9: “bhante, tumhe pakatiyā khattiyasukhumālā, puna buddhasukhumālāti paramasukhumālā,
atk-s0404a0:262_10: majjhimayāmopi atikkanto, muhuttaṃ vissamathā”ti āha. Satthā tattheva aṭṭhāsi. Tattha
atk-s0404a0:262_11: ṭhitakassevassa aruṇaggaṃ paññāyittha. Aruṇuggamanañca therassa “idamavocā”ti pāpetvā
atk-s0404a0:263_0: Sārajjamānarūpoti harāyamāno ottappamāno. Domanassasārajjaṃ panassa natthi. Ettakampi
atk-s0404a0:263_1: no nappaṭibhāseyyāti paṭisambhidāppattassa appaṭibhānaṃ nāma natthi. Ettakampi na
atk-s0404a0:263_2: katheyyanti dasseti. Sādhu sādhūti therassa dhammadesanaṃ sampahaṃsanto āha. Ayañhettha
atk-s0404a0:263_3: attho “sugahitā ca te dhammadesanā sukathitā cā”ti. Kulaputtānanti ācārakulaputtānañceva
atk-s0404a0:263_4: jātikulaputtānañca. Ariyo ca tuṇhibhāvoti dutiyajjhānasamāpattiṃ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0404a0:263_6: Idaṃ vatvāti imaṃ catūhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ dhammaṃ kathayitvā. Vihāraṃ pāvisīti gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0404a0:264_0: Kālena dhammassavaneti kāle kāle dhammassavanasmiṃ. Dhammasākacchāyāti pañhakathāya.
atk-s0404a0:264_1: Gambhīraṃ atthapadanti gambhīraṃ guḷhaṃ rahassaṃ atthaṃ. Paññāyāti sahavipassanāya
atk-s0404a0:264_3: vā pajjati vāti arahattaṃ patto vā pāpuṇissati vāti evaṃ guṇasambhāvanāya sambhāveti.
atk-s0404a0:264_4: Appattamānasāti appattaarahattā, arahattaṃ vā appattaṃ mānasaṃ etesantipi appattamānasā.
atk-s0404a0:264_5: Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti ettha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro lokiyopi vaṭṭati lokuttaropi.
atk-s0404a0:266_1: Akusalasaṅkhātāti akusalāti ñātā. Esa nayo sabbattha. Nālamariyāti ariyabhāvaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0404a0:266_2: asamatthā, ariyānaṃ vā ananucchavikā. Vodiṭṭhāti suṭṭhu diṭṭhā. Vocaritāti manodvāre
atk-s0404a0:266_3: samudācārappattā. Atthikassāti dhammadesanāya atthikassa. Ājīvikābhayanti jīvitavuttibhayaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:266_4: Asilokabhayanti garahābhayaṃ. Parisāsārajjabhayanti parisaṃ patvā sārajjaṃ okkamanabhayaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:268_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe jīvitaparikkhārāti jīvitasambhārā. Samudānetabbāti samāharitabbā. Kasirena
atk-s0404a0:268_1: samudāgacchantīti dukkhena uppajjanti. Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vāti ettha rattibhāge
atk-s0404a0:268_2: ñatvā rattibhāgeyeva pakkamitabbaṃ, rattiṃ caṇḍavāḷādiparipanthe sati aruṇuggamanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:268_3: āgametabbaṃ. Divasabhāge ñatvā divā pakkamitabbaṃ, divā paripanthe sati sūriyatthaṅgamanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:268_4: āgametabbaṃ. Saṅkhāpīti sāmaññatthassa bhāvanāpāripūriāgamanaṃ jānitvā. So puggaloti
atk-s0404a0:268_5: padassa pana “nānubandhitabbo”ti iminā sambandho. Anāpucchāti idha pana taṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0404a0:268_6: anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho. Api panujjamānenāti api nikkaḍḍhiyamānena. Evarūpo
atk-s0404a0:268_7: hi puggalo sacepi dārukalāpasataṃ vā udakaghaṭasataṃ vā vālikāghaṭasataṃ vā daṇḍaṃ
atk-s0404a0:268_8: āropeti, mā idha vasīti nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, taṃ khamāpetvāpi yāvajīvaṃ so anubandhitabbova, na vijahitabbo.
atk-s0404a0:270_0: 7. Sattame pañca ṭhānāni ajjhācaritunti pañca kāraṇāni atikkamituṃ. Pāṇanti antamaso
atk-s0404a0:270_1: kunthakipillikaṃ. Adinnanti antamaso tiṇasalākampi parasantakaṃ. Theyyasaṅkhātanti
atk-s0404a0:270_2: theyyacittena. Sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitunti sannidhiṃ katvā ṭhapetvā vatthukāmakilesakāme
atk-s0404a0:270_3: paribhuñjituṃ abhabbo. Akappiyaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Buddhaṃ paccakkhātunti
atk-s0404a0:270_4: “na buddho aya”nti evaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ. Dhammādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāya
atk-s0404a0:270_5: āgataṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana imasmiṃ sutte agatigamanāni kathitāni.
atk-s0404a0:272_0: 8-10. Aṭṭhame buddhādīnaṃ paccakkhānaṃ kathitaṃ. Navame puthujjanena saddhiṃ gahitattā
atk-s0404a0:272_1: “āhuneyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Dasame gotrabhūti sotāpattimaggassa anantarapaccayena sikhāpattabalavavipassanācittena
atk-s0404a0:274_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti “sace satthā cārikaṃ pakkamitukāmo
atk-s0404a0:274_1: assa, imasmiṃ kāle pakkameyya. Handāhaṃ cārikaṃ gamanatthāya satthāraṃ āpucchāmī”ti
atk-s0404a0:274_2: cintetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upasaṅkami. Āyasmā maṃ, bhanteti so kira bhikkhu theraṃ
atk-s0404a0:274_3: mahatā bhikkhuparivārena gacchantaṃ disvā “ime bhikkhū tathāgataṃ pahāya sāriputtaṃ
atk-s0404a0:274_4: parivāretvā nikkhantā, gamanavicchedamassa karissāmī”ti aṭṭhāne kopaṃ bandhitvā evamāha.
atk-s0404a0:274_5: Tattha āsajjāti ghaṭṭetvā. Appaṭinissajjāti akkhamāpetvā accayaṃ adesetvā. Kismiṃ
atk-s0404a0:274_6: pana so kāraṇe āghātaṃ bandhīti? Therassa kira dasabalaṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāya gacchato
atk-s0404a0:274_7: cīvarakaṇṇo tassa sarīraṃ phusi, vāto paharītipi vadanti. Ettakena āghātaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0404a0:274_8: theraṃ mahatā parivārena gacchantaṃ disvā usūyamāno “gamanavicchedamassa karissāmī”ti
atk-s0404a0:274_9: evamāha. Ehi tvaṃ bhikkhūti satthā tassa bhikkhuno vacanaṃ sutvā “na taṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0404a0:274_10: sāriputto paharīti vutte, ‘bhante, tumhe attano aggasāvakasseva pakkhaṃ vahatha,
atk-s0404a0:274_11: na mayha’nti mayi manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyyā”ti ñatvā “sāriputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0404a0:274_12: imamatthaṃ pucchissāmī”ti ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā evamāha. Avāpuraṇaṃ ādāyāti kuñcikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:274_13: gahetvā. Sīhanādanti seṭṭhanādaṃ pamukhanādaṃ appaṭivattiyanādaṃ. Evaṃ dvīhi mahātherehi
atk-s0404a0:274_14: ārocito bhikkhusaṅgho rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni pahāya satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Khīyanadhammanti kathādhammaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:275_0: Gūthagatanti gūthameva. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Pathavīsamenāti akujjhanaṭṭhena pathaviyā
atk-s0404a0:275_1: samānena. Na hi pathavī “mayi suciṃ nikkhipantī”ti somanassaṃ karoti, na “asuciṃ
atk-s0404a0:275_2: nikkhipantī”ti domanassaṃ. Mayhampi evarūpaṃ cittanti dasseti. Vipulenāti aparittena.
atk-s0404a0:275_3: Mahaggatenāti mahantabhāvaṃ gatena. Appamāṇenāti vaḍḍhitappamāṇena. Averenāti akusalaverapuggalaverarahitena.
atk-s0404a0:275_4: Abyāpajjhenāti niddukkhena vigatadomanassena. So idhāti so anupaṭṭhitakāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhāno
atk-s0404a0:275_5: bhikkhu evaṃ kareyya, mādiso kathaṃ evarūpaṃ karissati, bhanteti paṭhamaṃ sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0404a0:276_0: Rajoharaṇanti rajasammajjanacoḷakaṃ, pādapuñchanti, tasseva nāmaṃ. Kaḷopihatthoti
atk-s0404a0:276_1: pacchihattho ukkhalihattho vā. Nantakavāsīti antacchinnapilotikavasano. Sūratoti
atk-s0404a0:276_2: sucisīlo soraccena samannāgato. Sudantoti suṭṭhu damathaṃ upagato. Suvinītoti suṭṭhu
atk-s0404a0:276_3: sikkhito. Na kañci hiṃsatīti visāṇādīsu gaṇhantampi piṭṭhiṃ parimajjantampi na kañci
atk-s0404a0:277: Aṭṭīyeyyāti aṭṭo pīḷito bhaveyya. Harāyeyyāti lajjeyya. Jiguccheyyāti jigucchaṃ āpajjeyya.
atk-s0404a0:278_0: Medakathālikanti medakathālikā vuccati sūnakārakehi yūsanikkhamanatthāya tattha tattha
atk-s0404a0:278_1: katachiddā thālikā. Parihareyyāti maṃsassa pūretvā ukkhipitvā gaccheyya. Chiddāvachiddanti
atk-s0404a0:278_2: parittamahantehi chiddehi samannāgataṃ. Uggharantanti uparimukhehi chiddehi nikkhamamānayūsaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:278_3: Paggharantanti adhomukhehi nikkhamamānayūsaṃ. Evamassa sakalasarīraṃ yūsamakkhitaṃ
atk-s0404a0:278_4: bhaveyya. Chiddāvachiddanti navahi vaṇamukhehi parittamahanta chiddaṃ. Evamettha
atk-s0404a0:278_5: aṭṭhamanavamehi dvīhi aṅgehi thero attano sarīre nicchandarāgataṃ kathesi.
atk-s0404a0:279_0: Atha kho so bhikkhūti evaṃ therena navahi kāraṇehi sīhanāde nadite atha so bhikkhu.
atk-s0404a0:279_1: Accayoti aparādho. Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto. Patiggaṇhatūti
atk-s0404a0:279_2: khamatu. Āyatiṃ saṃvarāyāti anāgate saṃvaraṇatthāya, puna evarūpassa aparādhassa
atk-s0404a0:279_3: akaraṇatthāya. Tagghāti ekaṃsena. Yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosīti yathā dhammo ṭhito, tatheva
atk-s0404a0:279_4: karosi, khamāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava aparādhaṃ mayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:279_5: khamāma. Vuddhihesā bhikkhu ariyassa vinayeti esā bhikkhu ariyassa vinaye buddhassa
atk-s0404a0:279_6: bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma. Katamā? Accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā
atk-s0404a0:279_7: āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā. Desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto yo accayaṃ accayato
atk-s0404a0:279_8: disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatīti āha. Phalatīti sace hi
atk-s0404a0:279_9: thero na khameyya, tassa bhikkhuno tattheva sattadhā muddhā phaleyya. Tasmā bhagavā
atk-s0404a0:279_10: evamāha. Sace maṃ soti sace maṃ ayaṃ bhikkhu khamāhīti evaṃ vadati. Khamatu ca me
atk-s0404a0:279_11: soti ayampi cāyasmā mayhaṃ khamatūti evaṃ thero tassa accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā sayampi
atk-s0404a0:281_0: 12. Dutiye saupādisesanti saupādānasesaṃ. Anupādisesanti upādānasesarahitaṃ niggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:281_1: Mattaso kārīti pamāṇakārī na paripūrakārī. Na tāvāyaṃ, sāriputta, dhammapariyāyo
atk-s0404a0:281_2: paṭibhāsīti appaṭibhānaṃ nāma bhagavato natthi, na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ kathesinti
atk-s0404a0:281_3: ayaṃ panettha attho. Māyimaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā pamādaṃ āhariṃsūti “mayaṃ kira
atk-s0404a0:281_4: catūhi apāyehi muttā”ti upari arahattatthāya vīriyaṃ akarontā mā pamādaṃ āpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:281_5: Pañhādhippāyena bhāsitoti tayā pucchitapañhassa sabhāvena kathitoti dasseti. Imesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:281_6: pana navannaṃ puggalānaṃ bhavesu chandarāgavinodanatthaṃ etameva atthuppattiṃ katvā
atk-s0404a0:281_7: – “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakopi gūtho duggandho hoti, evameva kho khvāhaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:281_8: bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi antamaso accharāsaṅghātamattampī”ti imaṃ
atk-s0404a0:281_9: suttaṃ abhāsi. Na kevalañca etesaṃyeva navannaṃ puggalānaṃ gati nibaddhā, yesaṃ pana
atk-s0404a0:281_10: kulānaṃ tīṇi saraṇāni pañca sīlāni ekaṃ salākabhattaṃ ekaṃ pakkhiyabhattaṃ ekaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:281_11: ekā pokkharaṇī eko āvāso, evarūpāni nibaddhapuññāni atthi. Tesampi gati nibaddhā,
atk-s0404a0:283_0: 13. Tatiye diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti imasmiṃ yevattabhāve vipaccanakakammaṃ. Samparāyavedanīyanti
atk-s0404a0:283_1: dutiye attabhāve vipaccanakakammaṃ. Sukhavedanīyanti sukhavedanājanakakammaṃ. Dukkhavedanīyanti
atk-s0404a0:283_3: aladdhavipākavāraṃ. Bahuvedanīyanti bahuvipākadāyakaṃ. Appavedanīyanti na bahuvipākadāyakaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:283_4: Avedanīyanti vipākavedanāya adāyakaṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:285_0: 14. Catutthe samiddhīti attabhāvasamiddhatāya evaṃladdhanāmo therassa saddhivihārikatthero.
atk-s0404a0:285_1: Kimārammaṇāti kiṃpaccayā. Saṅkappavitakkāti saṅkappabhūtā vitakkā. Nāmarūpārammaṇāti
atk-s0404a0:285_2: nāmarūpapaccayā. Iminā cattāro arūpakkhandhā bhūtupādāyarūpañca vitakkānaṃ paccayoti
atk-s0404a0:285_3: dasseti. Kva nānattaṃ gacchantīti kasmiṃ ṭhāne nānāsabhāvataṃ vemattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0404a0:285_4: Dhātusūti rūpadhātuādīsu. Aññoyeva hi rūpavitakko, aññe saddavitakkādayoti. Phassasamudayāti
atk-s0404a0:285_5: sampayuttaphassapaccayā. Vedanāsamosaraṇāti tisso vedanā samosaraṇā. Ettakena kusalākusalamissakā
atk-s0404a0:285_6: kathitā. Samādhippamukhātiādayo pana apacayapakkhikāti veditabbā. Tattha pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena
atk-s0404a0:285_7: jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena vā samādhi pamukhaṃ etesanti samādhippamukhā. Jeṭṭhakakāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0404a0:285_8: sati adhipateyyā etesanti satādhipateyyā. Maggapaññā uttarā etesanti paññuttarā.
atk-s0404a0:285_9: Phalavimuttiṃ patvā sārappattā hontīti vimuttisārā. Ārammaṇavasena amataṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:285_10: ogāhitvā tattha patiṭṭhitāti amatogadhā. Tena ca mā maññīti tena vissajjanena “ahaṃ
atk-s0404a0:285_11: aggasāvakena pucchite pañhe vissajjesi”nti mā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akāsi.
atk-s0404a0:287_0: 15-16. Pañcame tīṇi cattāri vassāni vassagaṇā, aneke vassagaṇā uppannā assāti anekavassagaṇiko.
atk-s0404a0:287_1: Tassassūti tassa bhaveyyuṃ. Abhedanamukhānīti na kenaci bhinditvā katāni, kevalaṃ
atk-s0404a0:287_3: Cātumahābhūtikassāti catumahābhūtamayassa. odanakummāsūpacayassāti odanena ceva kummāsena
atk-s0404a0:287_5: hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccadhammassa, duggandhavighātatthāya tanuvilepanena ucchādanadhammassa,
atk-s0404a0:287_7: vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhavāsena dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:287_8: añchanapīḷanādivasena parimaddanadhammassa, evaṃ pariharitassāpi ca bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassa,
atk-s0404a0:287_9: bhijjanavikiraṇasabhāvassevāti attho. Ettha ca aniccapadena ceva bhedanaviddhaṃsanapadehi
atk-s0404a0:287_10: cassa atthaṅgamo kathito, sesehi samudayo. Nibbindathāti ukkaṇṭhatha pajahatha imaṃ
atk-s0404a0:287_11: kāyanti dasseti. Evamimasmiṃ sutte balavavipassanā kathitā. Chaṭṭhaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0404a0:289_0: 17-18. Sattame na manāpena paccuṭṭhentīti manavaḍḍhanena manaṃ allīyanākārena āsanā
atk-s0404a0:289_1: vuṭṭhāya paccuggamanaṃ na karonti. Na manāpena abhivādentīti na pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0404a0:289_2: vandanti. Asakkaccaṃ dentīti acittīkārena denti. No sakkaccanti sahatthā na denti.
atk-s0404a0:289_3: Na upanisīdanti dhammasavanāyāti “dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti na samīpe nisīdanti. Na sussūsantīti
atk-s0404a0:289_4: ghaṭapiṭṭhe āsittaudakaṃ viya vivaṭṭetvā gacchati. Aṭṭhame veneyyajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0404a0:291_0: 19. Navame vippaṭisāriniyoti vippaṭisāritaṃ maṅkubhāvaṃ āpajjimha. Hīnaṃ kāyanti
atk-s0404a0:291_1: uparidevalokaṃ upādāya heṭṭhimo hīnoti vuccati. No ca kho yathāsatti yathābalaṃ saṃvibhajimhāti
atk-s0404a0:291_2: attano sattiyā ca balassa ca anurūpena sīlavantānaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā na bhuñjimhā.
atk-s0404a0:293_0: 20. Dasame api nu te, gahapati, kule dānaṃ dīyatīti nayidaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0404a0:293_1: dānaṃ sandhāya pucchati. Seṭṭhissa hi ghare bhikkhusaṅghassa niccaṃ paṇītadānaṃ dīyati,
atk-s0404a0:293_2: na taṃ satthā na jānāti. Lokiyamahājanassa pana diyyamānadānaṃ atthi, taṃ lūkhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:293_3: hoti, seṭṭhissa cittaṃ na pīṇeti. Taṃ pucchāmīti pucchati. Kaṇājakanti sakuṇḍakabhattaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:293_4: sakuṇḍakehipi kaṇikataṇḍuleheva pakkaṃ. Biḷaṅgadutiyanti kañjiyadutiyaṃ. Asakkaccaṃ
atk-s0404a0:293_5: detīti asakkaritvā deti. Acittīkatvāti acittīkārena dakkhiṇeyya agāravena deti. Asahatthā
atk-s0404a0:293_6: detīti sahatthena adatvā parahatthena deti, āṇattimattameva karotīti attho. Apaviddhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:293_7: detīti na nirantaraṃ deti, saṃvaccharikaṃ soṇḍabali viya hoti. Anāgamanadiṭṭhiko
atk-s0404a0:293_8: detīti na kammañca phalañca saddahitvā deti.
atk-s0404a0:294_0: Yattha yatthāti tīsu kulasampadāsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kule. Na uḷārāya bhattabhogāyātiādīsu
atk-s0404a0:294_1: nānaggarasasugandhasālibhojane upanīte cittaṃ na namati, “harathetaṃ rogavaḍḍhana”nti
atk-s0404a0:294_2: vatvā yena vā tena vā ḍākena saddhiṃ sakuṇḍakabhattaṃ amataṃ viya sampiyāyamāno bhuñjati.
atk-s0404a0:294_3: Kāsikādīsu varavatthesu upanītesu “harathetāni nivāsentassa paṭicchādetumpi na sakkonti,
atk-s0404a0:294_4: gattesupi na saṇṭhahantī”ti vatvā nāḷikerasāṭakamūlatacasadisāni pana thūlavatthāni
atk-s0404a0:294_5: “imāni nivāsento nivatthabhāvampi jānāti, paṭicchādetabbampi paṭicchādentī”ti sampiyāyamāno
atk-s0404a0:294_7: na sakkā ettha nisīditu”nti vatvā jajjararathake upanīte “ayaṃ niccalo, ettha sukhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:294_8: nisīditu”nti taṃ sādiyati. Na uḷāresu pañcasu kāmaguṇesūti alaṅkatapaṭiyattā rūpavatiyo
atk-s0404a0:294_9: itthiyo disvā “yakkhiniyo maññe, etā khāditukāmā, kiṃ etāhī”ti yathāphāsukeneva vītināmeti.
atk-s0404a0:294_10: Na sussūsantīti sotuṃ na icchanti, na saddahantīti attho. Na sotaṃ odahantīti kathitassa
atk-s0404a0:294_11: savanatthaṃ na sotapasādaṃ odahanti. Sakkaccantiādīni vuttavipariyāyena veditabbāni.
atk-s0404a0:295_0: Velāmoti jātigottarūpabhogasaddhāpaññādīhi mariyādavelaṃ atikkantehi uḷārehi guṇehi
atk-s0404a0:295_1: samannāgatattā evaṃladdhanāmo. So evarūpaṃ dānaṃ adāsi mahādānanti ettha ayaṃ anupubbīkathā
atk-s0404a0:295_2: – so kira atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ purohitagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, velāmakumārotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0404a0:295_3: akaṃsu. So soḷasavassakāle bārāṇasirājakumārena saddhiṃ sippuggahaṇatthaṃ takkasilaṃ
atk-s0404a0:295_4: agamāsi. Te ubhopi disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippaṃ paṭṭhapayiṃsu. Yathā
atk-s0404a0:295_5: ca te, evaṃ aññepi jambudīpe caturāsītisahassarājakumārā. Bodhisatto attanā gahitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0404a0:295_6: piṭṭhiācariyo hutvā caturāsīti rājakumārasahassāni sikkhāpeti, sayampi soḷasavassehi
atk-s0404a0:295_7: gahetabbasippaṃ tīhi vassehi uggaṇhi. Ācariyo “velāmakumārassa sippaṃ paguṇa”nti
atk-s0404a0:295_8: ñatvā, “tātā, velāmo mayā ñātaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti, tumhe sabbepi samaggā gantvā etassa
atk-s0404a0:295_9: santike sippaṃ uggaṇhathā”ti caturāsīti kumārasahassāni bodhisattassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0404a0:296_0: Bodhisatto ācariyaṃ vanditvā caturāsīti kumārasahassaparivāro nikkhamitvā ekaṃ āsannanagaraṃ
atk-s0404a0:296_1: patvā nagarasāmikaṃ rājakumāraṃ uggaṇhāpetvā tassa sippe paguṇe jāte taṃ tattheva
atk-s0404a0:296_2: nivattesi. Etenupāyena caturāsīti nagarasahassāni gantvā caturāsītiyā rājakumārānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:296_3: sippaṃ paguṇaṃ kāretvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ nagare taṃ taṃ nivattetvā bārāṇasirājakumāraṃ
atk-s0404a0:296_4: ādāya bārāṇasiṃ paccāgañchi. Manussā kumāraṃ pariyositasippaṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu,
atk-s0404a0:296_5: velāmassa purohitaṭṭhānaṃ adaṃsu. Tepi caturāsītisahassarājakumārā sakesu sakesu
atk-s0404a0:296_6: rajjesu abhisekaṃ patvā anusaṃvaccharaṃ bārāṇasirañño upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti. Te rājānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:296_7: disvā velāmassa santikaṃ gantvā, “ācariya, amhe rajjesu patiṭṭhitā, vadeyyātha yenattho”ti
atk-s0404a0:296_9: gaṇhantānaṃ janapado ativiya upadduto hoti, mahājano sannipatitvā rājaṅgaṇe kandati.
atk-s0404a0:297_0: Rājā velāmaṃ pakkositvā, “ācariya, upadduto janapado, rājāno gamanāgamanakāle mahāvilopaṃ
atk-s0404a0:297_1: karonti, manussā sandhāretuṃ na sakkonti, janapadapīḷāya upasamaṃ ekaṃ upāyaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0404a0:297_2: Sādhu mahārāja, upāyaṃ karissāmi, tumhākaṃ yattakena janapadena attho, taṃ paricchinditvā
atk-s0404a0:297_3: gaṇhathāti. Rājā tathā akāsi. Velāmo caturāsītiyā rājasahassānaṃ janapade vicāretvā
atk-s0404a0:297_4: cakkanābhiyaṃ are viya rañño janapadasmiṃ oropesi. Tato paṭṭhāya te rājāno āgacchantāpi
atk-s0404a0:297_5: gacchantāpi attano attano janapadeneva sañcaranti, amhākaṃ janapadoti vilopaṃ na
atk-s0404a0:297_6: karonti. Rājagāravena rañño janapadampi na pīḷenti. Janapadā sannisinnā nissaddā
atk-s0404a0:297_7: niravā ahesuṃ. Sabbe rājāno haṭṭhatuṭṭhā “yena vo, ācariya, attho, taṃ amhākaṃ vadethā”ti pavārayiṃsu.
atk-s0404a0:298_0: Velāmo sīsaṃnhāto attano antonivesane sattaratanaparipūrānaṃ gabbhānaṃ dvārāni vivarāpetvā
atk-s0404a0:298_1: yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ṭhapitaṃ dhanaṃ oloketvā āyavayaṃ upadhāretvā “mayā sakalajambudīpaṃ
atk-s0404a0:298_2: khobhentena dānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti rañño ārocetvā gaṅgātīre dvādasayojanikā uddhanapantiyo
atk-s0404a0:298_3: kāretvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sappimadhuphāṇitatelatilataṇḍulādīnaṃ ṭhapanatthāya mahākoṭṭhāgārāni
atk-s0404a0:298_4: patiṭṭhāpetvā “ekekasmiṃ ṭhāne ettakā ettakā janā saṃvidahatha, yaṃkiñci manussānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:298_5: laddhabbaṃ nāma atthi, tato ekasmimpi asati mayhaṃ āroceyyāthā”ti manusse saṃvidhāya
atk-s0404a0:298_6: “asukadivasato paṭṭhāya velāmabrāhmaṇassa dānaṃ bhuñjantū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-s0404a0:298_7: “dānaggaṃ pariniṭṭhita”nti dānayuttehi ārocite sahassagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0404a0:298_8: pañcasatagghanakaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārabhūsito dānavīmaṃsanatthāya phalikavaṇṇassa
atk-s0404a0:298_9: udakassa suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ pūretvā “imasmiṃ loke sace imaṃ dānaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttarūpā
atk-s0404a0:298_10: dakkhiṇeyyapuggalā atthi, idaṃ udakaṃ nikkhamitvā pathaviṃ gaṇhātu. Sace natthi,
atk-s0404a0:298_11: evameva tiṭṭhatū”ti saccakiriyaṃ katvā bhiṅgāraṃ adhomukhaṃ akāsi. Udakaṃ dhamakaraṇena
atk-s0404a0:298_12: gahitaṃ viya ahosi. Bodhisatto “suñño vata, bho, jambudīpo, ekapuggalopi dakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:298_13: paṭiggahetuṃ yuttarūpo natthī”ti vippaṭisāraṃ akatvā “sace dāyakassa vasenāyaṃ dakkhiṇā
atk-s0404a0:298_14: visujjhissati, udakaṃ nikkhamitvā pathaviṃ gaṇhātū”ti cintesi. Phalikavaṇṇasadisaṃ
atk-s0404a0:298_15: udakaṃ nikkhamitvā pathaviṃ gaṇhi. “Idāni dānaṃ dassāmī”ti dānaggaṃ patvā dānaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0404a0:298_16: yāguvelāya yāguṃ, khajjakavelāya khajjakaṃ, bhojanavelāya bhojanaṃ dāpesi. Eteneva
atk-s0404a0:299_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana dānagge “idaṃ nāma atthi, idaṃ nāma natthī”ti vattabbaṃ natthi. Idāni
atk-s0404a0:299_1: taṃ dānaṃ ettakamatteneva na niṭṭhaṃ gamissatīti rattasuvaṇṇaṃ nīharāpetvā suvaṇṇapātiyo
atk-s0404a0:299_3: pahiṇi. Rājāno “cirassaṃ vata mayaṃ ācariyena anuggahitā”ti sabbaṃ sampādetvā pesesuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:299_4: Dāne diyyamāneyeva satta vassāni satta māsā atikkantā. Atha brāhmaṇo “hiraññaṃ bhājetvā
atk-s0404a0:299_5: dānaṃ dassāmī”ti mahante okāse dānaṃ sajjāpesi. Sajjāpetvā caturāsīti suvaṇṇapātisahassāni
atk-s0404a0:300_0: Tattha rūpiyapūrānīti rajatataṭṭirajataphālarajatamāsakehi pūrāni. Pātiyo pana khuddikāti
atk-s0404a0:300_1: na sallakkhetabbā, ekakarīsappamāṇe bhūmibhāge catassova pātiyo ṭhapayiṃsu. Pātimakuḷaṃ
atk-s0404a0:300_2: navaratanaṃ hoti, mukhavaṭṭito paṭṭhāya aṭṭharatanaṃ, pātimukhavaṭṭiyā chayutto ājaññaratho
atk-s0404a0:300_3: anupariyāyati, dadamāno pātiyā bāhirantena vaggavagge paṭiggāhake ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0404a0:300_4: pātiyā pakkhittaṃ datvā pacchā sandhisandhito viyojetvā pātinti evaṃ caturāsīti pātisahassāni
atk-s0404a0:300_5: adāsi. Rūpiyapātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Etthapi ca suvaṇṇapūrānīti suvaṇṇataṭṭisuvaṇṇaphālasuvaṇṇamāsakehi
atk-s0404a0:300_7: Kaṃsūpadhāraṇānīti rajatamayakhīrapaṭicchakāni. Tāsaṃ pana dhenūnaṃ siṅgāni suvaṇṇakosakapariyonaddhāni
atk-s0404a0:300_8: ahesuṃ, gīvāya sumanadāmaṃ piḷandhiṃsu, catūsu pādesu nupūrāni, piṭṭhiyaṃ varadukūlaṃ
atk-s0404a0:300_9: pārutaṃ, kaṇṭhe suvaṇṇaghaṇṭaṃ bandhiṃsu. Vatthakoṭisahassānīti lokavohārato vīsativatthayugāni
atk-s0404a0:300_10: ekā koṭi, idha pana dasa sāṭakāti vuttaṃ. Khomasukhumānantiādimhi khomādīsu yaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0404a0:300_11: sukhumaṃ, taṃ tadeva adāsi. Yāni panetāni itthidānaṃ usabhadānaṃ majjadānaṃ samajjādānanti
atk-s0404a0:300_12: adānasammatāni, tānipi esa “velāmassa dānamukhe idaṃ nāma natthī”ti vacanapathaṃ
atk-s0404a0:300_13: pacchindituṃ parivāratthāya adāsi. Najjo maññe vissandantīti nadiyo viya vissandanti.
atk-s0404a0:301_0: Iminā satthā velāmassa dānaṃ kathetvā, “gahapati, etaṃ mahādānaṃ nāñño adāsi, ahaṃ
atk-s0404a0:301_1: adāsiṃ. Evarūpaṃ pana dānaṃ dadantopi ahaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttarūpaṃ puggalaṃ nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:301_2: tvaṃ mādise buddhe lokasmiṃ diṭṭhamāne dānaṃ dadamāno kasmā cintesī”ti seṭṭhissa
atk-s0404a0:301_3: desanaṃ vaḍḍhento siyā kho pana tetiādimāha. Nanu ca yāni tadā ahesuṃ rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇāni,
atk-s0404a0:301_4: tāni niruddhāni? Kasmā “ahaṃ tena samayena velāmo brāhmaṇo”ti āhāti? Paveṇiyā avicchinnattā.
atk-s0404a0:301_5: Tāni hi rūpādīni nirujjhamānāni imesaṃ paccaye datvā niruddhāni aparāparaṃ avicchinnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:301_6: paveṇiṃ gahetvā evamāha. Na taṃ koci dakkhiṇaṃ sodhetīti koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0404a0:301_7: vā devo vā māro vā uṭṭhāya taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ sodhetīti vattabbo nāhosi. Tañhi dakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:301_8: sodhento uttamakoṭiyā buddho, heṭṭhimakoṭiyā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherasadiso sāvako sodheyya.
atk-s0404a0:302_0: Diṭṭhisampannanti dassanasampannaṃ sotāpannaṃ. Idaṃ tato mahapphalataranti idaṃ sotāpannassa
atk-s0404a0:302_1: dinnadānaṃ lokiyamahājanassa sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni ettakaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:303_0: Yo ca sataṃ diṭṭhisampannānanti ettha ekassa sakadāgāmissa vasena ekuttarasataṃ sotāpanne
atk-s0404a0:303_1: katvā sotāpannagaṇanā veditabbā. Iminā upāyena sabbavāresu heṭṭhā heṭṭhā āgate anantarena
atk-s0404a0:304_0: Buddhappamukhanti ettha sammāsambuddhaṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā nisinno saṅgho buddhappamukho
atk-s0404a0:304_1: saṅghoti veditabbo. Cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissāti ettha cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa
atk-s0404a0:304_2: katavihāro nāma yattha cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti, dhammassavanaṃ karīyati, catūhi
atk-s0404a0:304_3: disāhi anudisāhi ca bhikkhū āgantvā appaṭipucchitvāyeva pāde dhovitvā kuñcikāya dvāraṃ
atk-s0404a0:304_4: vivaritvā senāsanaṃ paṭijaggitvā vasitvā yathāphāsukaṃ gacchanti. So antamaso caturataniyā
atk-s0404a0:304_5: paṇṇasālāpi hotu, cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa katavihārotveva vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:305_0: Saraṇaṃ gaccheyyāti ettha maggenāgataṃ anivattanasaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Apare panāhu
atk-s0404a0:305_1: – attānaṃ niyyādetvā dinnattā saraṇāgamanaṃ tato mahapphalataranti vuttaṃ. Sikkhāpadāni
atk-s0404a0:305_2: samādiyeyyāti pañca sīlāni gaṇheyya. Sīlampi maggena āgataṃ anivattanasīlameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:305_3: Apare panāhu – sabbasattānaṃ abhayadānassa dinnattā sīlaṃ tato mahapphalataranti
atk-s0404a0:305_4: vuttaṃ. Gandhohanamattanti gandhaūhanamattaṃ, dvīhaṅgulīhi gaṇḍapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā upasiṅghanamattaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:305_5: Apare pana “gaddohanamatta”nti pāḷiṃ vatvā gāviyā ekavāraṃ thanaañchanamattanti atthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:305_6: vadanti. Mettacittanti sabbasattānaṃ hitānupharaṇacittaṃ. Taṃ pana appanāvaseneva
atk-s0404a0:306_0: Upamāto pana imāni dānādīni puññāni evaṃ veditabbāni – sacepi hi jambudīpaṃ bheritalasadisaṃ
atk-s0404a0:306_1: samatalaṃ katvā koṭito paṭṭhāya pallaṅke attharitvā ariyapuggale nisīdāpeyya, tattha
atk-s0404a0:306_2: sotāpannānaṃ dasa pantiyo assu, sakadāgāmīnaṃ pañca, anāgāmīnaṃ aḍḍhateyyā, khiṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:306_3: diyaḍḍhā, paccekabuddhānaṃ ekā panti bhaveyya, sammāsambuddho ekakova. Ettakassa
atk-s0404a0:306_4: janassa dinnadānato sammāsambuddhassa dinnameva mahapphalaṃ. Itaraṃ pana –
atk-s0404a0:309: Teneva bhagavā parinibbānasamaye “dhammānudhammappaṭipatti anuttarā pūjā”ti āha. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:311_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame uttarakurukāti uttarakuruvāsino. Adhiggaṇhantīti adhibhavanti,
atk-s0404a0:311_1: adhikā visiṭṭhā jeṭṭhakā honti. Amamāti nittaṇhā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana niddukkhāti
atk-s0404a0:311_2: vuttaṃ. Apariggahāti “idaṃ mayha”nti pariggaharahitā. Niyatāyukāti tesañhi nibaddhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:311_3: āyu vassasahassameva, gatipi nibaddhā, tato cavitvā saggeyeva nibbattanti. Satimantoti
atk-s0404a0:311_4: devatānañhi ekantasukhitāya sati thirā na hoti, nerayikānaṃ ekantadukkhitāya. Imesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:311_5: pana vokiṇṇasukhadukkhattā sati thirā hoti. Idha brahmacariyavāsoti jambudīpe buddhapaccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:313_0: 22. Dutiye javasampannoti padajavena sampanno. Na vaṇṇasampannoti na sarīravaṇṇena
atk-s0404a0:313_1: sampanno. Purisakhaḷuṅkesu javasampannoti ñāṇajavena sampanno. Na vaṇṇasampannoti
atk-s0404a0:313_2: na guṇavaṇṇena sampanno. Sesaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yañhettha vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0404a0:315_0: 23. Tatiye taṇhaṃ paṭiccāti dve taṇhā esanataṇhā esitataṇhā ca. Yāya taṇhāya ajapathasaṅkupathādīni
atk-s0404a0:315_1: paṭipajjitvā bhoge esati gavesati, ayaṃ esanataṇhā nāma. Yā tesu esitesu gavesitesu
atk-s0404a0:315_2: paṭiladdhesu taṇhā, ayaṃ esitataṇhā nāma. Idha pana esanataṇhā daṭṭhabbā. Pariyesanāti
atk-s0404a0:315_3: rūpādiārammaṇapariyesanā. Sā hi esanataṇhāya sati hoti. Lābhoti rūpādiārammaṇapaṭilābho.
atk-s0404a0:316_1: jaññā, sukhavinicchayaṃ ñatvā ajjhattaṃ sukhamanuyuñjeyyā”ti ayaṃ ñāṇavinicchayo.
atk-s0404a0:316_2: “Vinicchayāti dve vinicchayā taṇhāvinicchayo ca diṭṭhivinicchayo cā”ti evaṃ āgatāni
atk-s0404a0:316_4: kho, devānaminda, vitakkanidāno”ti imasmiṃ pana sutte idha vinicchayoti vutto vitakkoyeva
atk-s0404a0:316_5: āgato. Lābhaṃ labhitvā hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ sundarāsundaraṃ vitakkeneva vinicchinanti
atk-s0404a0:316_6: “ettakaṃ me rūpārammaṇatthāya bhavissati, ettakaṃ saddhārammaṇatthāya, ettakaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:316_7: bhavissati, ettakaṃ parassa, ettakaṃ paribhuñjissāmi, ettakaṃ nidahissāmī”ti. Tena
atk-s0404a0:317_0: Chandarāgoti evaṃ akusalavitakkena vitakkite vatthusmiṃ dubbalarāgo ca balavarāgo
atk-s0404a0:317_1: ca uppajjati. Idañhi idha chandoti dubbalarāgassādhivacanaṃ. Ajjhosānanti ahaṃ mamanti
atk-s0404a0:317_3: parehi sādhāraṇabhāvassa asahanatā. Tenevassa porāṇā evaṃ vacanatthaṃ vadanti – “idaṃ
atk-s0404a0:317_4: acchariyaṃ mayhameva hotu, mā aññassa acchariyaṃ hotūti pavattattā macchariyanti
atk-s0404a0:317_5: vuccatī”ti. Ārakkhoti dvārapidahanamañjūsāgopanādivasena suṭṭhu rakkhanaṃ. Adhikarotīti
atk-s0404a0:317_6: adhikaraṇaṃ, kāraṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Ārakkhādhikaraṇanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, ārakkhāhetūti
atk-s0404a0:317_7: attho. Daṇḍādānādīsu paranisedhanatthaṃ daṇḍassa ādānaṃ daṇḍādānaṃ. Ekato dhārādino
atk-s0404a0:317_8: satthassa ādānaṃ satthādānaṃ. Kalahoti kāyakalahopi vācākalahopi. Purimo viggaho,
atk-s0404a0:319_0: 24. Catutthe sattāvāsāti sattānaṃ āvāsā, vasanaṭṭhānānīti attho. Tattha suddhāvāsāpi
atk-s0404a0:319_1: sattāvāsova, asabbakālikattā pana na gahitā. Suddhāvāsā hi buddhānaṃ khandhāvāraṭṭhānasadisā,
atk-s0404a0:319_2: asaṅkheyyakappe buddhesu anibbattesu taṃ ṭhānaṃ suññaṃ hoti. Iti asabbakālikattā
atk-s0404a0:319_3: na gahitā. Sesamettha viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:321_0: 25. Pañcame yatoti yasmiṃ kāle. Suparicitaṃ hotīti suṭṭhu upacitaṃ suvaḍḍhitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0404a0:321_1: Kallaṃ vacanāyāti yuttaṃ vattuṃ. Vītarāganti vigatarāgaṃ. Asarāgadhammanti na sarajjanasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:323_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe candikāputtoti mātu nāmavasena paññāto candikāputtatthero. Cetasā cittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:323_1: hotīti cittavārapariyāyena cittavārapariyāyo cito vaḍḍhito hoti. Cetasā cittaṃ suparicitanti
atk-s0404a0:323_2: cittavārapariyāyena cittavārapariyāyo uparūpari sucito suvaḍḍhito hoti. Nevassa cittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:323_3: pariyādiyantīti tāni ārammaṇāni tassa khīṇāsavassa cittuppādaṃ gahetvā khepetvā ṭhātuṃ
atk-s0404a0:323_4: na sakkonti. Amissīkatanti tāni ārammaṇāni anallīnattā tehi amissīkataṃ. Āneñjappattanti
atk-s0404a0:324_0: Silāyūpoti silāthambho. Soḷasakukkukoti dīghato soḷasahattho. Heṭṭhānemaṅgamāti āvāṭassa
atk-s0404a0:324_1: heṭṭhāgatā. Upari nemassāti upari āvāṭassa. Sunikhātattāti ayamusalehi koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā
atk-s0404a0:324_2: suṭṭhu nikhātattā. Evameva khoti ettha silāyūpo viya khīṇāsavo daṭṭhabbo, mahāvātā
atk-s0404a0:324_3: viya chasu dvāresu uppajjanakā kilesā, catūhi disāhi āgantvā vātānaṃ silāyūpaṃ cāletuṃ
atk-s0404a0:324_4: asamatthabhāvo viya chasu dvāresu uppajjanakakilesānaṃ khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ cāletuṃ
atk-s0404a0:324_5: asamatthabhāvo veditabbo. Imasmimpi sutte khīṇāsavova kathito.
atk-s0404a0:326_0: 27-28. Sattame bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavatīti cittutrāsabhayañca puggalaverañca paṭilabhati.
atk-s0404a0:326_1: Cetasikanti cittanissitaṃ. Dukkhanti kāyavatthukaṃ. Domanassanti paṭighasampayuttadukkhaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:326_2: Imasmiṃ sutte sotāpattimaggo kathito. Aṭṭhamaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa kathitaṃ, imasmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:328: 29. Navame āghātavatthūnīti āghātakāraṇāni. Āghātaṃ bandhatīti kopaṃ bandhati uppādeti.
atk-s0404a0:330_0: 30-31. Dasame āghātapaṭivinayāti āghātassa paṭivinayakāraṇāni. Taṃ kutettha labbhāti
atk-s0404a0:330_1: “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”ti etasmiṃ puggale kuto labbhā, kena kāraṇena sakkā
atk-s0404a0:330_2: laddhuṃ, “paro nāma parassa attano cittaruciyā anatthaṃ karotī”ti evaṃ cintetvā āghātaṃ
atk-s0404a0:330_3: paṭivineti. Atha vā sacāhaṃ kopaṃ kareyyaṃ, taṃ kopakaraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā,
atk-s0404a0:330_4: kena kāraṇena laddhabbanti attho. Kuto lābhātipi pāṭho. Sacāhaṃ ettha kopaṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:330_5: tasmiṃ me kopakaraṇe kuto lābhā lābhā, nāma ke siyunti attho. Imasmiñca atthe tanti
atk-s0404a0:330_6: nipātamattameva hoti. Ekādasame anupubbanirodhāti anupaṭipāṭinirodhā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:332_0: 32-33. Catutthassa paṭhame anupubbavihārāti anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbavihārā. Dutiye
atk-s0404a0:332_1: yattha kāmā nirujjhantīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne kāmā vūpasammanti. Nirodhetvāti appaṭivatte
atk-s0404a0:332_2: katvā. Nicchātāti taṇhādiṭṭhicchātānaṃ abhāvena nicchātā. Nibbutāti attaparitāpanakilesānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:332_3: abhāvena nibbutā. Tiṇṇāti kāmato tiṇṇā. Pāraṃgatāti kāme pāraṃ gatā. Tadaṅgenāti
atk-s0404a0:332_4: tena jhānaṅgena. Ettha kāmā nirujjhantīti ettha paṭhamajjhāne kāmā nirujjhanti. Te
atk-s0404a0:332_5: cāti ye paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjanti, te kāme nirodhetvā nirodhetvā viharanti nāma.
atk-s0404a0:332_6: Pañjalikoti paggahitaañjaliko hutvā. Payirupāseyyāti upaṭṭhāpeyya. Iminā upāyena
atk-s0404a0:334_0: 34. Tatiye udāyīti lāḷudāyitthero. Etadeva khvetthāti etadeva kho ettha. Kāmasahagatāti
atk-s0404a0:334_1: kāmanissitā. Samudācarantīti manodvāre sañcaranti. Ābādhāyāti ābādhanāya pīḷanāya.
atk-s0404a0:334_2: Pariyāyenāti kāraṇena. Evaṃ sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Imasmiṃ sutte avedayitasukhaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:336_0: 35. Catutthe pabbateyyāti pabbatacārinī. Na suppatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti yathā
atk-s0404a0:336_1: suppatiṭṭhitā hoti, evaṃ na patiṭṭhāpetvā. Taṃ nimittanti taṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0404a0:336_2: nimittaṃ. Na svādhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti yathā suṭṭhu adhiṭṭhitaṃ hoti, na evaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0404a0:336_3: Anabhihiṃsamānoti apothento aviheṭhento. Mudu cittaṃ hoti kammaññanti yathā vipassanācittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:336_4: lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe mudu kammakkhamaṃ kammayoggaṃ hoti, evamassa abhiññāpādakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:336_5: catutthajjhānacittaṃ mudu hoti kammaññaṃ. Appamāṇo samādhīti catubrahmavihārasamādhipi
atk-s0404a0:336_6: maggaphalasamādhipi appamāṇo samādhi nāma, idha pana “appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇa”nti
atk-s0404a0:336_7: iminā pariyāyena suppaguṇasamādhi appamāṇasamādhīti daṭṭhabbo. So appamāṇena samādhinā
atk-s0404a0:336_8: subhāvitenāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne ayaṃ bhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patto. Idāni
atk-s0404a0:336_9: khīṇāsavassa abhiññāpaṭipāṭiṃ dassento yassa yassa cātiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:338_0: 36. Pañcame āsavānaṃ khayanti arahattaṃ. Yadeva tattha hoti rūpagatanti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānakkhaṇe
