atk-s0404a0:338_1: vatthuvasena vā cittasamuṭṭhānikādivasena vā yaṃ rūpaṃ nāma pavattati. Vedanāgatādīni
atk-s0404a0:338_2: sampayuttavedanādīnaṃ vasena veditabbāni. Te dhammeti te rūpādayo pañcakkhandhadhamme.
atk-s0404a0:338_3: Aniccatotiādīsu hutvā abhāvākārena aniccato, paṭipīḷanākārena dukkhato, rujjanākārena
atk-s0404a0:338_4: rogato, antodussanaṭṭhena gaṇḍato, anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena anukantanaṭṭhena ca sallato,
atk-s0404a0:338_5: dukkhaṭṭhena aghato, ābādhanaṭṭhena ābādhato, asakaṭṭhena parato, palujjanaṭṭhena
atk-s0404a0:338_6: palokato, assāmikaṭṭhena suññato, avasavattanaṭṭhena anattato. Samanupassatīti balavavipassanāpaññāya passati.
atk-s0404a0:339_0: Tehi dhammehīti tehi pañcakkhandhadhammehi. Paṭivāpetīti nibbānavasena nivatteti.
atk-s0404a0:339_1: Amatāya dhātuyāti nibbānadhātuyā. Cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti ñāṇena ānisaṃsaṃ disvā otāreti.
atk-s0404a0:339_2: Santanti paccanīkasantatāya santaṃ. Paṇītanti atappakaṃ. So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:339_3: khayaṃ pāpuṇātīti so tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhāne ṭhito taṃ balavavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:339_4: pāpuṇāti. Aparo nayo – so tehi dhammehīti yasmā aniccatotiādīsu aniccato palokatoti
atk-s0404a0:339_5: dvīhi padehi aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ, dukkhatotiādīhi chahi dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, parato,
atk-s0404a0:339_6: suññato, anattatoti tīhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā so tehi evaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0404a0:339_7: diṭṭhehi antosamāpattiyaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammehi. Cittaṃ paṭivāpetīti cittaṃ paṭisaṃharati
atk-s0404a0:339_8: moceti apaneti. Upasaṃharatīti vipassanācittaṃ tāva savanavasena thutivasena pariyattivasena
atk-s0404a0:339_9: paññattivasena ca santaṃ nibbānanti evaṃ asaṅkhatāya amatāya dhātuyā upasaṃharati.
atk-s0404a0:339_10: Maggacittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva “etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇīta”nti na evaṃ
atk-s0404a0:339_11: vadati. Iminā panākārena taṃ paṭivijjhanto tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:340_0: So tattha ṭhitoti tassā tilakkhaṇārammaṇāya vipassanāya ṭhito. Āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇātīti
atk-s0404a0:340_1: anukkamena cattāro magge bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Teneva dhammarāgenāti samathavipassanādhamme
atk-s0404a0:340_2: chandarāgena. Dhammanandiyāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Samathavipassanāsu hi sabbaso chandarāgaṃ
atk-s0404a0:340_3: pariyādātuṃ sakkonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, asakkonto anāgāmī hoti.
atk-s0404a0:341_0: Tiṇapurisarūpake vāti tiṇapotthakarūpe vā. Dūre kaṇḍe pātetīti dūrepātī. Avirādhitaṃ
atk-s0404a0:341_1: vijjhatīti akkhaṇavedhī. Yadeva tattha hoti vedanāgatanti idha rūpaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:341_2: Kasmā? Samatikkantattā. Ayañhi heṭṭhā rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā rūpaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0404a0:341_3: arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannoti samathavasenāpi anena rūpaṃ samatikkantaṃ, heṭṭhā
atk-s0404a0:341_4: rūpaṃ sammasitvā taṃ atikkamma idāni arūpaṃ sammasatīti vipassanāvasenāpi anena rūpaṃ
atk-s0404a0:341_5: atikkantaṃ. Āruppe pana sabbasopi rūpaṃ natthīti taṃ sandhāyapi rūpaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:341_6: Atha nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ kasmā na gahitanti? Sukhumattā. Tasmiñhi cattāropi arūpakkhandhā
atk-s0404a0:341_7: sukhumā na sammasanūpagā. Tenevāha – “iti kho, bhikkhave, yāvatā saññāsamāpatti tāvatā
atk-s0404a0:341_8: aññāpaṭivedho”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāvatā sacittakasamāpatti nāma atthi, tāvatā
atk-s0404a0:341_9: oḷārike dhamme sammasato aññāpaṭivedho hoti, arahattaṃ sampajjati. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:341_10: pana sukhumattā saññāsamāpattīti na vuccati. Jhāyīheteti jhāyīhi jhānābhiratehi etāni.
atk-s0404a0:341_11: Vuṭṭhahitvāti tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya. Samakkhātabbānīti sammā akkhātabbāni, “santāni
atk-s0404a0:341_12: paṇītānī”ti evaṃ kevalaṃ ācikkhitabbāni thometabbāni vaṇṇetabbānīti.
atk-s0404a0:343_0: 37. Chaṭṭhe sambādheti pañcakāmaguṇasambādhe. Okāsādhigamoti okāsassa adhigamo. Sattānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:343_1: visuddhiyāti sattānaṃ visuddhiṃ pāpanatthāya. Samatikkamāyāti samatikkamanatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:343_2: Atthaṅgamāyāti atthaṃ gamanatthāya. Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti sahavipassanakassa maggassa
atk-s0404a0:343_4: Tadeva nāma cakkhuṃ bhavissatīti taññeva pasādacakkhu asambhinnaṃ bhavissati. Te
atk-s0404a0:343_5: rūpāti tadeva rūpārammaṇaṃ āpāthaṃ āgamissati. Tañcāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedissatīti
atk-s0404a0:343_6: tañca rūpāyatanaṃ na jānissati. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0404a0:344_0: Udāyīti kāḷudāyitthero. Saññīmeva nu khoti sacittakoyeva nu kho. Makāro padasandhimattaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:344_1: Kiṃsaññīti katarasaññāya saññī hutvā. Sabbaso rūpasaññānanti idaṃ kasmā gaṇhi, kiṃ
atk-s0404a0:344_2: paṭhamajjhānādisamaṅgino rūpādipaṭisaṃvedanā hotīti? Na hoti, yāva pana kasiṇarūpaṃ
atk-s0404a0:344_3: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tāva rūpaṃ samatikkantaṃ nāma na hoti. Asamatikkantattā paccayo bhavituṃ
atk-s0404a0:344_4: sakkhissati. Samatikkantattā pana taṃ natthi nāma hoti, natthitāya paccayo bhavituṃ
atk-s0404a0:345_0: Jaṭilavāsikāti jaṭilanagaravāsinī. Na cābhinatotiādīsu rāgavasena na abhinato, dosavasena
atk-s0404a0:345_1: na apanato. Sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā ṭhito, kilesānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:345_2: pana chinnante uppannoti na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato. Vimuttattā ṭhitoti kilesehi
atk-s0404a0:345_3: vimuttattāyeva ṭhito. Ṭhitattā santusitoti ṭhitattāyeva santuṭṭho nāma jāto. Santusitattā
atk-s0404a0:345_4: no paritassatīti santuṭṭhattāyeva paritāsaṃ nāpajjati. Ayaṃ, bhante ānanda, samādhi
atk-s0404a0:345_5: kiṃ phaloti iminā ayaṃ therī tālaphalaññeva gahetvā “idaṃ phalaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ nāmā”ti
atk-s0404a0:345_6: pucchamānā viya arahattaphalasamādhiṃ gahetvā “ayaṃ, bhante ānanda, samādhi kiṃ phalo
atk-s0404a0:345_7: vutto bhagavatā”ti pucchati. Aññāphalo vuttoti aññā vuccati arahattaṃ, arahattaphalasamādhi
atk-s0404a0:345_8: nāmeso vutto bhagavatāti attho. Evaṃsaññīpīti imāya arahattaphalasaññāya saññīpi
atk-s0404a0:345_9: tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedetīti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte arahattaphalasamādhi kathitoti.
atk-s0404a0:347_0: 38. Sattame lokāyatikāti lokāyatavādakā. Satatanti sadā. Samitanti nirantaraṃ. Tiṭṭhatetanti
atk-s0404a0:347_1: tiṭṭhatu etaṃ, mā etaṃ paṭṭhapetha, ko vo etena attho. Dhammaṃ vo brāhmaṇā desessāmīti
atk-s0404a0:348_0: Daḷhadhammoti daḷhadhanuṃ gahetvā ṭhito. Dhanuggahoti issāso. Daḷhadhanu nāma dvisahassathāmaṃ
atk-s0404a0:348_1: vuccati. Dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma yassa āropitassa jiyābaddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe
atk-s0404a0:348_2: gahetvā yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati. Sikkhitoti dasa dvādasa
atk-s0404a0:348_3: vassāni ācariyakule uggahitasippo. Katahatthoti eko sippameva uggaṇhāti, katahattho
atk-s0404a0:348_4: na hoti ayaṃ pana katahattho ciṇṇavasibhāvo. Katūpāsanoti rājakulādīsu dassitasippo.
atk-s0404a0:348_5: Lahukena asanenāti anto susiraṃ katvā tūlādīhi pūretvā katalakkhaparikammena sallahukakaṇḍena.
atk-s0404a0:348_6: Evaṃ katañhi ekausabhagāmī dve usabhānipi gacchati…pe… aṭṭhusabhagāmī soḷasa usabhānipi
atk-s0404a0:348_7: gacchati. Appakasirenāti niddukkhena. Atipāteyyāti atikkameyya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0404a0:348_8: – yathā so dhanuggaho taṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ chāyaṃ sīghameva atikkāmeti, evaṃ
atk-s0404a0:348_9: sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ atikkamanasamatthena javena samannāgato. Sandhāvanikāyāti
atk-s0404a0:350_0: 39. Aṭṭhame samupabyūḷho ahosīti paccupaṭṭhito ahosi. Saṅgāmeyyāmāti saṅgāmaṃ kareyyāma
atk-s0404a0:350_1: yujjheyyāma. Apayiṃsuyevāti palāyiṃsuyeva. Uttarenābhimukhāti uttarāmukhā hutvā.
atk-s0404a0:350_2: Abhiyante vāti anubandhantiyeva. Bhīruttānagatenāti bhīruttānaṃ bhayanivāraṇaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:350_3: gatena. Akaraṇīyāti yuddhena kiñci akattabbā. Kasmā pana nesaṃ saṅgāmo hotīti? Asurā
atk-s0404a0:350_4: hi pubbe tāvatiṃsavāsino, te cittapāṭaliyā pupphanakāle dibbapāricchattakapupphaṃ
atk-s0404a0:350_5: anussaranti. Tato uppannakodhā “gaṇhatha deve”ti sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva sineruṃ
atk-s0404a0:350_6: abhiruhanti, devāpi nikkhamanti. Tesaṃ gopālakadārakānaṃ aññamaññaṃ daṇḍakehi paharaṇasadisaṃ
atk-s0404a0:350_7: yuddhaṃ hoti. Sakko devarājā heṭṭhā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā upari devapuraṃ
atk-s0404a0:350_8: parivāretvā attasadisā vajirahatthā paṭimā ṭhapāpesi. Asurā heṭṭhā pañca ṭhānāni
atk-s0404a0:350_9: paṭibāhitvā abhiruḷhā indapaṭimāyo disvā nivattitvā asurapurameva gacchanti.
atk-s0404a0:351_0: Dakkhiṇenābhimukhāti dakkhiṇāmukhā hutvā. Apadaṃ vadhitvāti nippadaṃ niravasesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:351_1: vadhitvā. Adassanaṃ gatoti māropi vaṭṭapādakaṃ katvā rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ samāpannassa
atk-s0404a0:351_2: cittaṃ jānāti, tadeva vipassanāpādakaṃ katvā samāpannassa cittaṃ jānāti. Arūpāvacarasamāpatti
atk-s0404a0:351_3: pana vaṭṭapādā vā hotu vipassanāpādā vā, taṃ samāpannassa māro cittaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0404a0:353_0: 40. Navame āraññakassāti araññavāsino. Gocarapasutassāti gocaraggahaṇatthāya gacchantassa.
atk-s0404a0:353_1: Hatthikalabhāti mahantā mahantā nāgā. Hatthicchāpāti taruṇapotakā. Obhaggobhagganti
atk-s0404a0:353_2: nāmetvā nāmetvā ṭhapitaṃ. Ogāhaṃ otiṇṇassāti ogāhitabbattā ogāhanti laddhanāmaṃ udakatitthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:353_3: otiṇṇassa. Ogāhā uttiṇṇassāti udakatitthato uttiṇṇassa. Vūpakaṭṭhoti vūpakaṭṭho hutvā.
atk-s0404a0:353_4: Idāni yasmā dasabalassa hatthināgena kiccaṃ natthi, sāsane pana taṃsarikkhakaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0404a0:353_5: dassetuṃ idamāhaṭaṃ, tasmā taṃ puggalaṃ dassento evameva khotiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:355_0: 41. Dasame mallesūti mallaraṭṭhe. Idheva tāva tvaṃ, ānanda, hotīti idha bhagavā “tapussagahapatino
atk-s0404a0:355_1: idha ṭhitena ānandena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo bhavissati, tatonidānaṃ ahaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0404a0:355_2: dhammapariyāyaṃ desessāmī”ti ñatvā āha. Upasaṅkamīti so kira bhuttapātarāso “dasabalassa
atk-s0404a0:355_3: upaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhamanto dūratova theraṃ disvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0404a0:355_4: Papāto viya khāyati, yadidaṃ nekkhammanti yamidaṃ pabbajjāsaṅkhātaṃ nekkhammaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0404a0:355_5: amhākaṃ mahāpapāto viya ogāhitvā upaṭṭhāti. Nekkhamme cittaṃ pakkhandatīti pabbajjāya
atk-s0404a0:355_6: cittaṃ ārammaṇavasena pakkhandati, tadeva ārammaṇaṃ katvā pasīdati, tadeva patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0404a0:355_7: paccanīkadhammehi ca vimuccati. ‘Etaṃ santa’nti passatoti etaṃ nekkhammaṃ santaṃ
atk-s0404a0:355_8: vigatadarathapariḷāhanti evaṃ passantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ. Bahunā janena visabhāgoti tayidaṃ
atk-s0404a0:355_9: bahunā mahājanena saddhiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ visabhāgaṃ, asadisanti attho.
atk-s0404a0:356_0: Kathāpābhatanti kathāmūlaṃ. Tassa mayhaṃ, ānanda, nekkhamme cittaṃ na pakkhandatīti
atk-s0404a0:356_1: tassa evaṃ vitakkentassāpi mayhaṃ pabbajjāya cittaṃ na otarati. “Etaṃ santa”nti passatoti
atk-s0404a0:356_3: Anāsevitoti na āsevito na phassito na sacchikato. Adhigammāti adhigantvā patvā sacchikatvā.
atk-s0404a0:356_4: Tamāseveyyanti taṃ ānisaṃsaṃ seveyyaṃ bhajeyyaṃ. Yaṃ meti yena kāraṇena mayhaṃ. Adhigammāti
atk-s0404a0:356_5: adhigantvā. Svāssa me hoti ābādhoti so mayhaṃ ābādhanaṭṭhena ābādho hoti. Avitakke
atk-s0404a0:356_6: cittaṃ na pakkhandatīti avitakkavicāre dutiyajjhāne ārammaṇavasena cittaṃ na pakkhandati.
atk-s0404a0:358_0: 42. Pañcamassa paṭhame udāyīti kāḷudāyitthero. Avidvāti aññāsi. Bhūrimedhasoti mahāpañño.
atk-s0404a0:358_1: Yo jhānamabujjhīti yo jhānaṃ abujjhi. Paṭilīnanisabhoti ekībhāvavasena paṭilīno ceva
atk-s0404a0:358_2: uttamaṭṭhena ca nisabho. Munīti buddhamuni. Pariyāyenāti ekena kāraṇena. Kāmasambādhassa
atk-s0404a0:358_3: hi abhāvamatteneva paṭhamajjhānaṃ okāsādhigamo nāma, na sabbathā sabbaṃ. Tatrāpatthi
atk-s0404a0:358_4: sambādhoti tasmimpi paṭhamajjhāne sambādho paṭipīḷanaṃ atthiyeva. Tatrāpitthītipi
atk-s0404a0:358_5: pāṭho. Kiñca tattha sambādhoti tasmiṃ pana jhāne kiṃ sambādho nāma. Ayamettha sambādhoti
atk-s0404a0:358_6: ayaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ aniruddhabhāvo sambādho saṃpīḷā nāma. Iminā upāyena sabbavāresu
atk-s0404a0:358_7: attho veditabbo. Nippariyāyenāti na ekena kāraṇena, atha kho āsavakkhayo nāma sabbasambādhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:360_0: 43. Dutiye yathā yathā ca tadāyatananti yena yena kāraṇena yena yenākārena taṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0404a0:360_1: āyatanaṃ hoti. Tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharatīti tena tena kāraṇena tena
atk-s0404a0:360_2: tenākārena taṃ samāpattiṃ sahajātanāmakāyena phusitvā viharati, samāpajjatīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:360_3: Kāyasakkhi vutto bhagavatā pariyāyenāti yasmā tena nāmākāyena paṭhamajjhānaṃ sacchikataṃ,
atk-s0404a0:360_4: tasmā iminā pariyāyena kāyasakkhi vutto. Nippariyāyenāti yattakaṃ kāyena sacchikātabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:360_5: sabbassa katattā ayaṃ nippariyāyena kāyasakkhi nāma.
atk-s0404a0:362: 44. Tatiye paññāya ca naṃ pajānātīti taṃ paṭhamajjhānavipassanāpaññāya jānāti. Idhāpi pariyāyanippariyāyā purimanayeneva veditabbā. Yathā ca idha, evaṃ ito paresupi.
atk-s0404a0:364_0: 45. Catutthaṃ ubhayena veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca ubhatobhāgavimuttoti ubhatobhāgehi samathavipassanānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:364_1: paccanīkakilesehi vimutto. Pariyosāne pana samāpattiyā rūpakāyato, ariyamaggena nāmakāyato
atk-s0404a0:366_0: 46-51. Pañcamādīsu sandiṭṭhikoti sayaṃ passitabbako. Nibbānanti kilesanibbānaṃ. Parinibbānanti
atk-s0404a0:366_1: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Tadaṅganibbānanti paṭhamajjhānādinā tena tena aṅgena nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:366_2: Diṭṭhadhammanibbānanti ismiṃyeva attabhāve nibbānaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:370: 52. Ito paresu khemanti nirupaddavaṃ. Khemappattoti khemabhāvaṃ patto. Sikkhādubbalyānīti sikkhāya dubbalabhāvakaraṇāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:377_0: 1. Dasakanipātassa paṭhame kusalāni sīlānīti anavajjasīlāni. Amaṅkubhāvassa avippaṭisārassa
atk-s0404a0:377_1: atthāya saṃvattantīti avippaṭisāratthāni. So nesaṃ ānisaṃsoti avippaṭisārānisaṃsāni.
atk-s0404a0:377_3: nāma balavavipassanā, virāgo nāma maggo, vimutti nāma arahattaphalaṃ, ñāṇadassanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:377_4: nāma paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Aggāya parentīti arahattatthāya gacchanti.
atk-s0404a0:379_0: 2. Dutiye na cetanāya karaṇīyanti na cetetvā kappetvā pakappetvā kātabbaṃ. Dhammatā
atk-s0404a0:379_1: esāti dhammasabhāvo eso kāraṇaniyamo ayaṃ. Abhisandentīti pavattenti. Paripūrentīti
atk-s0404a0:379_2: paripuṇṇaṃ karonti. Apārā pāraṃ gamanāyāti orimatīrabhūtā tebhūmakavaṭṭā nibbānapāraṃ gamanatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:381: 3-5. Tatiye hatūpanisoti hatakāraṇo. Catutthapañcamesu dvīhi therehi kathitabhāvova viseso.
atk-s0404a0:383_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe neva pathaviyaṃ pathavīsaññī assāti pathaviṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pathavīti
atk-s0404a0:383_1: evaṃ uppannāya saññāya saññī na bhaveyya. Āpādīsupi eseva nayo. Na idhaloketi idhaloke
atk-s0404a0:383_2: uppajjanakacatukkapañcakajjhānasaññāya na saññī bhaveyya. Na paraloketi paraloke
atk-s0404a0:383_3: uppajjanakacatukkapañcakajjhānasaññāya na saññī bhaveyya. Saññī ca pana assāti atha
atk-s0404a0:383_4: ca panassa samāpatti savitakkasamāpattiyeva assāti vuccati. Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti
atk-s0404a0:383_5: santaṃ santanti appetvā nisinnassa divasampi cittuppādo “santaṃ santa”nteva pavattati,
atk-s0404a0:383_6: paṇītaṃ paṇītanti appetvā nisinnassa divasampi cittuppādo “paṇītaṃ paṇīta”nteva pavattati.
atk-s0404a0:383_7: Yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti nibbānaṃ nibbānanti appetvā nisinnassa divasampi cittuppādo
atk-s0404a0:383_8: “nibbānaṃ nibbāna”nteva pavattatīti sabbampetaṃ phalasamāpattisamādhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:385_0: 7. Sattame saññī ca panāhaṃ, āvuso, tasmiṃ samaye ahosinti, āvuso, tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0404a0:385_1: ahaṃ “bhavanirodho nibbāna”nti imāya phalasamāpattisaññāya saññī ahosiṃ. Sacittakā
atk-s0404a0:385_2: me sā samāpatti ahosīti paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.
atk-s0404a0:387: 8. Aṭṭhame samantapāsādikoti pasādāvahānaṃyeva kāyakammādīnaṃ sabbhāvato samanto pāsādiko. Sabbākāraparipūroti sabbehi kāraṇehi paripuṇṇo.
atk-s0404a0:389_0: 9. Navame santāti ārammaṇasantatāyapi aṅgasantatāyapi santā. Vimokkhāti paccanīkadhammehi
atk-s0404a0:389_1: vimuttattā ārammaṇe ca nirāsaṅkabhāvena suṭṭhu muttattā evaṃladdhanāmā. Atikkamma
atk-s0404a0:389_2: rūpeti rūpajjhānāni atikkamitvā pavattā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:391_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame pañcaṅgasamannāgatoti pañcahi guṇaṅgehi samannāgato. Nātidūraṃ
atk-s0404a0:391_1: hoti nāccāsannanti yañhi atidūre hoti, piṇḍāya caritvā tattha gacchantassa kāyacittadarathā
atk-s0404a0:391_2: hoti, tato anuppannaṃ vā samādhiṃ uppādetuṃ uppannaṃ vā thiraṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0404a0:391_3: Accāsannaṃ bahujanākiṇṇaṃ hoti. Cattālīsausabhamatte pana padese vasataṃ dūrāsannadosavimuttañca
atk-s0404a0:391_4: gamanāgamanasampannaṃ nāma hoti. Divāappākiṇṇanti divasabhāge mahājanena anākiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:393_0: 12. Dutiye kevalīti kevalehi sakalehi guṇehi samannāgato. Vusitavāti vutthabrahmacariyavāso.
atk-s0404a0:393_1: Asekhenāti asekhadhammapariyāpannena lokuttarena. Sīlakkhandhenāti sīlarāsinā. Vimuttikkhandhenāti
atk-s0404a0:393_2: ettha ṭhapetvā sīlādayo tayo sesā phaladhammā vimutti nāma, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ, taṃ lokiyameva.
atk-s0404a0:395_1: Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. Catutthe khilavinibandhā pañcakanipāte vitthāritāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:397_0: 15. Pañcame evameva khoti yathā sabbasattānaṃ sammāsambuddho aggo, evaṃ sabbesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:397_1: kusaladhammānaṃ kārāpakaappamādo aggoti daṭṭhabbo. Nanu cesa lokiyova, kusaladhammā
atk-s0404a0:397_2: pana lokuttarāpi. Ayañca kāmāvacarova, kusaladhammā pana catubhūmakā. Kathamesa tesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:397_3: aggoti? Paṭilābhakattena. Appamādena hi te paṭilabhanti, tasmā so tesaṃ aggo. Teneva
atk-s0404a0:398_0: Jaṅgalānanti pathavitalacārīnaṃ. Pāṇānanti sapādakapāṇānaṃ. Padajātānīti padāni.
atk-s0404a0:398_1: Samodhānaṃ gacchantīti odhānaṃ pakkhepaṃ gacchanti. Aggamakkhāyatīti seṭṭhamakkhāyati.
atk-s0404a0:398_2: Yadidaṃ mahantattenāti mahantabhāvena aggamakkhāyati, na guṇaggenāti attho. Vassikanti
atk-s0404a0:398_3: sumanapupphaṃ. Idaṃ kira suttaṃ sutvā bhātiyamahārājā vīmaṃsitukāmatāya ekasmiṃ gabbhe
atk-s0404a0:398_4: catujātigandhehi paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā sugandhapupphāni āharāpetvā ekassa samuggassa
atk-s0404a0:398_5: majjhe sumanapupphamuṭṭhiṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni tassa samantato muṭṭhiṃ katvā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0404a0:398_6: dvāraṃ pidhāya bahi nikkhanto. Athassa muhuttaṃ bahi vītināmetvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0404a0:398_7: pavisantassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ sumanapupphagandho ghānaṃ pahari. So mahātalasmiṃyeva
atk-s0404a0:398_8: mahācetiyābhimukho nipajjitvā “vassikaṃ tesaṃ agganti kathentena sukathitaṃ sammāsambuddhenā”ti
atk-s0404a0:398_9: cetiyaṃ vandi. Khuddarājānoti khuddakarājāno. Kūṭarājānotipi pāṭho.
atk-s0404a0:400: 16. Chaṭṭhe gotrabhūti sikhāpattavipassanābhūtena nibbānārammaṇena gotrabhuñāṇena samannāgato.
atk-s0404a0:402_0: 17. Sattame sanāthāti sañātakā bahuñātivaggā hutvā viharatha. Nāthaṃ karontīti nāthakaraṇā,
atk-s0404a0:402_1: attano sanāthabhāvakarā patiṭṭhākarāti attho. Kalyāṇamittotiādīsu sīlādiguṇasampannā
atk-s0404a0:402_2: kalyāṇā mittā assāti kalyāṇamitto. Tevassa ṭhānanisajjādīsu saha ayanato sahāyāti
atk-s0404a0:402_3: kalyāṇasahāyo. Cittena ceva kāyena ca kalyāṇamittesuyeva sampavaṅko oṇatoti kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
atk-s0404a0:402_4: Suvaco hotīti sukhena vattabbo hoti, sukhena anusāsitabbo. Khamoti gāḷhena pharusena
atk-s0404a0:402_5: kakkhaḷena vutto khamati na kuppati. Padakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaninti yathā ekacco ovadiyamāno
atk-s0404a0:402_6: vāmato gaṇhāti, paṭippharati vā, assuṇanto vā gacchati, evaṃ akatvā “ovadatha, bhante,
atk-s0404a0:402_7: anusāsatha, tumhesu anovadantesu ko añño ovadissatī”ti padakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0404a0:403_0: Uccāvacānīti uccanīcāni. Kiṃkaraṇīyānīti “kiṃ karomī”ti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni.
atk-s0404a0:403_1: Tattha uccakammaṃ nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ, cetiye sudhākammaṃ, uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhigharesu
atk-s0404a0:403_2: kattabbakammanti evamādi. Avacakammaṃ nāma pādadhovanamakkhanādikhuddakakammaṃ. Tatrūpāyāyāti
atk-s0404a0:403_3: tatrupagamaniyāya. Alaṃ kātunti kātuṃ samattho hoti. Alaṃ saṃvidhātunti vicāretuṃ samattho hoti.
atk-s0404a0:404_0: Dhamme assa kāmo sinehoti dhammakāmo, tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho. Piyasamudāhāroti
atk-s0404a0:404_1: parasmiṃ kathente sakkaccaṃ suṇāti, sayañca paresaṃ desetukāmo hotīti attho. Abhidhamme
atk-s0404a0:404_2: abhivinayeti ettha dhammo abhidhammo, vinayo abhivinayoti catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0404a0:404_3: dhammoti suttantapiṭakaṃ. Abhidhammoti satta pakaraṇāni. Vinayoti ubhatovibhaṅgo.
atk-s0404a0:404_4: Abhivinayoti khandhakaparivārā. Atha vā suttantapiṭakampi abhidhammapiṭakampi dhammo
atk-s0404a0:404_5: eva, maggaphalāni abhidhammo. Sakalavinayapiṭakaṃ vinayo, kilesavūpasamakaraṇaṃ abhivinayo.
atk-s0404a0:404_6: Iti sabbasmimpi ettha dhamme ca abhidhamme ca vinaye ca abhivinaye ca uḷārapāmojjo
atk-s0404a0:404_7: hotīti attho. Kusalesu dhammesūti kāraṇatthe bhummaṃ, cātubhūmakakusaladhammakāraṇā
atk-s0404a0:406: 18. Aṭṭhame therānukampitassāti therehi ovādānusāsanidānasamussāhitāya hitapharaṇāya anukampitassa.
atk-s0404a0:408: 19. Navame ariyavāsāti ariyānaṃ āvāso, te āvasiṃsu āvasanti āvasissantīti ariyāvāsā. Yadariyāti ye vāse ariyā.
atk-s0404a0:410_0: 20. Dasamaṃ yasmā kururaṭṭhavāsino bhikkhū gambhīrapaññākārakā yuttappayuttā, tasmā
atk-s0404a0:410_1: yathā tesaṃ dīghanikāyādīsu mahānidānādīni kathitāni, evamidampi gambhīraṃ sukhumaṃ
atk-s0404a0:410_2: tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suttaṃ tattheva avoca. Tattha pañcaṅgavippahīnoti pañcahi aṅgehi
atk-s0404a0:410_3: vippayutto hutvā khīṇāsavo avasi vasati vasissati. Tasmā ayaṃ pañcaṅgavippahīnatā
atk-s0404a0:410_4: ariyāvāsoti vutto. Esa nayo sabbattha. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato
atk-s0404a0:410_5: hotīti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato hoti. Chaḷaṅgupekkhā dhammā nāma keti? Ñāṇādayo.
atk-s0404a0:410_7: vutte aṭṭha mahācittāni, “rajjanadussanaṃ natthī”ti vutte dasa cittāni labbhanti.
atk-s0404a0:410_8: Somanassaṃ āsevanavasena labbhati. Satārakkhena cetasāti khīṇāsavassa hi tīsu dvāresu
atk-s0404a0:410_9: sabbakāle sati ārakkhakiccaṃ sādheti. Tenevassa carato ca tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca
atk-s0404a0:410_10: jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:411_0: Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānanti bahūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ. Ettha samaṇāti pabbajjūpagatā,
atk-s0404a0:411_1: brāhmaṇāti bhovādino. Puthupaccekasaccānīti bahūni pāṭekkasaccāni. “Idameva dassanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:411_2: saccaṃ, idameva sacca”nti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni bahūni saccānīti attho. Nuṇṇānīti
atk-s0404a0:411_3: nīhaṭāni. Panuṇṇānīti suṭṭhu nīhaṭāni. Cattānīti vissaṭṭhāni. Vantānīti vamitāni.
atk-s0404a0:411_4: Muttānīti chinnabandhanāni katāni. Pahīnānīti pajahitāni. Paṭinissaṭṭhānīti yathā
atk-s0404a0:411_5: na puna cittaṃ ārohanti, evaṃ paṭinissajjitāni. Sabbāneva tāni gahitaggahaṇassa vissaṭṭhabhāvavevacanāni.
atk-s0404a0:412_0: Samavayasaṭṭhesanoti ettha avayāti anūnā, saṭṭhāti vissaṭṭhā. Sammā avayā saṭṭhā
atk-s0404a0:412_1: esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano, suṭṭhuvissaṭṭhasabbaesanoti attho. Rāgā cittaṃ vimuttantiādīhi
atk-s0404a0:412_2: maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā. Rāgo me pahīnotiādīhi paccavekkhaṇaphalaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:414_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame visamagateti visamaṭṭhānesu gocaresu gate. Saṅghātaṃ āpādesinti
atk-s0404a0:414_1: ghātaṃ vadhaṃ pāpesiṃ. Tassa hi ussannatejatāya khuddakesu pāṇesu anukampā hoti.
atk-s0404a0:414_2: Tasmā ye paṭisattubhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ sakkhissanti, ye dubbalā palāyitukāmā bhavissanti,
atk-s0404a0:414_3: te palāyissantīti sīhanādaṃ naditvāva gocarāya pakkamati. Tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacananti
atk-s0404a0:414_4: yadi hi sahanatāya hananatāya ca sīho, tathāgato hi sabbāni ca iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni sahati,
atk-s0404a0:414_5: sabbaparappavādino ca vādānaṃ nimmathanena hanati. Idamassa hoti sīhanādasminti ayamassa sīhanādo.
atk-s0404a0:415_0: Tathāgatabalānīti aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatasseva balāni. Yathā vā pubbabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:415_1: balāni puññasampattiyā āgatāni, tathā āgatabalānītipi attho. Tattha duvidhaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0404a0:415_2: balaṃ kāyabalaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ. Tesu kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusārena veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
atk-s0404a0:418_0: Imāni dasa hatthikulāni. Tattha kālāvakanti pakatihatthikulaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0404a0:418_1: purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kālāvakassa hatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ kālāvakānaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:418_2: taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gaṅgeyyānaṃ, taṃ ekassa paṇḍarassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0404a0:418_3: paṇḍarānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tambassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ tambānaṃ, taṃ ekassa piṅgalassa. Yaṃ
atk-s0404a0:418_4: dasannaṃ piṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa gandhahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gandhahatthīnaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0404a0:418_5: ekassa maṅgalassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ maṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa hemassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ hemānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:418_6: taṃ ekassa uposathassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ uposathānaṃ, taṃ ekassa chaddantassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0404a0:418_7: chaddantānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalantipi idameva vuccati.
atk-s0404a0:418_8: Tadetaṃ pakatihatthigaṇanāya hatthīnaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ purisakoṭisahassānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:418_9: balaṃ hoti. Idaṃ tāva tathāgatassa kāyabalaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:419_0: Ñāṇabalaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ tāva āgatameva. Dasabalañāṇaṃ, majjhime āgataṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:419_2: saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni sattasattati ñāṇānīti, evaṃ aññānipi anekāni
atk-s0404a0:419_3: ñāṇabalaṃ nāma. Idhāpi ñāṇabalameva adhippetaṃ. Ñāṇañhi akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena ca balanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:420_0: Āsabhaṃ ṭhānanti seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ uttamaṭṭhānaṃ. Āsabhā vā pubbabuddhā, tesaṃ ṭhānanti
atk-s0404a0:420_1: attho. Apica gavasatajeṭṭhako usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho. Vajasatajeṭṭhako
atk-s0404a0:420_2: vā usabho, vajasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho. Sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko
atk-s0404a0:420_3: mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi asampakampiyo nisabho, so idha usabhoti adhippeto.
atk-s0404a0:420_4: Idampi hi tassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ. Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi
atk-s0404a0:420_5: pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānaṃ. Idaṃ pana āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ. Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto
atk-s0404a0:420_6: usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0404a0:420_7: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ
atk-s0404a0:420_8: uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena
atk-s0404a0:420_9: tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ca taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti
atk-s0404a0:420_10: attani āropeti. Tena vuttaṃ – “āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānātī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:421_0: Parisāsūti aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti seṭṭhanādaṃ nadati, abhītanādaṃ nadati,
atk-s0404a0:421_1: sīhanādasadisaṃ vā nādaṃ nadati. Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā sīho sīhabalena samannāgato
atk-s0404a0:421_2: sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi
atk-s0404a0:421_3: samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “iti sakkāyo”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0404a0:421_4: nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. Tena vuttaṃ – “parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadatī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:422_0: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ. Cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:422_1: Taṃ panetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañca. Tattha paññāpabhāvitaṃ
atk-s0404a0:422_2: attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ, karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ ariyaphalāvahaṃ
atk-s0404a0:422_3: desanāñāṇaṃ. Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppannanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi abhinikkhamanato
atk-s0404a0:422_4: yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Tusitabhavanato vā yāva
atk-s0404a0:422_5: mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Dīpaṅkarato
atk-s0404a0:422_6: vā paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Desanāñāṇampi
atk-s0404a0:422_7: pavattamānaṃ pavattanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi yāva aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattimaggā pavattamānaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:422_8: phalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāma. Tesu paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ, desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ. Ubhayampi
atk-s0404a0:423_0: Idāni yehi dasahi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, tāni vitthārato
atk-s0404a0:423_1: dassetuṃ katamāni dasa? Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānatotiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0404a0:423_2: ṭhānañca ṭhānatoti kāraṇañca kāraṇato. Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati, tadāyattavuttitāya
atk-s0404a0:423_3: uppajjati ceva pavattati ca, tasmā ṭhānanti vuccati. Taṃ bhagavā “ye ye dhammā yesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:423_4: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ. Ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:423_5: na hetū na paccayā uppādāya, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna”nti pajānanto ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca
atk-s0404a0:423_6: aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Abhidhamme panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa ṭhānañca
atk-s0404a0:423_7: ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇa”ntiādinā nayena vitthāritameva. Yampīti
atk-s0404a0:423_8: yena ñāṇena. Idampi, bhikkhave, tathāgatassāti idampi ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0404a0:423_9: tathāgatabalaṃ nāma hotīti attho. Evaṃ sabbapadesu yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0404a0:424_0: Kammasamādānānanti samādiyitvā katānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ, kammameva vā kammasamādānaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:424_1: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ceva hetuto ca. Tattha gatiupadhikālapayogā vipākassa
atk-s0404a0:424_2: ṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ hetu. Imassa pana ñāṇassa vitthārakathā “atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni
atk-s0404a0:424_3: gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:425_0: Sabbatthagāmininti sabbagatigāminiñca agatigāminiñca. Paṭipadanti maggaṃ. Yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0404a0:425_1: pajānātīti bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu “imassa cetanā nirayagāminī
atk-s0404a0:425_2: bhavissati, imassa tiracchānayonigāminī”ti iminā nayena ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:425_3: paṭipattīnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ jānāti. Imassapi ca ñāṇassa vitthārakathā “tattha
atk-s0404a0:425_4: katamaṃ tathāgatassa sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ? Idha tathāgato
atk-s0404a0:425_5: ayaṃ maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā nirayagāminīti pajānātī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:426_0: Anekadhātunti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātuādīhi vā dhātūhi bahudhātuṃ. Nānādhātunti
atk-s0404a0:426_1: tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ vilakkhaṇatāya nānappakāradhātuṃ. Lokanti khandhāyatanadhātulokaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:426_2: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhati. Idampi ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:426_3: “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ? Idha tathāgato
atk-s0404a0:427_0: Nānādhimuttikatanti hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāvaṃ. Idampi ñāṇaṃ “tattha
atk-s0404a0:427_1: katamaṃ tathāgatassa sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ? Idha tathāgato
atk-s0404a0:427_2: pajānāti santi sattā hīnādhimuttikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
atk-s0404a0:428_0: Parasattānanti padhānasattānaṃ. Parapuggalānanti tato aññesaṃ hīnasattānaṃ. Ekatthameva
atk-s0404a0:428_1: vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ, veneyyavasena dvidhā vuttaṃ. Indriyaparopariyattanti saddhādīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:428_2: indriyānaṃ parabhāvañca aparabhāvañca, vuddhiñca hāniñcāti attho. Imassāpi ñāṇassa
atk-s0404a0:428_3: vitthārakathā “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:428_4: yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ? Idha tathāgato sattānaṃ āsayaṃ pajānātī”ti ādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva.
atk-s0404a0:429_0: Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnanti paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ, “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:429_1: aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ, savitakkasavicārādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ, paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiādīnañca
atk-s0404a0:429_2: navannaṃ anupubbasamāpattīnaṃ. Saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyadhammaṃ. Vodānanti visesabhāgiyadhammaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:429_3: Vuṭṭhānanti “vodānampi vuṭṭhānaṃ, tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0404a0:429_4: evaṃ vuttaṃ paguṇajjhānañceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattiyo ca. Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi
atk-s0404a0:429_5: paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā “vodānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0404a0:429_6: vuttaṃ. Bhavaṅgena pana sabbajjhānehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, phalasamāpattiyā nirodhasamāpattito
atk-s0404a0:429_7: vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Taṃ sandhāya ca “tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0404a0:429_8: vuttaṃ. Idampi ñāṇaṃ “tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:429_9: saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ? Jhāyīti cattāro jhāyī, atthekacco
atk-s0404a0:429_10: jhāyī sampattiṃyeva samānaṃ vipattīti paccetī”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme vitthāritameva.
atk-s0404a0:429_11: Sabbañāṇānaṃ vitthārakathāya vinicchayo sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya vutto,
atk-s0404a0:429_12: pubbenivāsānussatidibbacakkhuñāṇakathā visuddhimagge vitthāritā, āsavakkhayakathā heṭṭhā vuttāyevāti.
atk-s0404a0:430_0: Tattha paravādīkathā hoti “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthi, sabbaññutaññāṇassevāyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:430_1: pabhedo”ti. Taṃ na tathā daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññameva hi dasabalañāṇaṃ, aññaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:430_2: Dasabalañāṇañhi sakasakakiccameva jānāti, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ tampi tato avasesampi
atk-s0404a0:430_3: jānāti. Dasabalañāṇesu hi paṭhamaṃ kāraṇākāraṇameva jānāti, dutiyaṃ kammavipākantarameva,
atk-s0404a0:430_4: tatiyaṃ kammaparicchedameva, catutthaṃ dhātunānattakāraṇameva, pañcamaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:430_5: ajjhāsayādhimuttimeva, chaṭṭhaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvameva, sattamaṃ jhānādīhi
atk-s0404a0:430_6: saddhiṃ tesaṃ saṃkilesādimeva, aṭṭhamaṃ pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatimeva, navamaṃ
atk-s0404a0:430_7: sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhimeva, dasamaṃ saccaparicchedameva. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi
atk-s0404a0:430_8: jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti, etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti. Tañhi
atk-s0404a0:430_9: jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti, iddhi hutvā vikubbituṃ na sakkoti, maggo hutvā kilese
atk-s0404a0:431_0: Apica paravādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāmetaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:431_1: avitakkaavicāraṃ, kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ, lokiyaṃ lokuttara”nti. Jānanto
atk-s0404a0:431_2: “paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇāni savitakkasavicārānī”ti vakkhati, “tato parāni dve avitakkaavicārānī”ti
atk-s0404a0:431_3: vakkhati. “Āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā
atk-s0404a0:431_4: avitakkaavicāra”nti vakkhati. Tathā “paṭipāṭiyā satta kāmāvacarāni, tato dve rūpāvacarāni,
atk-s0404a0:431_5: avasāne ekaṃ lokuttara”nti vakkhati. “Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana savitakkasavicārameva
atk-s0404a0:432_0: Evamettha anupadavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni yasmā tathāgato paṭhamaṃyeva ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇena
atk-s0404a0:432_1: veneyyasattānaṃ āsavakkhayādhigamassa ceva anadhigamassa ca ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvaṃ
atk-s0404a0:432_3: ca. Atha nesaṃ kammavipākañāṇena vipākāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati tihetukappaṭisandhidassanato,
atk-s0404a0:432_6: passati dhātuvemattadassanato. Atha nesaṃ nānādhimuttikatañāṇena adhimuttiṃ passati
atk-s0404a0:432_7: payogaṃ anādiyitvāpi adhimuttivasena dhammadesanatthaṃ. Athevaṃ diṭṭhādhimuttīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:432_8: yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ indriyaparopariyattiñāṇena indriyaparopariyattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:432_9: passati saddhādīnaṃ tikkhamudubhāvadassanato. Evaṃ pariññātindriyaparopariyattā pana
atk-s0404a0:432_10: te sace dūre honti, atha jhānādiñāṇena jhānādīsu vasībhūtattā iddhivisesena te khippaṃ
atk-s0404a0:432_11: upagacchati. Upagantvā ca nesaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pubbajātibhavaṃ, dibbacakkhānubhāvato
atk-s0404a0:432_12: pattabbena cetopariyañāṇena sampati cittavisesaṃ passanto āsavakkhayañāṇānubhāvena
atk-s0404a0:432_13: āsavakkhayagāminiyā paṭipadāya vigatasammohattā āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ deseti. Tasmā
atk-s0404a0:434_0: 22. Dutiye ye te dhammāti ye te dasabalañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā. Adhivuttipadānanti
atk-s0404a0:434_1: adhivacanapadānaṃ, khandhāyatanadhātudhammānanti attho. Adhivuttiyoti hi adhivacanāni
atk-s0404a0:434_2: vuccanti, tesaṃ ye padabhūtā desanāya padaṭṭhānattā. Atītā buddhāpi hi ete dhamme
atk-s0404a0:434_3: kathayiṃsu, anāgatāpi eteva kathayissanti. Tasmā khandhādayo adhivuttipadāni nāma.
atk-s0404a0:434_4: Tesaṃ adhivuttipadānaṃ. Atha vā bhūtamatthaṃ abhibhavitvā yathāsabhāvato aggahetvā
atk-s0404a0:434_5: vattanato adhivuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo vuccanti, adhivuttīnaṃ padāni adhivuttipadāni, diṭṭhidīpakāni
atk-s0404a0:434_6: vacanānīti attho. Tesaṃ adhivuttipadānaṃ diṭṭhivohārānaṃ. Abhiññā sacchikiriyāyāti
atk-s0404a0:434_7: jānitvā paccakkhakaraṇatthāya. Visāradoti ñāṇasomanassappatto. Tatthāti tesu dhammesu
atk-s0404a0:434_8: tesaṃ tesaṃ tathā tathā dhammaṃ desetunti tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vā itaresaṃ
atk-s0404a0:434_9: vā āsayaṃ ñatvā tathā tathā dhammaṃ desetuṃ. Hīnaṃ vā hīnanti ñassatīti hīnaṃ vā
atk-s0404a0:434_10: dhammaṃ “hīno dhammo”ti jānissati. Ñāteyyanti ñātabbaṃ. Daṭṭheyyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:434_11: Sacchikareyyanti sacchikātabbaṃ. Tattha tattha yathābhūtañāṇanti tesu tesu dhammesu
atk-s0404a0:434_12: yathāsabhāvañāṇaṃ. Iminā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0404a0:434_13: puna dasabalañāṇaṃ dassento dasayimānītiādimāha. Dasabalañāṇampi hi tattha tattha
atk-s0404a0:436_0: 23. Tatiye āpanno hoti kañcideva desanti kañci āpattikoṭṭhāsaṃ āpanno hoti. Anuviccāti
atk-s0404a0:436_1: anupavisitvā pariyogāhetvā. Kāyaduccaritanti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ. Vacīduccaritanti
atk-s0404a0:436_2: catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ. Pāpikā issāti lāmikā usūyā. Paññāya disvāti sahavipassanāya
atk-s0404a0:436_3: maggapaññāya passitvā passitvā pahātabbā. Ijjhatīti samijjhati. Upavāsassāti nissāya
atk-s0404a0:436_4: upasaṅkamitvā vasantassa. Abhibhuyyāti ajjhottharitvā madditvā. Irīyatīti vattati.
atk-s0404a0:438_0: 24. Catutthe jānāmimaṃ dhammanti iminā ñāṇavādassa vadanākāro vutto. Bhāvitakāyomhītiādīhi
atk-s0404a0:438_1: bhāvanāvādassa. Tatiyavāre dvepi vādā ekato vuttā, tayopi cete arahattameva paṭijānanti.
atk-s0404a0:438_2: Aḍḍhavādaṃ vadeyyāti aḍḍhohamasmīti vādaṃ vadeyya. Upanīhātunti nīharitvā dātuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:440_0: 25. Pañcame sakalaṭṭhena kasiṇāni, tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ khettaṭṭhena adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-s0404a0:440_1: vā āyatanānīti kasiṇāyatanāni. Uddhanti upari gagaṇatalābhimukhaṃ. Adhoti heṭṭhā
atk-s0404a0:440_2: bhūmitalābhimukhaṃ. Tiriyanti khettamaṇḍalaṃ viya samantā paricchinditvā. Ekacco
atk-s0404a0:440_3: hi uddhameva kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍheti, ekacco adho, ekacco samantato. Tena tena vā kāraṇena
atk-s0404a0:440_4: evaṃ pasāreti ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo. Tena vuttaṃ – “pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti
atk-s0404a0:440_5: uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti. Advayanti idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:440_6: Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti na aññaṃ, evameva pathavīkasiṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:440_7: pathavīkasiṇameva hoti. Natthi tassa aññakasiṇasambhedoti. Eseva nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0404a0:440_8: Appamāṇanti idaṃ tassa tassa pharaṇaappamāṇavasena vuttaṃ. Tañhi cetasā pharanto
atk-s0404a0:440_9: sakalameva pharati, “ayamassa ādi, idaṃ majjha”nti pamāṇaṃ na gaṇhāti. Viññāṇakasiṇanti
atk-s0404a0:440_10: cettha kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaviññāṇaṃ. Tattha kasiṇavasena kasiṇugghāṭimākāse,
atk-s0404a0:440_11: kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā. Ayamettha
atk-s0404a0:440_12: saṅkhepo, kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayena panetāni pathavīkasiṇādīni vitthārato visuddhimagge vuttāneva.
atk-s0404a0:442_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe kumāripañhesūti kumārīnaṃ māradhītānaṃ pucchāsu. Atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa
atk-s0404a0:442_1: santinti dvīhipi padehi arahattameva kathitaṃ. Senanti rāgādikilesasenaṃ. Piyasātarūpanti
atk-s0404a0:442_2: piyajātikesu ca sātajātikesu ca vatthūsu uppajjanato evaṃladdhanāmaṃ. Ekohaṃ jhāyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:442_3: sukhamanubodhinti evaṃ kilesasenaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ ekakova jhāyanto sukhaṃ anubujjhiṃ
atk-s0404a0:442_4: sacchiakāsiṃ. Sakkhinti sakkhibhāvappattaṃ dhammasakkhiṃ. Na sampajjati kenaci meti
atk-s0404a0:442_5: mayhaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ mittadhammo nāma natthi. Pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiparamā kho,
atk-s0404a0:442_6: bhagini, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā atthoti abhinibbattesunti pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiparamo
atk-s0404a0:442_7: uttamo atthoti gahetvā abhinibbattesuṃ. Yāvatā kho, bhagini, pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiparamatāti
atk-s0404a0:442_8: yattakā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā uttamakoṭi. Tadabhiññāsi bhagavāti taṃ bhagavā abhiññāpaññāya
atk-s0404a0:442_9: abhiññāsi. Assādamaddasāti samudayasaccaṃ addasa. Ādīnavamaddasāti dukkhasaccaṃ addasa.
atk-s0404a0:442_11: addasa. Atthassa pattīti etesaṃ catunnaṃ saccānaṃ diṭṭhattā arahattasaṅkhātassa atthassa
atk-s0404a0:444_0: 27. Sattame abhijānāthāti abhijānitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā viharatha. Abhiññāyāti abhijānitvā.
atk-s0404a0:444_1: Idhāti imāya. Dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesananti yadidaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa dhammadesanāya
atk-s0404a0:444_2: saddhiṃ amhākaṃ dhammadesanaṃ, amhākaṃ vā dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0404a0:444_3: dhammadesanaṃ ārabbha nānākaraṇaṃ vuccetha, taṃ kiṃ nāmāti vadanti. Dutiyapadepi
atk-s0404a0:444_4: eseva nayo. Iti te majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya sāsanena saddhiṃ attano laddhiṃ vacanamattena
atk-s0404a0:444_5: samadhuraṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Neva abhinandiṃsūti “evameta”nti na sampaṭicchiṃsu. Nappaṭikkosiṃsūti
atk-s0404a0:444_6: “na idaṃ eva”nti nappaṭisedhesuṃ. Kasmā? Te kira “titthiyā nāma andhasadisā jānitvā
atk-s0404a0:445_0: Na sampāyissantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissanti. Uttari ca vighātanti asampādanato
atk-s0404a0:445_1: uttarimpi dukkhaṃ āpajjissanti. Sampādetvā kathetuṃ asakkontānañhi dukkhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0404a0:445_2: Yathā taṃ, bhikkhave, avisayasminti ettha ca tanti nipātamattaṃ. Yathāti kāraṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:445_3: yasmā avisaye pañhaṃ pucchitā hontīti attho. Ito vā pana sutvāti ito vā pana mama
atk-s0404a0:445_4: sāsanato sutvā. Itoti tathāgatatopi tathāgatasāvakatopi. Ārādheyyāti paritoseyya,
atk-s0404a0:446_0: Ekadhammeti ekasmiṃ dhamme. Iminā uddeso dassito. Parato katamasmiṃ ekadhammeti iminā
atk-s0404a0:446_1: pañho dassito. Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti idaṃ panettha veyyākaraṇaṃ. Sesesupi eseva
atk-s0404a0:446_2: nayo. Sammā nibbindamānotiādīsu pana sammā hetunā nayena nibbidānupassanāya nibbindanto
atk-s0404a0:446_3: ukkaṇṭhanto, virāgānupassanāya virajjanto, paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya muccanassa upāyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:446_4: katvā vimuccamāno, adhimokkhavasena vā vimuccamāno sanniṭṭhānaṃ kurumānoti attho.
atk-s0404a0:446_5: Udayabbayehi paricchinditvā pubbantāparantadassanena sammā pariyantadassāvī. Sammadatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:446_6: abhisameccāti sammā sabhāgatthaṃ ñāṇena abhisamāgantvā. Dukkhassantakaro hotīti sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0404a0:447_0: Sabbe sattāti kāmabhavādīsu ekavokārabhavādīsu ca sabbabhavesu sabbe sattā. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti
atk-s0404a0:447_1: āhārato ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikā. Iti sabbasattānampi ṭhitihetu āhāro nāma eko
atk-s0404a0:447_2: dhammo, tasmiṃ ekadhamme. Nanu ca evaṃ sante yaṃ vuttaṃ – “asaññasattā devā ahetukā
atk-s0404a0:447_3: anāhārā aphassakā”tiādi, taṃ virujjhatīti. Na virujjhati. Tesañhi jhānaṃ āhāro hoti.
atk-s0404a0:447_4: Evaṃ santepi “cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā”ti idaṃ virujjhatīti. Idampi na virujjhati.
atk-s0404a0:447_5: Etasmiñhi sutte nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇā dhammā āhārāti vuttā, idha pana pariyāyena
atk-s0404a0:447_6: paccayo āhāroti vutto. Sabbadhammānañhi paccayo laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. So ca yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0404a0:447_7: janeti, taṃ taṃ āharati nāma. Tasmā āhāroti vuccati. Tenevāha – “avijjampāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0404a0:447_8: sāhāraṃ vadāmi, no anāhāraṃ. Ko ca, bhikkhave, avijjāya āhāro? Pañca nīvaraṇātissa
atk-s0404a0:447_9: vacanīya”nti. Ayaṃ idha adhippeto. Etasmiñhi paccayāhāre gahite pariyāyāhāropi nippariyāyāhāropi
atk-s0404a0:448_0: Tattha asaññībhave paccayāhāro labbhati. Anuppanne hi buddhe titthāyatane pabbajitā
atk-s0404a0:448_1: vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya “dhi cittaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:448_2: dhi vatetaṃ cittaṃ, cittassa nāma abhāvoyeva sādhu. Cittañhi nissāya vadhabandhādipaccayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:448_3: dukkhaṃ uppajjati. Citte asati nattheta”nti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānā
atk-s0404a0:448_4: kālaṃ katvā asaññībhave nibbattanti. Yo yassa iriyāpatho manussaloke paṇihito ahosi,
atk-s0404a0:448_5: so tena iriyāpathena nibbattitvā cittarūpasadiso hutvā pañca kappasatāni tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0404a0:448_6: Ettakaṃ addhānaṃ sayito viya hoti. Evarūpānampi sattānaṃ paccayāhāro labbhati. Te
atk-s0404a0:448_7: hi yaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetvā nibbattā, tadeva nesaṃ paccayo hoti. Yathā jiyāvegena khittasaro
atk-s0404a0:448_8: yāva jiyāvego atthi, tāva gacchati. Evaṃ yāva jhānapaccayo atthi, tāva tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0404a0:448_9: Tasmiṃ niṭṭhite khīṇavego viya saro patanti. Cavanakāle ca tesaṃ so rūpakāyo antaradhāyati,
atk-s0404a0:448_10: kāmāvacarasaññā uppajjati, tena saññuppādena te devā tamhā kāyā cutāti paññāyanti.
atk-s0404a0:449_0: Ye pana te nerayikā neva vuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī, na puññaphalūpajīvīti vuttā, tesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:449_1: ko āhāroti? Tesaṃ kammameva āhāro. Kiṃ pañca āhārā atthīti? Pañca, na pañcāti idaṃ
atk-s0404a0:449_2: na vattabbaṃ, nanu “paccayo āhāro”ti vuttametaṃ. Tasmā yena kammena niraye nibbattanti,
atk-s0404a0:449_3: tadeva tesaṃ ṭhitipaccayattā āhāro hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ – “na ca tāva kālaṃ
atk-s0404a0:449_4: karoti, yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti.
atk-s0404a0:450_0: Kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ ārabbhāpi cettha vivādo na kātabbo. Mukhe uppajjanakheḷopi hi tesaṃ
atk-s0404a0:450_1: āhārakiccaṃ sādheti. Kheḷo hi niraye dukkhavedanīyo hutvā paccayo hoti, sagge sukhavedaniyo.
atk-s0404a0:450_2: Iti kāmabhave nippariyāyena cattāro āhārā, rūpārūpabhavesu ṭhapetvā asaññe sesānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:450_3: tayo, asaññānañceva avasesānañca paccayāhāroti iminā ākārena sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti
atk-s0404a0:450_4: veditabbā. Tattha cattāro āhāro yo vā pana koci paccayāhāro dukkhasaccaṃ, āhārasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0404a0:450_5: purimataṇhā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā paññā
atk-s0404a0:450_6: maggasaccanti evaṃ catusaccavasena sabbavāresu yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0404a0:452_0: 28. Aṭṭhame kajaṅgalāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Kajaṅgalāti kajaṅgalāvāsino. Mahāpañhesūti
atk-s0404a0:452_1: mahantaatthapariggāhakesu pañhesu. Yathā mettha khāyatīti yathā me ettha upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0404a0:452_2: Sammā subhāvitacittoti hetunā nayena suṭṭhu bhāvitacitto. Eso ceva tassa atthoti
atk-s0404a0:452_3: kiñcāpi bhagavatā “cattāro dhammā”tiādayo pañhā “cattāro āhārā”tiādinā nayena vissajjitā,
atk-s0404a0:452_4: yasmā pana catūsu āhāresu pariññātesu cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti, tesu ca
atk-s0404a0:452_5: bhāvitesu cattāro āhārā pariññātāva honti. Tasmā desanāvilāsena byañjanamevettha
atk-s0404a0:452_6: nānaṃ, attho pana ekoyeva. Indriyādīsupi eseva nayo. Tena vuttaṃ – “eso ceva tassa
atk-s0404a0:452_7: attho”ti. Atthato hi ubhayampetaṃ majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇamiva hoti.
atk-s0404a0:454_0: 29. Navame yāvatāti yattakā. Kāsikosalāti kāsikosalajanapadā. Attheva aññathattanti
atk-s0404a0:454_1: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ atthiyeva. Atthi vipariṇāmoti maraṇampi atthiyeva. Tasmimpi
atk-s0404a0:454_2: nibbindatīti tasmimpi sampattijāte ukkaṇṭhati. Agge virajjatīti sampattiyā agge kosalarājabhāve
atk-s0404a0:454_3: virajjati. Pageva hīnasminti paṭhamataraṃyeva hīne ittaramanussānaṃ pañca kāmaguṇajāte.
atk-s0404a0:455_0: Manomayāti jhānamanena nibbattā. Bārāṇaseyyakanti bārāṇasiyaṃ uppannaṃ. Tattha kira
atk-s0404a0:455_1: kappāsopi mudu, suttakantikāyopi tantavāyāpi chekā, udakampi suci siniddhaṃ. Ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhanti
atk-s0404a0:455_2: dvīsupi passesu maṭṭhaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ khāyati. Catasso paṭipadā lokiyalokuttaramissikā
atk-s0404a0:455_3: kathitā. Saññāsu paṭhamā kāmāvacarasaññā, dutiyā rūpāvacarasaññā, tatiyā lokuttarasaññā,
atk-s0404a0:455_4: catutthā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā. Yasmā pana sā saññā aggāti āgatā, tato paraṃ saññāpaññatti
atk-s0404a0:456_0: Bāhirakānanti sāsanato bahiddhā pavattānaṃ. No cassaṃ no ca me siyāti sace ahaṃ atīte
atk-s0404a0:456_1: na bhavissaṃ, etarahipi me ayaṃ attabhāvo na siyā. Na bhavissāmi na me bhavissatīti
atk-s0404a0:456_2: sacepi anāgate na bhavissāmi, na ca me kiñci palibodhajātaṃ bhavissati. Agge virajjatīti
atk-s0404a0:456_3: ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṃ virajjati. Ucchedadiṭṭhi hi idha nibbānassa santatāya agganti jātā.
atk-s0404a0:457_1: adhivacanaṃ. Ākiñcaññāyatanañhi vipassanāpadaṭṭhānattā aggaṃ nāma jātaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:457_3: Anupādā vimokkhoti catūhi upādānehi aggahetvā cittassa vimokkho. Arahattassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:457_4: Pariññanti samatikkamaṃ. Tattha bhagavā paṭhamajjhānena kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti,
atk-s0404a0:457_5: arūpāvacarehi rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti, anupādānibbānena vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeti.
atk-s0404a0:457_6: Nibbānañhi sabbavedayitappahānattā vedanānaṃ pariññā nāma. Anupādāparinibbānanti
atk-s0404a0:457_7: apaccayaparinibbānaṃ. Idaṃ pana suttaṃ kathento bhagavā anabhiratipīḷitāni pañca
atk-s0404a0:457_8: bhikkhusatāni disvā tesaṃ anabhirativinodanatthaṃ kathesi. Tepi anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0404a0:457_9: desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpannā hutvā aparabhāge vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0404a0:459_0: 30. Dasame uyyodhikā nivatto hotīti yuddhato nivatto hoti. Laddhādhippāyoti mahākosalaraññā
atk-s0404a0:459_1: kira bimbisārassa dhītaraṃ dentena dvinnaṃ rajjānaṃ antare satasahassuṭṭhāno kāsigāmo
atk-s0404a0:459_2: nāma dhītu dinno. Ajātasattunā pitari mārite mātāpissa rañño viyogasokena nacirasseva
atk-s0404a0:459_3: matā. Tato rājā pasenadikosalo “ajātasattunā mātāpitaro māritā, mama pitu santako
atk-s0404a0:459_4: gāmo”ti tassatthāya aṭṭaṃ karoti, ajātasattupi “mama mātu santako”ti tassa gāmassatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:459_5: Dvepi mātulabhāgineyyā caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā yujjhiṃsu. Tattha pasenadikosalo
atk-s0404a0:459_6: dve vāre ajātasattunā parājito nagarameva pāvisi. Tatiyavāre “kathaṃ nu kho me jayo
atk-s0404a0:459_7: bhaveyyā”ti upassutivasena yujjhitabbākāraṃ ñatvā byūhaṃ racayitvā ubhohi passehi
atk-s0404a0:459_8: parikkhipitvā ajātasattuṃ gaṇhi. Tāvadeva jayādhippāyassa laddhattā laddhādhippāyo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0404a0:460_0: Yena ārāmo tena pāyāsīti bahinagare jayakhandhāvāraṃ nivesetvā “yāva nagaraṃ alaṅkaronti,
atk-s0404a0:460_1: tāva dasabalaṃ vandissāmi. Nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya hi papañco hotī”ti amaccagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0404a0:460_2: yenārāmo tena pāyāsi, ārāmaṃ pāvisi. Kasmiṃ kāle pāvisīti? Piṇḍapātappaṭikkantānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:460_3: bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā sammāsambuddhe gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhusaṅghe ca ovādaṃ
atk-s0404a0:460_4: sampaṭicchitvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gate. Caṅkamantīti kasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0404a0:460_5: caṅkamanti? Paṇītabhojanapaccayassa thinamiddhassa vinodanatthaṃ, divā padhānikā
atk-s0404a0:460_6: vā te. Tādisānañhi pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā nhatvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā nisajja
atk-s0404a0:460_7: samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Ye te bhikkhūti so kira “kahaṃ satthā
atk-s0404a0:460_8: kahaṃ sugatoti pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ āgantvā pucchitvāva pavisissāmī”ti vilokento
atk-s0404a0:460_9: araññahatthī viya mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlike bhikkhū disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0404a0:460_10: agamāsi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Dassanakāmāti passitukāmā. Vihāroti gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0404a0:460_11: sandhāya āhaṃsu. Ataramānoti aturito, saṇikaṃ padapamāṇaṭṭhāne padaṃ nikkhipanto
atk-s0404a0:460_12: vattaṃ katvā susammaṭṭhaṃ muttajālasinduvārasadisaṃ vālukaṃ avināsentoti attho. Ālindanti
atk-s0404a0:460_13: pamukhaṃ. Aggaḷanti kavāṭaṃ. Ukkāsitvāti ukkāsitasaddaṃ katvā. Ākoṭehīti agganakhena
atk-s0404a0:460_14: īsakaṃ kuñcikāchiddasamīpe koṭehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dvāraṃ kira atiupari amanussā, atiheṭṭhā
atk-s0404a0:460_15: dīghajātikā koṭenti. Tathā akoṭetvā majjhe chiddasamīpe koṭetabbanti idaṃ dvārakoṭanavattanti
atk-s0404a0:460_16: vadanti. Vivari bhagavā dvāranti na bhagavā uṭṭhāya dvāraṃ vivarati, vivaratūti pana
atk-s0404a0:460_17: hatthaṃ pasāreti. Tato “bhagavā tumhehi anekakappakoṭīsu dānaṃ dadamānehi na sahatthā
atk-s0404a0:460_18: dvāravivaraṇakammaṃ kata”nti sayameva dvāraṃ vivaṭaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā bhagavato manena
atk-s0404a0:460_19: vivaṭaṃ, tasmā “vivari bhagavā dvāra”nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:461_0: Mettūpahāranti mettāsampayuttaṃ kāyikavācasikaupahāraṃ. Kataññutanti ayañhi rājā
atk-s0404a0:461_1: pubbe thūlasarīro ahosi, doṇapākaṃ bhuñjati. Athassa bhagavā divase divase thokaṃ
atk-s0404a0:466_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi. So imasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ hāpetvā anukkamena
atk-s0404a0:466_1: nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhāsi, gattānipissa tanūni thirāni jātāni. Taṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0404a0:466_2: kataṃ upakāraṃ sandhāya “kataññutaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, kataveditaṃ sampassamāno”ti
atk-s0404a0:466_3: āha. Ariye ñāyeti sahavipassanake magge. Vuddhasīloti vaḍḍhitasīlo. Ariyasīloti apothujjanikehi
atk-s0404a0:466_4: sīlehi samannāgato. Kusalasīloti anavajjehi sīlehi samannāgato. Āraññakoti jāyamānopi
atk-s0404a0:466_5: araññe jāto, abhisambujjhamānopi araññe abhisambuddho, devavimānakappāya gandhakuṭiyā
atk-s0404a0:466_6: vasantopi araññeyeva vasīti dassento evamāha. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:468_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame saṅghasuṭṭhutāyātiādīsu saṅghasuṭṭhutā nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo,
atk-s0404a0:468_1: “suṭṭhu devā”ti āgataṭṭhāne viya “suṭṭhu, bhante”ti vacanasampaṭicchanabhāvo. Yo
atk-s0404a0:468_2: ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati, tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0404a0:468_3: Tasmā saṅghassa “suṭṭhu, bhante”ti vacanasampaṭicchanatthaṃ paññattaṃ, asampaṭicchane
atk-s0404a0:468_4: ādīnavaṃ, sampaṭicchane ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā, na balakkārena abhibhavitvāti etamatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:468_5: āvikaronto āha – saṅghasuṭṭhutāyāti. Saṅghaphāsutāyāti saṅghassa phāsubhāvāya, sahajīvitāya
atk-s0404a0:469_0: Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti dummaṅkūnāma dussīlapuggalā, ye maṅkutaṃ āpādiyamānāpi
atk-s0404a0:469_1: dukkhena āpajjanti, vītikkamaṃ karontā vā katvā vā na lajjanti, tesaṃ niggahatthāya.
atk-s0404a0:469_2: Te hi sikkhāpade asati “kiṃ tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ sutaṃ, kiṃ amhehi kataṃ, katamasmiṃ
atk-s0404a0:469_3: vatthusmiṃ katamaṃ āpattiṃ ropetvā amhe niggaṇhathā”ti saṅghaṃ viheṭheyyuṃ. Sikkhāpade
atk-s0404a0:469_4: pana sati te saṅgho sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā saha dhammena niggahessati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0404a0:470_0: Pesalānanti piyasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya. Piyasīlā hi bhikkhū kattabbākattabbaṃ
atk-s0404a0:470_1: sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādañca ajānantā sikkhāttayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā kilamanti,
atk-s0404a0:470_2: te pana sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādañca ñatvā sikkhāpāripūriyā ghaṭamānā na kilamanti.
atk-s0404a0:470_3: Tena tesaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ phāsuvihārāya saṃvattatiyeva. Yo vā dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:470_4: niggaho, sveva tesaṃ phāsuvihāro. Dussīlapuggale nissāya hi uposathappavāraṇā na
atk-s0404a0:470_5: tiṭṭhanti, saṅghakammāni nappavattanti, sāmaggī na hoti, bhikkhū anekaggā uddesādīsu
atk-s0404a0:470_6: anuyuñjituṃ na sakkonti. Dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti,
atk-s0404a0:470_7: tato pesalā bhikkhū phāsu viharanti. Evaṃ “pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyā”ti
atk-s0404a0:471_0: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāyāti diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena
atk-s0404a0:471_2: dukkhaviseso, tesaṃ saṃvarāya pidahanāya āgamanamaggathakanāyāti attho. Samparāyikānanti
atk-s0404a0:471_3: samparāyikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena katapāpakammamūlakā samparāye narakādīsu
atk-s0404a0:472_0: Appasannānanti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi sati sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā vā, yathāpaññattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:472_1: paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū disvā vā, yepi appasannā paṇḍitamanussā, te “yāni vata loke
atk-s0404a0:472_2: mahājanassa rajjanadussanamuyhanaṭṭhānāni, tehi ime samaṇā ārakā viratā viharanti,
atk-s0404a0:472_3: dukkaraṃ vata karontī”ti pasādaṃ āpajjanti vinayapiṭakapotthakaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhikatavedibrāhmaṇā
atk-s0404a0:473_0: Pasannānanti yepi sāsane pasannā kulaputtā, tepi sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ vā ñatvā, yathāpaññattaṃ
atk-s0404a0:473_1: paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū vā disvā “aho ayyā dukkaraṃ karonti, ye yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattā
atk-s0404a0:473_2: vinayasaṃvaraṃ pālentī”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāyā”ti.
atk-s0404a0:474_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyāti tividho saddhammo pariyattisaddhammo paṭipattisaddhammo adhigamasaddhammoti.
atk-s0404a0:474_1: Tattha sakalampi buddhavacanaṃ pariyattisaddhammo nāma. Terasa dhutaguṇā cārittavārittasīlasamādhivipassanāti
atk-s0404a0:474_2: ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma. Navalokuttaradhammo adhigamasaddhammo nāma. So sabbopi
atk-s0404a0:474_3: yasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati bhikkhū sikkhāpadañca tassa vibhaṅgañca tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:474_4: aññañca buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, yathāpaññattañca paṭipajjamānā paṭipattiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0404a0:474_5: paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigacchanti, tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
atk-s0404a0:475_0: Vinayānuggahāyāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati saṃvaravinayo, pahānavinayo, samathavinayo,
atk-s0404a0:475_1: paññattivinayoti catubbidho vinayo anuggahito hoti sūpatthambhito. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0404a0:477: 32. Dutiye pārājikoti pārājikāpattiṃ āpanno. Pārājikakathā vippakatā hotīti “asukapuggalo pārājikaṃ āpanno nu kho no”ti evaṃ kathā ārabhitvā aniṭṭhāpitā hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0404a0:479_0: 33. Tatiye ubbāhikāyāti sampattaadhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ saṅghato ubbāhitvā uddharitvā
atk-s0404a0:479_1: gahaṇatthāya. Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito hoti. Asaṃhīroti
atk-s0404a0:479_2: na aññassa vacanamatteneva attano laddhiṃ vissajjeti. Paṭibaloti kāyabalenapi ñāṇabalenapi
atk-s0404a0:479_3: samannāgato. Saññāpetunti jānāpetuṃ. Paññāpetunti sampajānāpetuṃ. Nijjhāpetunti olokāpetuṃ.
atk-s0404a0:479_4: Pekkhatunti passāpetuṃ. Pasādetunti sañjātapasādaṃ kātuṃ. Adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇādicatubbidhaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:481: 34. Catutthe anabhiratinti ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ. Vūpakāsetunti vinetuṃ. Adhisīleti uttamasīle. Cittapaññāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0404a0:483_0: 37. Sattame vatthūhīti kāraṇehi. Avakassantīti parisaṃ ākaḍḍhanti vijaṭenti ekamantaṃ
atk-s0404a0:483_1: ussārenti. Apakassantīti ativiya ākaḍḍhanti, yathā visaṃsaṭṭhā honti, evaṃ karonti.
atk-s0404a0:483_2: Āveni kammāni karontīti visuṃ saṅghakammāni karonti.
atk-s0404a0:485_0: 39-40. Navame kappaṭṭhikanti āyukappaṃ nirayamhi ṭhitikāraṇaṃ. Kibbisaṃ pasavatīti
atk-s0404a0:485_1: pāpaṃ paṭilabhati. Āpāyikoti apāyagamanīyo. Nerayikoti niraye nibbattanako. Vaggaratoti
atk-s0404a0:485_2: bhedarato. Yogakkhemā padhaṃsatīti yogehi khemato arahattato dhaṃsati vigacchati.
atk-s0404a0:485_3: Dasame anuggahoti aññamaññassa saṅgahānuggaho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0404a0:487_0: 44. Pañcamassa catutthe kusinārāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Devatānaṃ atthāya baliṃ
atk-s0404a0:487_1: haranti etthāti baliharaṇo, tasmiṃ baliharaṇe. Acchiddena appaṭimaṃsenātiādīsu yena
atk-s0404a0:487_2: kenacideva pahaṭo vā hoti, vejjakammādīni vā katāni, tassa kāyasamācāro upacikādīhi
atk-s0404a0:487_3: khāyitatālapaṇṇaṃ viya chiddo ca, paṭimasituṃ yattha katthaci gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ
atk-s0404a0:487_4: sakkuṇeyyatāya paṭimaṃso ca hoti, viparīto acchiddo appaṭimaṃso nāma. Vacīsamācāro
atk-s0404a0:487_6: viparīto acchiddo appaṭimaṃso. Mettaṃ nu kho me cittanti palibodhaṃ chinditvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogena
atk-s0404a0:487_7: adhigataṃ me mettacittaṃ. Anāghātanti āghātavirahitaṃ, vikkhambhanena vihatāghātanti
atk-s0404a0:487_8: attho. Kattha vuttanti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ kismiṃ nagare vuttaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:488_0: Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu eko ekaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codento kālena vadati nāma. Saṅghamajjhe
atk-s0404a0:488_2: parivāritakkhaṇe vā codento akālena vadati nāma. Tacchena vadanto bhūtena vadati
atk-s0404a0:488_4: vadanto pharusena vadati nāma. Kāraṇanissitaṃ pana katvā, “bhante mahallakattha,
atk-s0404a0:488_6: saṇhena vadati nāma. Kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā vadanto atthasaṃhitena vadati nāma. Mettacitto
atk-s0404a0:488_7: vakkhāmi no dosantaroti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā vakkhāmi, na duṭṭhacitto hutvā.
atk-s0404a0:490_0: 45. Pañcame kataṃ vā karissanti vāti methunavītikkamaṃ kariṃsu vā karissanti vā.
atk-s0404a0:490_1: Ratananti maṇiratanādīsu yaṃkiñci. Patthetīti māretuṃ icchati. Hatthisambādhanti
atk-s0404a0:490_2: hatthīhi sambādhaṃ. Hatthisammaddanti vā pāṭho, tassattho – hatthīhi sammaddo etthāti
atk-s0404a0:490_3: hatthisammaddaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Rajanīyāni rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbānīti
atk-s0404a0:490_4: etāni rāgajanakāni rūpādīni tattha paripūrāni honti.
atk-s0404a0:492_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe sokasabhayeti sokena sabhaye. Sokabhayeti vā pāṭho, ayamevattho. Dutiyapadepi
atk-s0404a0:492_1: eseva nayo. Yena kenaci kammaṭṭhānenāti kasivaṇijjādikammesu yena kenaci kammena.
atk-s0404a0:492_2: Anāpajja akusalanti kiñci akusalaṃ anāpajjitvā. Nibbiseyyāti uppādeyya ācineyya.
atk-s0404a0:492_3: Dakkhoti cheko. Uṭṭhānasampannoti uṭṭhānavīriyena samannāgato. Alaṃ vacanāyāti yutto
atk-s0404a0:492_4: vacanāya. Ekantasukhappaṭisaṃvedī vihareyyāti ekantameva kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ ñāṇena
atk-s0404a0:492_5: paṭisaṃvedento vihareyya. Aniccāti hutvā abhāvato. Tucchāti sārarahitā. Musāti niccasubhasukhā
atk-s0404a0:492_6: viya khāyamānāpi tathā na hontīti musā. Mosadhammāti nassanasabhāvā. Tasmā te paṭicca
atk-s0404a0:492_7: dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti sandasseti. Idha pana voti ettha vo ti nipātamattaṃ. Apaṇṇakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:492_8: vā sotāpannoti avirādhitaṃ ekaṃsena sotāpanno vā hoti. Sopi jhānaṃ nibbatteti, brahmalokaṃ
atk-s0404a0:492_9: vā gantvā chasu vā kāmasaggesu ekantasukhappaṭisaṃvedī hutvā vihareyya. Imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0404a0:494_0: 47. Sattame micchāpaṇihitanti micchā ṭhapitaṃ. Adhammacariyāvisamacariyāti akusalakammapathavasena
atk-s0404a0:494_1: adhammacariyasaṅkhātā visamacariyā. Kusalakammapathavasena itarā veditabbā. Evamidha vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:496_0: 48. Aṭṭhame pabbajitenāti gharāvāsaṃ pahāya sāsane pabbajjaṃ upagatena. Abhiṇhanti
atk-s0404a0:496_1: abhikkhaṇaṃ punappunaṃ, paccavekkhitabbā oloketabbā sallakkhetabbā. Vevaṇṇiyanti
atk-s0404a0:496_2: vivaṇṇabhāvaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ vevaṇṇiyaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti sarīravevaṇṇiyaṃ parikkhāravevaṇṇiyañca.
atk-s0404a0:496_3: Tattha kesamassuoropanena sarīravevaṇṇiyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pubbe pana nānāvirāgāni sukhumavatthāni
atk-s0404a0:496_4: nivāsetvāpi nānaggarasabhojanaṃ suvaṇṇarajatabhājanesu bhuñjitvāpi sirigabbhe varasayanāsanesu
atk-s0404a0:496_5: nipajjitvāpi nisīditvāpi sappinavanītādīhi bhesajjaṃ katvāpi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0404a0:496_6: chinnasaṅghaṭitakasāvarasapītāni vatthāni nivāsetabbāni, ayapatte vā mattikapatte
atk-s0404a0:496_7: vā missakodano bhuñjitabbo, rukkhamūlādisenāsane muñjatiṇasantharaṇādīsu nipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:496_8: cammakhaṇḍataṭṭikādīsu nisīditabbaṃ, pūtimuttādīhi bhesajjaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti. Evamettha
atk-s0404a0:496_9: parikkhāravevaṇṇiyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ paccavekkhato kopo ca māno ca pahīyati.
atk-s0404a0:497_0: Parapaṭibaddhā me jīvikāti mayhaṃ paresu paṭibaddhā parāyattā catupaccayajīvikāti.
atk-s0404a0:497_1: Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi ājīvo parisujjhati, piṇḍapāto ca apacito hoti, catūsu paccayesu
atk-s0404a0:497_2: apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma na hoti. Añño me ākappo karaṇīyoti yo gihīnaṃ uraṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0404a0:497_3: gīvaṃ paggahetvā lalitenākārena aniyatapadavītihārena gamanākappo hoti, tato aññova
atk-s0404a0:497_4: ākappo mayā karaṇīyo, santindriyena santamānasena yugamattadassinā visamaṭṭhāne udakasakaṭeneva
atk-s0404a0:497_5: mandamitapadavītihārena hutvā gantabbanti paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi
atk-s0404a0:497_6: iriyāpatho sāruppo hoti, tisso sikkhā paripūrenti. Kaccinukhoti salakkhaṇe nipātasamudāyo.
atk-s0404a0:497_7: Attāti cittaṃ. Sīlato na upavadatīti aparisuddhaṃ te sīlanti sīlapaccayo na upavadati.
atk-s0404a0:497_8: Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi ajjhattaṃ hirī samuṭṭhāti, sā tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ sādheti,
atk-s0404a0:497_9: tīsu dvāresu saṃvaro catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti, catupārisuddhisīle ṭhito vipassanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:497_10: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti. Anuvicca viññū sabrahmacārīti paṇḍitā sabrahmacārino
atk-s0404a0:497_11: anuvicāretvā. Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi bahiddhā ottappaṃ saṇṭhāti, taṃ tīsu dvāresu
atk-s0404a0:498_0: Nānābhāvo vinābhāvoti jātiyā nānābhāvo, maraṇena vinābhāvo. Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi
atk-s0404a0:498_1: tīsu dvāresu asaṃvutākāro nāma na hoti, maraṇassati sūpaṭṭhitā hoti. Kammassakomhītiādīsu
atk-s0404a0:498_2: kammaṃ mayhaṃ sakaṃ attano santakanti kammassakā. Kammena dātabbaṃ phalaṃ dāyaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:498_3: kammassa dāyaṃ kammadāyaṃ, taṃ ādīyāmīti kammadāyādo. Kammaṃ mayhaṃ yoni kāraṇanti
atk-s0404a0:498_4: kammayoni. Kammaṃ mayhaṃ bandhu ñātakoti kammabandhu. Kammaṃ mayhaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ patiṭṭhāti
atk-s0404a0:498_5: kammapaṭisaraṇo. Tassa dāyādo bhavissāmīti tassa kammassa dāyādo tena dinnaphalaṃ
atk-s0404a0:498_6: paṭiggāhako bhavissāmi. Evaṃ kammassakataṃ pana paccavekkhato pāpakaraṇaṃ nāma na
atk-s0404a0:498_7: hoti. Kathaṃbhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattantīti kinnu kho me vattappaṭipattiṃ karontassa,
atk-s0404a0:498_8: udāhu akarontassa, buddhavacanaṃ sajjhāyantassa, udāhu asajjhāyantassa, yonisomanasikāre
atk-s0404a0:498_9: kammaṃ karontassa, udāhu akarontassāti kathaṃbhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattanti,
atk-s0404a0:498_10: parivattantīti attho. Evaṃ paccavekkhato hi appamādo paripūrati.
atk-s0404a0:499_0: Suññāgāre abhiramāmīti vivittokāse sabbiriyāpathesu ekakova hutvā kacci nu kho abhiramāmīti
atk-s0404a0:499_1: attho. Evaṃ paccavekkhato kāyaviveko paripūrati. Uttarimanussadhammoti uttarimanussānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:499_3: vā uttaritaro visiṭṭhataro dhammo me mama santāne atthi nu kho, santi nu khoti attho.
atk-s0404a0:499_5: diṭṭhamiva dhammaṃ paccakkhakaraṇato dassanaṭṭhena dassananti ñāṇadassanaṃ, ariyaṃ
atk-s0404a0:499_6: visuddhaṃ uttamaṃ ñāṇadassananti ariyañāṇadassanaṃ, alaṃ pariyattakaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:499_7: ariyañāṇadassanamettha, assa vāti alamariyañāṇadassano, jhānādibhedo uttarimanussadhammo
atk-s0404a0:499_8: alamariyañāṇadassano ca so viseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso. Atha vā tameva
atk-s0404a0:499_10: vā. Adhigatoti paṭiladdho me atthi nu kho. Sohanti paṭiladdhaviseso so ahaṃ. Pacchime
atk-s0404a0:499_11: kāleti maraṇamañce nipannakāle. Puṭṭhoti sabrahmacārīhi adhigataguṇavisesaṃ pucchito.
atk-s0404a0:499_12: Na maṅku bhavissāmīti patitakkhandho nittejo na hessāmīti. Evaṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0404a0:501_1: Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. Dasame sīlabāhusaccavīriyasatipaññā lokiyalokuttarāmissikā
atk-s0404a0:503_0: 51-54. Dutiyassa paṭhame sacittapariyāyakusaloti attano cittavārakusalo. Rajanti
atk-s0404a0:503_2: arahattatthāya. Tatiye paṭibhānenāti vacanasaṇṭhānena. Catutthe adhipaññādhammavipassanāyāti
atk-s0404a0:505_0: 58. Aṭṭhame amatogadhāti ettha saupādisesā nibbānadhātu kathitā, nibbānapariyosānāti
atk-s0404a0:505_1: ettha anupādisesā. Anupādisesaṃ pattassa hi sabbe dhammā pariyosānappattā nāma honti.
atk-s0404a0:507_0: 59. Navame tasmāti yasmā evaṃ aparicitacittassa sāmaññattho na sampajjati, tasmā.
atk-s0404a0:507_1: Yathāpabbajjāparicitañca no cittaṃ bhavissatīti yathā pabbajjānurūpena paricitaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:507_2: Ye hi keci pabbajanti nāma, sabbe te arahattaṃ patthetvā. Tasmā yaṃ cittaṃ arahattādhigamatthāya
atk-s0404a0:507_3: paricitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, taṃ yathāpabbajjāparicitaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Evarūpaṃ pana
atk-s0404a0:507_4: cittaṃ bhavissatīti sikkhitabbaṃ. Lokassa samañca visamañcāti sattalokassa sucaritaduccaritāni.
atk-s0404a0:507_5: Lokassa bhavañca vibhavañcāti tassa vaḍḍhiñca vināsañca, tathā sampattiñca vipattiñca.
atk-s0404a0:507_6: Lokassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañcāti pana saṅkhāralokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, khandhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:509_0: 60. Dasame anukampaṃ upādāyāti girimānandatthere anukampaṃ paṭicca. Cakkhurogotiādayo
atk-s0404a0:509_1: vatthuvasena veditabbā. Nibbattitappasādānañhi rogo nāma natthi. Kaṇṇarogoti bahikaṇṇe
atk-s0404a0:509_2: rogo. Pināsoti bahināsikāya rogo. Nakhasāti nakhehi vilekhitaṭṭhāne rogo. Pittasamuṭṭhānāti
atk-s0404a0:509_3: pittasamuṭṭhitā. Te kira dvattiṃsa honti. Semhasamuṭṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Utupariṇāmajāti
atk-s0404a0:509_5: visamaparihārena jātā. Opakkamikāti vadhabandhanādinā upakkamena jātā. Kammavipākajāti
atk-s0404a0:509_6: balavakammavipākasambhūtā. Santanti rāgādisantatāya santaṃ. Atappakaṭṭhena paṇītaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:511_0: 61-62. Dutiyassa paṭhame sāhāranti sapaccayaṃ. Vijjāvimuttinti phalañāṇañceva sesasampayuttadhamme
atk-s0404a0:511_1: ca. Bojjhaṅgāti maggabojjhaṅgā. Dutiye bhavataṇhāyāti bhavapatthanāya. Evaṃ dvīsupi
atk-s0404a0:511_2: suttesu vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ, vaṭṭañcettha paṭhame sutte avijjāmūlakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0404a0:513_0: 63-64. Tatiye niṭṭhaṃ gatāti nibbematikā. Idha niṭṭhāti imasmiṃyeva loke parinibbānaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:513_1: Idha vihāyāti imaṃ lokaṃ vijahitvā suddhāvāsabrahmalokaṃ. Catutthe aveccappasannāti
atk-s0404a0:515_0: 65-67. Pañcame vaṭṭamūlakaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ pucchitaṃ, chaṭṭhe sāsanamūlakaṃ. Sattame
atk-s0404a0:515_1: naḷakapānanti atīte bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā vānarayūthena naḷehi udakassa pītaṭṭhāne
atk-s0404a0:515_2: māpitattā evaṃladdhanāmo nigamo. Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ anuviloketi,
atk-s0404a0:515_3: tattha tattha tuṇhībhūtameva. Anuviloketvāti tato tato viloketvā. Piṭṭhi me āgilāyatīti
atk-s0404a0:515_4: kasmā āgilāyati? Bhagavato hi cha vassāni mahāpadhānaṃ padahantassa mahantaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:515_5: ahosi, athassa aparabhāge mahallakakāle piṭṭhivāto uppajji. Upādinnakasarīrassa ṭhānanisajjādīhi
atk-s0404a0:515_6: appamattakena ābādhena na sakkā kenaci bhavituṃ. Taṃ gahetvāpi therassa okāsakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0404a0:515_7: evamāha. Saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā ekamante patirūpaṭṭhāne paññattassa kappiyamañcassa upari attharitvā.
atk-s0404a0:517_1: kathaṃ. Tattha rājānaṃ ārabbha “mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃmahānubhāvo”tiādinā
atk-s0404a0:517_2: nayena pavattakathā rājakathā. Esa nayo corakathādīsu. Tesu “asuko rājā abhirūpo
atk-s0404a0:517_3: dassanīyo”tiādinā gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti, “sopi nāma evaṃmahānubhāvo
atk-s0404a0:517_4: khayaṃ gato”ti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati. Coresupi “mūladevo evaṃmahānubhāvo,
atk-s0404a0:517_5: meghadevo evaṃmahānubhāvo”ti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca “aho sūrā”ti gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0404a0:517_6: Yuddhesupi bhāratayuddhādīsu “asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho”ti kammassādavaseneva
atk-s0404a0:517_7: kathā tiracchānakathā, “tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā”ti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0404a0:517_8: hoti. Apica annādīsu “evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimha
atk-s0404a0:517_9: pivimha paribhuñjimhā”ti kāmarasassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana
atk-s0404a0:517_10: katvā “pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:518_0: Ñātikathādīsupi “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi
atk-s0404a0:518_1: vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā
atk-s0404a0:518_2: khayaṃ gatā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:518_4: sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā “saddhā
atk-s0404a0:518_5: pasannā”ti vā “khayavayaṃ gatā”ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Nigamanagarajanapadakathāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0404a0:519_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā khayaṃ
atk-s0404a0:519_1: gatā”ti evameva vaṭṭati. Sūrakathāpi “nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī”ti assādavaseneva
atk-s0404a0:519_2: na vaṭṭati, “saddho ahosi khayaṃ gato”ti evameva vaṭṭati. Surākathanti pāḷiyaṃ pana
atk-s0404a0:519_3: anekavidhaṃ majjakathaṃ assādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati, ādīnavavaseneva vattuṃ
atk-s0404a0:519_4: vaṭṭati. Visikhākathāpi “asukavisikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthā”ti assādavaseneva
atk-s0404a0:519_5: na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā khayaṃ gatā”ti vaṭṭati. Kumbhaṭṭhānakathā nāma kūṭaṭṭhānakathā
atk-s0404a0:519_6: udakatitthakathā vuccati. Kumbhadāsikathā vā. Sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti
atk-s0404a0:519_7: assādavasena na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā”tiādinā nayeneva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0404a0:520_0: Pubbapetakathā nāma atītañātikathā. Tattha vattamānañātikathāsadisova vinicchayo.
atk-s0404a0:520_1: Nānattakathā nāma purimapacchimakathāvimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0404a0:520_2: Lokakkhāyikā nāma “ayaṃ loko kena nimmito? Asukena nāma nimmito. Kāko seto aṭṭhīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:520_3: setattā, balākā rattā lohitassa rattattā”tievamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā.
atk-s0404a0:520_4: Samuddakkhāyikā nāma kasmā samuddo sāgaroti. Sāgaradevena khatattā sāgaro, khato
atk-s0404a0:520_5: meti hatthamuddāya niveditattā samuddotievamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyanakathā.
atk-s0404a0:520_6: Bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Iti bhavo iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0404a0:521_0: Tejasā tejanti attano tejasā tesaṃ tejaṃ. Pariyādiyeyyāthāti khepetvā gahetvā abhibhaveyyātha.
atk-s0404a0:521_1: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko piṇḍapātiko mahātheraṃ pucchi – “bhante, tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyamānā
atk-s0404a0:521_2: bhikkhū kiṃ karontī”ti. Thero āha – āvuso, kiñcideva ātape ṭhapetvā yathā chāyā heṭṭhā
atk-s0404a0:521_3: na otarati, uddhaṃyeva gacchati tathā karonti. Dasame pāsaṃsāni ṭhānānīti pasaṃsāvahāni
atk-s0404a0:523_0: 71. Tatiyassa paṭhame sampannasīlāti paripuṇṇasīlā, sīlasamaṅgino vā hutvāti attho.
atk-s0404a0:523_1: Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi sampannasīlatā hoti sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā
atk-s0404a0:523_2: ca ānisaṃsadassanena. Tadubhayampi visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ. Tattha “sampannasīlā”ti
atk-s0404a0:523_4: iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ vitthāretvā dassesīti dīpavihāravāsī sumanatthero āha.
atk-s0404a0:523_5: Antevāsiko panassa tepiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āha – ubhayatthapi pātimokkhasaṃvarova
atk-s0404a0:523_6: bhagavatā vutto. Pātimokkhasaṃvaroyeva hi sīlaṃ, itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:523_7: atthīti ananujānanto vatvā āha – indriyasaṃvaro nāma chadvārārakkhāmattakameva, ājīvapārisuddhi
atk-s0404a0:523_8: dhammena samena paccayuppattimattakaṃ, paccayasannissitaṃ paṭiladdhapaccaye idamatthanti
atk-s0404a0:523_9: paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanamattakaṃ. Nippariyāyena pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlaṃ. Yassa
atk-s0404a0:523_10: so bhinno, ayaṃ sīsacchinno viya puriso hatthapāde sesāni rakkhissatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0404a0:523_11: Yassa pana so arogo, ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ sesāni puna pākatikāni
atk-s0404a0:523_12: kātuṃ sakkoti. Tasmā “sampannasīlā”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā “sampannapātimokkhā”ti
atk-s0404a0:523_13: tasseva vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā dassento pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutātiādimāha.
atk-s0404a0:523_14: Tattha pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuttātiādīni vuttatthāneva. Ākaṅkheyya ceti idaṃ kasmā
atk-s0404a0:523_15: āraddhanti? Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthaṃ. Sacepi acirapabbajitānaṃ vā duppaññānaṃ vā evamassa
atk-s0404a0:523_16: “bhagavā ‘sīlaṃ pūretha sīlaṃ pūrethā’ti vadati, ko nu kho sīlapūraṇe ānisaṃso, ko
atk-s0404a0:523_17: viseso, kā vaḍḍhī”ti tesaṃ dasa ānisaṃse dassetuṃ evamāha – “appeva nāma etaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ
atk-s0404a0:524_0: Tattha ākaṅkheyya ceti yadi iccheyya. Piyo cassanti piyacakkhūhi sampassitabbo, sinehuppattiyā
atk-s0404a0:524_1: padaṭṭhānabhūto bhaveyyaṃ. Manāpoti tesaṃ manavaḍḍhanako, tesaṃ vā manena pattabbo,
atk-s0404a0:524_2: mettacittena pharitabboti attho. Garūti tesaṃ garuṭṭhāniyo pāsāṇacchattasadiso. Bhāvanīyoti
atk-s0404a0:524_3: “addhāyamāyasmā jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ sambhāvanīyo. Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti
atk-s0404a0:524_4: catupārisuddhisīlesuyeva paripūrakārī assa, anūnena ākārena samannāgato bhaveyyāti
atk-s0404a0:524_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyuttoti attano cittasamathe yutto. Anirākatajjhānoti
atk-s0404a0:524_6: bahi anīhaṭajjhāno, avināsitajjhāno vā. Vipassanāyāti sattavidhāya anupassanāya.
atk-s0404a0:524_7: Brūhetā suññāgārānanti vaḍḍhetā suññāgārānaṃ. Ettha ca samathavipassanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0404a0:524_8: gahetvā rattindivaṃ suññāgāraṃ pavisitvā nisīdamāno bhikkhu “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti
atk-s0404a0:524_9: veditabbo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana icchantena majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
atk-s0404a0:525_0: Lābhīti ettha na bhagavā lābhanimittaṃ sīlādiparipūraṇaṃ katheti. Bhagavā hi “ghāsesanaṃ
atk-s0404a0:525_1: chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe”ti evaṃ sāvake ovadati. So kathaṃ lābhanimittaṃ
atk-s0404a0:525_2: sīlādiparipūraṇaṃ katheyya. Puggalajjhāsayavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yesañhi evaṃ ajjhāsayo
atk-s0404a0:525_3: bhaveyya “sace mayaṃ catūhi paccayehi na kilameyyāma, sīlāni paripūretuṃ sakkuṇeyyāmā”ti,
atk-s0404a0:525_4: tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasenevamāha. Apica sarasānisaṃso esa sīlassa yadidaṃ cattāro paccayā
atk-s0404a0:525_5: nāma. Tathā hi paṇḍitamanussā koṭṭhādīsu ṭhapitaṃ nīharitvā attanāpi aparibhuñjitvā
atk-s0404a0:526_0: Tatiyavāre yesāhanti yesaṃ ahaṃ. Tesaṃ te kārāti tesaṃ devānaṃ vā manussānaṃ vā te
atk-s0404a0:526_1: mayi katā paccayadānakārā. Mahapphalā hontu mahānisaṃsāti lokiyasukhena phalabhūtena
atk-s0404a0:526_2: mahapphalā, lokuttarena mahānisaṃsā. Ubhayaṃ vā etaṃ ekatthameva. Sīlādiguṇayuttassa
atk-s0404a0:526_3: hi kaṭacchubhikkhāpi pañcaratanamattāya bhūmiyā paṇṇasālāpi katvā dinnā anekāni kappasahassāni
atk-s0404a0:526_4: duggativinipātato rakkhati, pariyosāne ca amatāya dhātuyā parinibbānassa paccayo
atk-s0404a0:526_5: hoti. “Khīrodanaṃ ahamadāsi”ntiādīni cettha vatthūni. Sakalameva vā petavatthu vimānavatthu ca sādhakaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:527_0: Catutthavāre petāti peccabhavaṃ gatā. Ñātīti sassusasurapakkhikā. Sālohitāti ekalohitabaddhā
atk-s0404a0:527_1: pitipitāmahādayo. Kālaṅkatāti matā. Tesaṃ tanti tesaṃ taṃ mayi pasannacittaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0404a0:527_2: vā pasannena cittena anussaraṇaṃ. Yassa hi bhikkhuno kālakato pitā vā mātā vā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0404a0:527_3: ñātakatthero sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”ti pasannacitto hutvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anussarati,
atk-s0404a0:527_4: tassa so cittappasādopi taṃ anussaraṇamattampi mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsameva hoti.
atk-s0404a0:528: Aratiratisahoti nekkhammapaṭipattiyā aratiyā kāmaguṇesu ratiyā ca saho abhibhavitā ajjhottharitā. Bhayabheravasahoti ettha bhayaṃ cittutrāsopi ārammaṇampi, bheravaṃ ārammaṇameva.
atk-s0404a0:530_0: 72. Dutiye abhiññātehīti gaganamajjhe puṇṇacando viya sūriyo viya ñātehi pākaṭehi.
atk-s0404a0:530_1: Parapurāyāti paraṃ vuccati pacchimabhāgo, purāti purimabhāgo, purato dhāvantena pacchato
atk-s0404a0:530_2: anubandhantena ca mahāparivārenāti attho. Kaṇṭakoti vijjhanaṭṭhena kaṇṭako. Visūkadassananti
atk-s0404a0:532_0: 73-74. Tatiye vaṇṇoti sarīravaṇṇo. Dhammāti nava lokuttaradhammā. Catutthe ariyāyāti
atk-s0404a0:532_1: apothujjanikāya, sīlādīhi missakattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sārādāyī ca hoti varadāyīti sārassa
atk-s0404a0:532_2: ca varassa ca ādāyako hoti. Yo kāyassa sāro, yañcassa varaṃ, taṃ gaṇhātīti attho.
atk-s0404a0:534_0: 75. Pañcamassa ādimhi tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ chakkanipāte vuttameva. Dussīlo hotītiādīsu
atk-s0404a0:534_1: pana dussīloti nissīlo. Cetovimuttinti phalasamādhiṃ. Paññāvimuttinti phalañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0404a0:534_2: Nappajānātīti uggahaparipucchāvasena na jānāti. Dussīlyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti
atk-s0404a0:534_3: ettha pañca dussīlyāni tāva sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti, dasa arahattamaggena. Phalakkhaṇe
atk-s0404a0:534_4: tāni pahīnāni nāma honti. Phalakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya idha “nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Puthujjanassa
atk-s0404a0:534_5: sīlaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi bhijjati pārājikāpajjanena sikkhāpaccakkhānena titthiyapakkhandanena
atk-s0404a0:534_6: arahattena maraṇenāti. Tattha purimā tayo bhāvanāparihānāya saṃvattanti, catuttho
atk-s0404a0:534_7: vaḍḍhiyā, pañcamo neva hānāya na vaḍḍhiyā. Kathaṃ panetaṃ arahattena sīlaṃ bhijjatīti?
atk-s0404a0:534_8: Puthujjanassa hi sīlaṃ accantakusalameva hoti, arahattamaggo ca kusalākusalakammakkhayāya
atk-s0404a0:534_9: saṃvattatīti evaṃ tena taṃ bhijjati. Savanenapi akataṃ hotīti sotabbayuttakaṃ assutaṃ
atk-s0404a0:534_10: hoti. Bāhusaccenapi akataṃ hotīti ettha bāhusaccanti vīriyaṃ. Vīriyena kattabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0404a0:534_11: akataṃ hoti, tassa akatattā saggatopi maggatopi parihāyati. Diṭṭhiyāpi appaṭividdhaṃ
atk-s0404a0:534_12: hotīti diṭṭhiyā paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hoti apaccakkhakataṃ. Sāmayikampi
atk-s0404a0:534_13: vimuttiṃ na labhatīti kālānukālaṃ dhammassavanaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0404a0:535_0: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti “sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā pañcavidhaṃ dussīlyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti
atk-s0404a0:535_1: uggahaparipucchāvasena jānāti. Tassa savanenapi kataṃ hotīti sotabbayuttakaṃ sutaṃ
atk-s0404a0:535_2: hoti. Bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hotīti vīriyena kattabbayuttakaṃ antamaso dubbalavipassanāmattakampi
